30’s! Each tablet is packed with the specially formulated combination of B group vitamins, Vitamin C, and essential minerals such as Magnesium, Calcium, and Zinc, that powerfully support heightened mental and physical performance. The tablets reduce tiredness and activates mental alertness, leading to prolonged concentration throughout the day! Orange-flavoured Berocca Performance effervescent multivitamin tablets offer a delicious, fruity taste. Dissolve one tablet in water daily. Let it fizz, then enjoy a drop of positivity. BENEFITS: • Enhances mental performance and sharpness. • Prolongs concentration to help you power through the day. • Strengthens by maintaining physical energy level throughout the day. • Reduces fatigue and exhaustion by improving stamina. • Suitable for Vegans PACKING: One box consists of 2 tubes (Each tube contains 15 tablets) Made in Australia DOSAGE: Adults and children above 12 years old: Dissolve 1 tablet daily in a glass of water. Retail Price:     S$89.50  2 FOR $85.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Scientifically formulated to actively clear acne, pimples, blackheads and whiteheads. Our patented advanced formula features Vitamin B5, vitamin A, zinc, folic acid & biotin. Next Generation Extra Strength Vitamins – combined 2 great formulas (Extra Strength Tablets and Caplets) to produce 1 convenient product for all stages (treatment and maintenance). New and improved features with a higher potency formulation per tablet for convenience, meaning less tablets to be taken daily. Easy-to-follow directions of 2 tablets twice a day (day & night). A singular formula for diverse acne types, including blackheads/whiteheads, teenage acne, adult acne and scarring. The complexion you deserve is well within your reach. Achieving it is more than skin deep. While acne presents itself on the surface, the true cause of it lies deeper within our bodies. That’s why SkinB5 is scientifically formulated to target acne right at the source. Extra Strength Acne Control Vitamins use a next generation approach to skin wellness. Harnessing the healing power of Vitamin B5, Zinc, Copper and Vitamin A to actively promote a clear complexion. SkinB5’s revolutionary treatment assists with sebum control and cell renewal, builds immune defense, promotes internal harmony and alleviates stress. BENEFITS: • Face & body • Daily skin balance • Decrease congested skin pores • Enhance immunity • Reduce symptoms of stress • Promote skin repair • Assists healthy hair & nails • Provides antioxidant nutrients Made in Australia KEY INGREDIENTS: Vitamin B5, Vitamin A, Vitamin B3, Folic Acid (Vitamin B9), Biotin (Vitamin H), Zinc, Copper, Silicon, Vitex, Nettle Sugar free, gluten free, nut free, dairy free, vegan friendly, no animal testing. DIRECTIONS: Daily Dosage: 1–2 tablets after a meal. (Please allow 6–12 weeks to observe improvements) *Individual results may vary. For persistent acne breakouts, 2 Tablets twice a day. For regular breakouts: Blackheads, whiteheads, oily skin, enlarged pores, pimples, zits, 1 tablet twice a day. Maintenance Dosage: 1-2 tablets a day for lasting effects. Suitable for individuals 12+ years old. WARNING: If you are pregnant or considering becoming pregnant, do not take Vitamin A without consulting your doctor EXPIRY DATE: 30-Jun-2025 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 2 Ratings Love our product?     Login to leave a review and earn points! 2 0 0 0 0 Reviews Jaclyn Ong 2021-07-13 Great improvement of skin condition My 17 year old daughter had a lot of stubborn acne on her face especially on her forehead. After taking this skinB5 extra strength acne control tablets and using the skinB5 cleanser, there is a marked improvement just after 2 weeks. Her skin became cleaner and clearer, the acne reduced by 50%. Elizabeth Lim 2021-06-15 Works really well for teenage acne Have introduced this to several mommies with teenagers having acne issues. So far, everyone has been saying that it works really well and helps to clear the acne quickly. The clay mask version is really good as well, helps to clear the occasional acne that has been popping up from all the mask-wearing.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Moms & Kids 〉   Bonjela Gel 15g (For Teething And Mouth Ulcers)   Bonjela Gel 15g (For Teething And Mouth Ulcers) Brand: Bonjela S$8.80     vs. Retail Price:     S$9.10  2 FOR $8.70 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Bonjela is a pleasant tasting gel that provides relief from the pain, discomfort and inflammation caused by common mouth ulcers and sore spots, as well as those due to dentures and orthodontic devices. BENEFITS: • Fast acting gel for teething and mouth ulcers. • Clinically shown to aid the healing and relieve pain of mouth ulcers caused by braces and dentures. • Helps to fight mouth infection. • Calm your little one's teething gum. • Sugar free. Made in UK INGREDIENTS: Choline Salicylate 87 mg/g (8.7% w/w). Contains Alcohol and Saccharin. Contains Cetalkonium Chloride as preservative. DIRECTIONS: For topical oral use: Wash your hands, apply enough Bonjela to cover the tip of the index finger (about a pea-sized amount) and massage into the affected area. This can be repeated after 3 hours if necessary. In the treatment of ulcers, wipe the surface free of mucus before applying. Do not apply more often than once every 3 hours. No more than 6 doses should be given in 24 hours. Not suitable for babies under 4 months. EXPIRY DATE: 01-Nov-2024 Rating & Reviews 0 /5 0 Ratings Love our product?     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy 3 Ways to Build Your Child's Immune System In our few humble years of running the Glovida business, we have had numerous opportunities to speak with many mummies and gleaned insights to some of the matters that are close to their hearts. We believe these are things that many would identify with and that it would be good to share with our many friends and fans out here. Yes, caring is sharing, they say. And we believe in sharing, caring and nourishing each other – not just physically but mentally and emotionally as well. Whether you are a parent or have friends or siblings who are parents, it is not difficult to tell how it takes a toll on parents whenever a child falls ill – double whammy when two or more fall sick together! And we all know that prevention is better than cure! But how do we go about “preventing”? **HERE COMES THE “HOW-TO” BITS: ** METHOD #1: WHAT GOES IN... MUST COME OUT When we were young, our parents used to say “eat dirty, grow up dirty”; which refers broadly to allowing ourselves to eat or be exposed to anything and allowing our bodies to build immunity accordingly to deal with any illnesses or adversity in life as we grow up. This philosophy may not hold as much truth for the kids today. However, eating well is still the very fundamental thing for good health. Put in the good stuff, and the body benefits. And the same can be said for the reverse… So, lesser sugar (when they get too hyper, we get too tired chasing them around) and ditch the deep-fried stuff (yeap, french fries included!). Trade the candies for immunity gummies and French fries for delicious probiotic chocolate balls (yes, there is such a thing!) – they make happy treats for kids; which tastes good and are good for their bodies. METHOD #2: IT ALL STARTS FROM THE HOME The apple does not fall far from the tree. There, so before you start yelling at your kids for any of their bad habits… (you know what we are gonna say here. So we shan’t go on… :p) Cultivate healthy habits from home, and lead by example. Have your meals on time, eat more vegetables and fruits, drink more water, spend lesser time on your iPad, sleep early, blah blah. You know it all. The reality is, sometimes it is tough, after a full day at work, we just want to cut ourselves some slack – and not do the “good stuff” that we should be doing. But when we choose to snack on cookies and chips, binge on netflix series, or just laze on the couch and put off that needed shower; we are telling the kids that these are “good behavior” (despite what we say to them with our mouths!). So, maybe it’s time to take a hard look at yourself and see if there are some changes that need to take place; starting with yourself. #toughlove A simple place to start is to stock up on immunity boosters for the family. If the kids are still young, it’s a good idea to start them off on quality probiotics. Also have some emergency supplies handy for that occasional cough and sore throat. METHOD #3: YOU GOTTA MOVE IT, MOVE IT Spend time outdoors and get some fresh air! Go for a walk as a family; or if you are up for it, level up and go for a jog, maybe even cycling and swimming. Exercising helps to keep the body healthy and more resilient to viruses and illnesses; it’s one of the best ways to boost immunity. Not to mention the obvious, exercising as a family is also excellent bonding time! And if that sounds too boring, start flossing (the dance, not the teeth!) together with the kids – get them to teach you the moves! Have some fun while doing that. Who cares if you look goofy. ADD TO CART Product Details Description ReGro is a clear colorless to pale yellow solution which contains minoxidil which when applied topically has been shown to stimulate hair growth in individuals with hair loss for male and female. Observations suggest that the rate of balding progression may also be slowed by the use of this product. ReGro has developed high-quality formulas to battle concerns such as struggling hair growth. Clinically proven to help regrow hair, this solution will last approximately 40 days upon using. Made in Indonesia DIRECTIONS: Adult (18 to 65 years): Apply one dose of 7 sprays (1ml) of ReGro two times a day, preferably morning and night, to the areas of baldness or hair loss. This dose should be used regardless of the size of the bald area. Do not exceed two doses (14sprays or 2ml) per day. Massage scalp gently with fingertips after each spray. Wash hands well after use. The method for application as follow: 1. For large area of the scalp, use the pump sprayer. Aim and press the pump towards the center of the balding area. Spread gently with fingertips to cover all the balding areas. 2. For small areas or areas under hair, use the extended tip applicator. Pull the pump sprayer head out and fit the extended tip applicator firmly onto the spray shaft. Aim and press the pump towards the center of the balding area. Spread gently with fingertips to cover all the balding areas. ReGro should be applied to completely dry hair and scalp. Used only on healthy and intact skin. Do not wash hair or wet the scalp at least 4 hours after application. Onset and degree of hair growth stimulation vary among individuals.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Beauty 〉   Y-Not Natural Omega 369 Oil Australian Emu Oil 60ml   Y-Not Natural Omega 369 Oil Australian Emu Oil 60ml (3) Brand: Y-Not Natural S$36.00     vs. Retail Price:     S$36.00  2 FOR $34.20 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Australian Emu oil is widely recognized for its unique qualities and skin penetrability making it one of Australia’s most used natural therapy oils for over a thousand years with the indigenous cultures. Natural anti-inflammatory relief, non-steroidal and rich in Omega 3,6 & 9 fatty acids, Vitamins K, E and A. It contains 100% pure free-range emu oil by No. 1 Australian manufacturer of pure emu oil products. BENEFITS: • Pure Emu Oil is natural, non-toxic, non-comedogenic (meaning that it does not clog pores), hypo-allergenic (non-irritating) and is gentle for all skin types. • Anti Bacterial – Pure emu oil will help stop the growth of bacteria in wounded skin, preventing it from spreading. • Anti-inflammatory – with effects comparable to ibuprofen, brings down the swelling and inflammation of rosacae & eczema. • Pain relief - It is effective in reducing pain and quickly healing all types of burns including sunburn, first and second degree burns and burns caused from radiation therapy. • Antioxidant - As well as a known skin cell regenerator and anti-wrinkle agent which helps to improve the condition of aging skin. It also calms the surface and keeps the skin from scarring after having laser resurfacing or chemical peels. Made in Australia HOW TO USE: Using your hands apply onto the desired area. Apply more emu oil if needed to cover entire area. You do not need to rub the oil all the way in since this emu oil is a penetrating oil and will absorb into the skin on its own. The skin should not feel oily when you are finished. If it does, you have probably used too much. Simply reduce the amount that you use next time.  S$10.50  3 FOR $9.95 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description For a daily boost that's tastier, give your child this blend of Cod Liver Oil, Vitamin A, Vitamin D and Calcium, with the added goodness of orange flavour. Vitamin A supports normal immune function and healthy vision. Vitamin D helps to maintain healthy bones and teeth; and supports normal immune function. Calcium is beneficial for strong bones and teeth. What's more, Scott's Emulsion is pre-emulsified, which means the Cod Liver Oil in it is broken down and suspended in the product as tiny droplets. This is closer to the way our body naturally digests oils. Taken daily, the nutrients in Scott's Emulsion Orange help you support your child's immune system and healthy growth as well as development everyday. BENEFITS AND FEATURES: • This multi-purpose spray also eradicates dust mites, mould, bacteria and fungi, and insects and mosquitoes, making your home a clean and healthy environment. • Suitable to use on any fabric surface and as a room spray. • Best used during the changing of sofa, curtain, bed, pillow, bolster, blanket covers, shoes, car and stroller seats. • Recommended for babies 0+ months. INGREDIENTS: Aqua, Whitewood Oil, Lavender Maillette Oil, Moringa Oil, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxy Ethanol. DIRECTIONS FOR USE: Spray regularly on bed sheets, pillow covers, bolster covers, blankets, sofa, carpet, curtain, car, stroller seats and furry toys.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy All Brands 〉   Heliocare Ultra Oral 30's   Heliocare Ultra Oral 30's (15) Brand: Heliocare S$44.30     vs. Retail Price:     S$64.00  2 FOR $44.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description  Heliocare is an award-winning European brand celebrated for its distinctive and innovative sun protection capabilities. Powered by its patented Fernblock® Technology, this eminent leader in photoprotection traces its success to numerous collaborations with the prestigious Harvard Medical School, as well as partnerships with and endorsements from a number of leading sun protection experts. Heliocare offers a line of topical and oral photoprotectors that shields users from a range of harmful rays and halts the development of hyperpigmentation. This brand is a true winner among aesthetic doctors; a true antidote that strengthens overly sensitive skin. Heliocare Ultra Oral 30's is an oral sunblock that is clinically proven and studied to prevent the spread of free radicals. Every sunscreen capsules has the antioxidant property of Fernblock FC which reduces the formation of hyperpigmentation brought on by harmful UV rays. The sunscreen properties strengthen the skin's resistance against sunburn by up to 300%. The protection from Fernblock also slows down skin aging by up to 55% through the inhibition of collagen depletion caused by UVA. Bolstered with ingredients such as lycopene, lutein, vitamin C and vitamin E has additional antioxidant benefits and also protects the eye from UV rays. Other than protecting your skin from harmful UV rays, Fernblock repairs existing cellular damage, preventing cell mutation and in turn premature skin aging. The oral capsules serve as an ideal supplement for post-procedural skin or for those who have undergone skin treatments. BENEFITS: • Protects skin from damage caused by prolonged sun exposure• Defends skin against premature ageing• Rebuilds the skin's natural defences• Protects the eyes from UV rays with its additional antioxidant properties• Gluten free Made in Spain DOSAGE: Take one capsule daily before exposure to sun. In case of prolonged exposure, take a second capsule approximately 4 hours laterDo not exceed the stated recommended daily consumption. EXPIRY DATE: 30-Oct-2025 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 15 Ratings Love our product? Retail Price:     S$30.00  2 FOR $26.20 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description NeilMed Sinus Rinse is an easy squeeze bottle system that allows you to deliver the saline solution with positive pressure to clean the nasal passages thoroughly, while maintaining your head in an upright position. You have complete control of the pressure and volume of solution, ensuring a gentle, soothing and therapeutic experience. Daily rinsing is safe and will keep your nasal passages clean, healthy and open. USE FOR: • Nasal Allergies, Dryness & Hay Fever • Sinus Pressure & Nasal Stuffiness • Nasal Symptoms from Flu & Cold • Nasal Irritation from Occupational & House Dust, Fumes, Animal Dander, Grass, Pollen, Smoke, etc. • Post Nasal Drip & Nasal Congestion BENEFITS: • Soothing, No Burning or Stinging Large Volume & Low Pressure™ System for Saline Nasal Irrigation, Moisturization and Daily Nasal Hygiene • Preservative, Drug, Iodine, BPA, Gluten and Latex Free • Premixed Packets of USP Grade Sodium Chloride & Sodium Bicarbonate (Purity level 99% or higher) • Excellent cleansing prior to spraying nasal corticosteroids • pH Balanced & Isotonic, or Hypertonic with two or more packets • Smooth Flow with easy squeeze bottle • Suitable for use after sinus surgery and during pregnancy. Consult your physician with concerns. • Portable for travel Pack Contains: 1 x 240ml Bottle & 60 Premixed Sachets Made in USA DIRECTIONS: Dissolve one sachet in micro-filtered or previously boiled water. Use the squeeze bottle system to control the volume and pressure of the sinus rinse. Replace this bottle every 3 months. EXPIRY DATE: May-2026 Rating & Reviews 0 /5 0 Ratings Love our product? CART Product Details Description Here’s a treat for dry skin: Ego QV Cream 100g! Ego QV Cream is a moisturising, protective cream that provides deep skin hydration. It replenishes the skin with squalene, a natural component within the skin’s oil to effectively seal the natural moisture. This cream especially targets areas that are prone to intense dryness, like the hands, knees, and elbows. It’s low irritant and works well even with the most sensitive skin to stave off further drying and bring back the skin’s natural moisture. Continued use also addresses and corrects skin conditions like eczema, psoriasis, winter itch, and dermatitis. QV Skincare established since 1953, is one of Australia's most favourite skincare brands. BENEFITS: • Effectively moisturises and hydrates dryness-prone areas of the skin. • Staves off further drying by replenishing the skin with squalene. • Corrects and addresses skin conditions like eczema and psoriasis. • Acts as the skin's protective barrier. • Perfectly seals off skin’s moisture especially during dry and winter seasons. • Non-comedogenic, free from fragrance, colour, lanolin and propylene glycol. • Suitable for infants and the elderly. Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: Apply to affected area as often as required, particularly after showering, bathing, shaving and exposure to harsh climate conditions and at night. Suitable for daily use. For best results, remember to moisturize immediately after your bath or shower for soft hydrated skin. FOR $18.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Sebamed Anti-Hairloss Shampoo reduces hair loss by activating the functions of the scalp and promoting efficient skin circulation to strengthen hair roots. Created with the same pH 5.5 value of healthy skin, Sebamed Anti-Hairloss Shampoo protects the natural barrier function of the skin’s acid mantle, stabilising the hair structure to make it less vulnerable to dryness, splice and breakage to maintain strong, shiny hair. BENEFITS: • 100% Soap and Alkali-free • For all hair types • Without colour additives • The pH 5.5 promotes the natural barrier function of the scalp's acid mantle and helps to protect the hair's structure. • The efficacy of Anti-Hairloss Shampoo is based on the NHE formula plus caffeine and gingko biloba for a medicinal activation of the scalp. Thanks to this stimulation of the blood circulation, there is an increase in the supply of nutrients and oxygen to the papilla and follicle • Provides optimal growth conditions for strong and healthy hair • Continuous application over several months will lead to visible results: reduced hair loss and healthier hair. Made in Germany DIRECTIONS: Wet hair and work shampoo into a lather in the palms of the hands. Massage the whole scalp gently with the finger tips for 2 minutes so the active ingredients can penetrate. Dispense the foam into the length of the hair. Rinse thoroughly. Apply shampoo only once during each washing. Recommended Amount Of Shampoo: Normal scalp condition: Use a full shampoo bottle cap Atopic or/and sensitive skin condition: Use 3/4 shampoo bottle cap every second day EXPIRY DATE: 31-Mar-2025 Rating & Reviews 0 /5 0 Ratings Love our product? S$38.00  2 FOR $31.50 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Duphalac oral solution offers relief from constipation for all the family. Duphalac oral solution contains a laxative called lactulose. Duphalac may contain small amounts of milk sugars (e.g. lactose), galactose, epilactose or fructose. As a prebiotic substance, lactulose intensifies the growth of Bifidobacterium and Lactobacillus, while Clostridium and Escherichia coli may be suppressed, leading to alleviation of constipation. BENEFITS: • Relieves chronic constipation • Little absorption into body • Suitable for long-term use Made in Netherlands DOSAGE/ DIRECTIONS: Take Duphalac diluted or undiluted. Swallow the medicine quickly. Do not keep it in the mouth. Take the dosage preferably once a day at the same time. During treatment with laxatives, drink sufficient amounts of fluids (6 to 8 glasses). Dosing in constipation or for stool softening: Starting dose [Maintenance dose]: Adults 10 - 45 ml [10 - 25 ml]; Children (7-14 years) 15 ml [10 -15 ml]; Children (1-6 years) 5 - 10 ml [5 - 10 ml]; Infants under 1 year Up to 5 ml [Up to 5 ml]. Based upon treatment response the doctor may adjust the starting dose to the maintenance dose after a few days. Several (2-3) days of treatment may be needed before treatment effect occurs. Dosing in Portal systemic encephalopathy (PSE) (for adults only): Starting dose: 30 - 50 ml THREE times daily. This dose may be adjusted by the doctor to the maintenance dose to achieve 2 to 3 soft stools per day. DO NOT TAKE DUPHALAC: If the patient is allergic to lactulose or any of the ingredients of Duphalac, suffer from galactosaemia, gastrointestinal obstruction, digestive perforation, or risk of digestive perforation. This all-natural probiotic is backed by extensive scientific research and tests that makes it a giant in probiotic health. Lactokids+ builds a child’s immune system, relieves upset stomach, and strengthens digestive system with their powerful combination of probiotics (Lactobacillus Acidophilus, Bifidobacterium Longum and Streptococcus Faecalis). Additionally, it’s also propelled by two widely researched probiotic strings: Lactobacillus plantarum and Lactobacillus rhamnosus. And it doesn’t really stop there! It’s filled to the brim with the addition of vitamins B1, B2, B5, B6, B9, and D3, all of which facilitates a kid’s growth. All these builds children’s first line of defense against harmful bacteria. It tastes good and is easily digestible, perfect for even the most picky eaters. BENEFITS: • Builds children’s strong defense against harmful bacteria • Strengthens child’s immunity with good bacteria • Promotes better digestion • Relieves upset stomach Made in Korea DOSAGE: Build & support immunity: Infants from birth to 3 years old: 1 sachet daily (after meal), Kids 3 years and above: 2 sachets daily. Relieves stomach upset: Infants from birth to 3 years old: 1-2 sachets daily (after meal), Kids 3 years and above: 3-4 sachets daily. DIRECTIONS: Can be taken directly (Simply tear along the grey perforated line on the sachet) Can be taken dissolving in room temperature water STORAGE: No refrigeration required, store in a cool dry place, avoid direct sunlight. Brand: Sambucol S$18.00     vs. Retail Price:     S$24.90  3 FOR $16.80 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Children love the taste of Sambucol Black Elderberry Cold & Flu Relief Kids Liquid! This powerful medicine is packed with black elderberry, elderflower, honey, zinc and vitamin C that relieves children of cold and flu symptoms. This oral liquid contains black elderberries as its main antioxidant ingredient that gives it an overall berry flavour! The 120 ml bottle has all-natural ingredients that help expunge free radicals and protect children from virus, therefore building their immune system in the process. To relieve symptoms of common colds & flu including: • Cough • Congestion • Sore Throat Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: Shake well before use. Age 2-4 years: 7.5ml (1/2 teaspoon) once daily. Age 5-9 years: 10ml (2 teaspoons) once daily. Age 10-12 years: 15ml (1 tablespoon) once daily. Best taken at first sign of cold and flu - within 48 hours of the onset of symptoms or as recommended by our healthcare practitioner. We recommend you start giving your child Sambucol Black Elderberry Cold & Flu Relief Kids Liquid at the beginning of the cold and flu season, when immunity is weakened or even when others in the family are sick. Not to be used in children under two years of age without medical advice. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Dec-2024 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 9 Ratings Love our product? S$25.00  2 FOR $22.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Evolve HA are soothing eye drops intended for use in the relief of discomfort that arises from dry eye sensations. They provide soothing relief for sore eyes from grit, itchiness and other foreign body irritations. • Great for moderate to severe dry eyes. • Preservative Free Multi-Dose bottle. • Contact Lens Friendly. Dry eye sensations may also be produced by use of TVs and computer screens, infrequent blinking, certain medical treatments including refractive laser eye surgery, atmospheric pollution and drying atmosphere e.g. air conditioning, central heating, wind and sun. Evolve HA is a unique system designed to combine the benefits of unit dose preservative free eye drops with the convenience of a standard eye drop bottle. Once opened the bottle can be used for up to 3 months. Evolve HA is both preservative free and phosphate free, ideal for sensitive eyes and frequent users. Made in UK DIRECTIONS: Place one drop of Evolve HA into each eye two to four times a day or as directed by your doctor, pharmacist or optician. Evolve HA is compatible with all types of contact lenses. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Oct-2024 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 4 Ratings Love our product? exciting times of the day for new parents) so it’s crucial to create a relaxing night time routine that will have them sleeping like, well, a baby! GAIA Natural Baby Sleeptime Bath Wash is designed to do exactly that. This gentle cleanser is pH balanced and free from artificial fragrances, soap, sulphates, paraben preservatives, propylene glycol and petrochemicals, making it more suitable for sensitive skin and eczema. Ideal for everyday use. FEATURES & BENEFITS: • Enriched with organic Lavender & Ylang Ylang - an essential oil blend to help encourage relaxation as part of baby's bedtime routine. • Enriched with organic Evening Primrose Oil - to help nourish and soften skin. • Enriched with organic Chamomile - to help calm and soothe delicate skin. • The Sleeptime Bath Wash is gentle enough to be used from birth. • No petrochemicals or artificial fragrance agents making it eczema friendly. • Cruelty-Free Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: Pour sleeptime bath wash into the running water of the nighttime bath to release the soothing aromas. Or add a small amount of sleeptime bath wash to a sponge, washer, or cotton pad and wash your child's skin. Use in the evening to encourage a regular sleep routine.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Paraben-Free, Sulfate-Free & Fragrance-Free Products - What Are They & Do They Actually Give You Gorgeous Skin? Paraben-free, Sulfate-free, fragrance-free, etc… We see these labels on most of our skincare products, but what do they mean exactly and how do they impact our skin? PARABENS = PRESERVATIVES Parabens help stop the growth of bacteria, fungus and other potentially harmful microbes; it is used widely as preservatives in lotions, deodorants, shampoos, shaving cream, and many other skin-care products. The most common Parabens that you will find on product labels are butylparaben, methylparaben, and propylparaben, so be sure to look out for these the next time you go shopping! The big debate over Paraben is that has been linked (although not conclusively) to breast cancer. It is said that it gets absorbed into the body and is known to interfere with and mimic estrogen; disturbing the hormonal balance in the body. It’s also known as a leading cause of skin irritation, dermatitis, and premature skin ageing (premature ageing? A definite no-no!) PLANT-BASED PRESERVATIVES – A GOOD ALTERNATIVE TO PARABENS: It is better to be mindful in choosing our skin care essentials and choose Paraben-free products to give our skin the glow it needs, but without the negative long-term side effects of chemical preservatives. Paraben-free products usually contain either ethylhexylglycerin (plant-derived preservative) or phenoxyethanol (naturally derived ether alcohol). Here are two products that are paraben free without compromising on the beauty benefits: Ceramiracle First Light The Reboot Mask is a nutrient-rich, anti-aging clay mask that gently revitalizes, purifies and exfoliates your skin to give it a brightening boost. It combines a mixture of rare black volcanic sand and traditional Korean botanical extract (Korean rice water, anti-aging ginseng and mugwort) to restore the balance of your delicate skin. Ceramiracle products are cruelty-free and vegetarian-friendly; and do not contain any harsh chemicals, parabens, SLS/SLES, sulfates, mineral oils, synthetic or artificial dyes or phthalates. (Ps: we tried it and we loved it). Auolive Day Glower is a lightweight, non-greasy antioxidant day moisturiser which protects the skin from premature ageing and UV rays damage. Enriched with a luxurious blend of natural active ingredients like Ginkgo Bilbao Leaf Extract and Squalene, the skin receives the moisture and nourishment it needs to stay soft, supple and healthy. Auolive products are dermatologically and clinically tested, non-allergenic, paraben, alcohol and color free (The founder’s absolutely passionate about her products and so you can trust that loads of thoughts have gone into the formulation!) SLS, SLES, ALL THE BUZZ AND WHAT ARE THEY EXACTLY? Sulfates are substances that are found widely in products like facial wash, shampoo, and toothpastebut also in laundry detergents too! It’s typically used to add “foam” and remove oil from hair and skin, acting like a “degreaser”; which generally works well to “cleanse”. However, it also means that in the process of “cleansing”, natural oils and the protective layers of the skin gets stripped off, which can cause irritation to the skin. Sulfate and two of its main ingredients Sodium Laureth Sulfate (SLS) and Sodium Laureth Ether Sulfate (SLES) are linked to a multitude of skin and hair problems since they have to corrode (damage or destroy!) in order to be useful. Because of this, sulfates may possibly leave you with problems like dry, irritated skin, rough and brittle hair, redness and dryness in the scalp, and for some, acne and eczema! RECOMMENDED SULFATE-FREE PRODUCTS: For those with sensitive skin, it may be a good idea to look for sulfate-free cleansers and shampoos. Sulfate-free products are made out of natural oils that seek to replace the SLS and SLES content in soaps. They also help to remove bacteria and prevent the dirt build-up. For instance, Sukin Botanical Body Wash from Australia is enriched with aromatic botanical oils that gently cleanse, soften and purify your skin. Free from sulfate and paraben, this hydrating body wash is filled with jojoba, avocado, and rosehip—aromatherapeutic oils that rejuvenate your tired body minus the known irritations you would otherwise get with sulfate-filled products. Another big fave worth trying is the Original Sprout Natural Shampoo which is infused with calendula, rosemary and aloe. This nourishing shampoo promises to detangle hair effortlessly without corroding or destroying hair roots, leaving you with hydrated hair after every wash! Unlike shampoos with sulfate chemicals that can strip away your hair moisture, it contains organic emollients that nourish and protect your scalp from redness and dryness. What is FRAGRANCE & how harmful is that? Hold up. Fragrance? As in… smell? What could possibly be wrong with that! As it turns out, A LOT. Fragrance is known to contain many allergens and irritants. Ever noticed how you sometimes sneeze non-stop when greeted with a scent that your body “rejects”? Now, imagine that happening on your skin; which typically translates as flare-ups and inflammation… and that usually happens when products that are being used contains substances that are not “skin identical”. If you have a skin type that’s sensitive, or you have skin conditions like eczema, rosacea, or psoriasis, it is extremely beneficial to eliminate allergens and irritants from your daily regime. RECOMMENDED FRAGRANCE-FREE PRODUCTS: A trusted brand by many with sensitive skin, Ego QV Cream replenishes the skin by pounding on squalene, a natural component in our skin’s natural oil. This is especially helpful to the driest areas of our bodies, like elbows, knees, and hands. Free from fragrance, color, and other skin allergens, Ego QV products are suitable for skin conditions such as dry scaly skin, itchiness, dermatitis and can be used to relief symptoms of atopic eczema and psoriasis. Suitable for infants as well as the elderly. A favourite amongst parents, Ceradan Soap-Free Moisturizing Wash, contains ceramides—which are natural lipids that bind skin cells together and comprise a major component of the skin’s surface structure. People suffering from skin conditions which make the skin dry, sensitive and inflamed are often low in ceramides. Irritated skin usually has a compromised protective barrier, which leaves it vulnerable to being affected by various environmental irritants. Ceradan products are laboratory tested and verified to be hypoallergenic. They contain no fragrance, colors, parabens, steroids. They are safe for use at all ages, from newborns to the very elderly and are suitable for both facial and bodily use. Now that you know your ABCs of the labels on your skincare products, make sure to include these recommended products in your cart and keep a lookout for the harsh chemicals listed above.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Buying Vitamins & Supplements Online - How Careful Should You Be? Ahhhhh… the glee of finding great buys online! The internet era has reshaped the way we live and shop. And as we become more comfortable with navigating our ways around the digital arena, it is important that we are equally savvy about purchasing our supplements and vitamins online as well. We have crafted a checklist below to help you out on this! 1.ESTABLISHED BRANDS Say you’ve scoured the internet and landed on a website that promises out-of-the-world benefits on some vitamins or supplement. You might think that you have discovered the latest wonder in science and health! However, it is better to take a step back and find out a little more about the product claims made; especially if it is a brand that you have never seen or heard before. Check the countries of origin and manufacturers and also the ingredients used in these products. It is important to check the authenticity of the products so you don’t end up with counterfeit products. It is a safer bet to buy your items from online stores that have established their niches in the medical retail industry and purchase directly from them to ensure that you’re buying high quality products and saving yourself from falling prey to shady third party-distributors. 2.PRICING On a related note to point 1, when you stumble upon a retailer that offers prices that are too good to be true, know that it probably is. Remember that the online stores are running a business, very much the same as retail stores. Often, prices are more competitive in the online space as online retailers save on rental costs in the retail space. However, when the prices are set too low, something probably has to give, in order to make ends meet for the business. It could be compromised product quality, storage conditions, product delivery, etc. Buy from an online retailer with reasonable and competitive pricing that offers value in the entire distribution chain. That will give you a better peace of mind in getting good products and good service. 3.ORGANIC REVIEWS & RECOMMENDATIONS In making online purchases, most of us typically scroll through online reviews. People weigh products based on others’ experiential testimonies; which is a rather commonplace thing to do. When going through these reviews, take note that a long review list may not always be a determinant of quality; look instead for organic or “real reviews”; aka reviews that come from actual people and not trolls (or those mean, faceless, cubes floating around the internet these days, ready to pounce at even the most trustworthy of brands). Other than product reviews, note what people say about other aspects of their purchase experience with the e-commerce sites; such as turnaround time (more on that later), packing, service, processing, shipping, etc. These are just as important as the product itself since these things say a lot about the dependability of your chosen online retailers. 4.TURNAROUND OR PROCESSING TIME Turnaround time is an especially vital point to consider. Look for online retailers who are able to articulate clearly the expected turnaround time, especially for local deliveries. Completing an order form is just step 1 of the entire process of an online order. An established store would have their inventory in check and stock on hand to complete the delivery promptly. They should also be able to keep customers informed of the status of their orders at every point of delivery. 5.QUALIFIED HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONALS Marketing has changed a lot since the early days of the internet. Influencers now play a big part in endorsing products and introducing new brands to the consumers. When it comes to healthcare, however, it is more important to ensure that there are qualified professionals, (eg. an in-house pharmacist) behind a store that specializes in selling health supplements. You would want to have a reliable source to turn to if you have any queries with your purchases and know that you are getting advice that you can trust. In this way, you get value and quality with your purchases as you are supported not just with good products to purchase, but also relevant health advice that you need when purchasing off a site selling health related products. 6.CONSISTENCY AND DEPENDABILITY Find a shop that is dependable and consistently provide good value and service. As well as one which is constantly offering new products and new ways to better your health. Unlike fashion, which keeps changing, with health care, you'd want a platform which is reliable and one which is able to meet your needs by listening to your feedback for new products and any health-related requests. Search for an online retailer who can partner with you through your health journey and have them support you and be a source you can turn to for support as well! Join Mailing List For 10% Off Keep up a healthy lifestyle! We have just the right vitamins and supplements to keep you and your young ones healthy and strong. Retail Price:     S$21.50  SAVINGS: 5% OFF    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Scott’s DHA Gummies with microencapsulated DHA technology, locks in the goodness of fish oil without the fishy taste and smell. In addition to DHA, Scott’s DHA Gummies also contain Vitamin D, which is essential for healthy growth & development of bone in children and healthy immune function. As children grow older, they can tend to be more fussy about the supplements they are willing to take. Scott's DHA Gummies can be a great option, with its yummy taste and interesting sea creature shapes that help make kids consuming DHA fuss free for moms. Just three Scott’s DHA Gummies a day can help supplement the DHA and Vitamin D that children need. So if you’re looking for a fun, great-tasting way to support your children’s brain development and healthy growth, take Scott’s DHA Gummies today! Notify Me Product Details Description REFINING - To give you clean, refreshed hands that smell ah-mazing, we’ve put the good stuff in this hand wash, like the calming aroma of geranium and chamomile, and the uplifting fragrance of rosewood. For a natural exfoliation, we’ve used finely milled pumice that’s gentle on skin, as well as aloe vera leaf juice and chamomile extract. This hand wash is a complete sensorial experience that helps your mind feel balanced, and your hands to feel super soft, soothed, and hydrated! • No SLS, SLES, EDTA, Parabens, propylene glycol, harsh petrochemicals, triethanolamine, harsh detergents, mineral oils, artificial colours • Not tested on animals and vegan friendly. • Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: With a pump of wash and a little water, rub your hands together and massage well for exfoliation, or lather lightly for a gentler clean. Rinse off, pat dry and walk away counting down the minutes until you get to wash your hands again. EXPIRY DATE: All our products have a minimum shelf life of 12 months, unless stated otherwise.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy The 8 Types of People You Will Meet This Christmas - & The Practical Gift Guide for Them It’s the most wonderful time of the year. Christmas brings a special warmth to our hearts. With vacations, feasting, and celebrations with family and loved ones; carols and festive décor decking every mall and house that you visit; very few holidays hold the same enchantment as Christmas. For many, it is also a time when we show our appreciation for the people in our lives, in a very tangible way, with gifts. For the busy bees out there, we know this can get overwhelming with the long list of gifts to prepare. So, in the spirit of giving and sharing, we have put together a little Glovida Christmas Gift Guide below to make it easy for you to pick up items that are practical, of good quality and great value. We will throw in some Christmas gift tags for you as well to make it all more seamless, so you can enjoy the reason for the season. GLOVIDA CHRISTMAS GIFT GUIDE Type 1: The Vain Pot *We all know one (or more!) of them. ;) Gift her (or him!) with anything that makes her look and feel prettier! * Budget	  Gift ideas Below $20	Face masks Body Mist $25 and up	Hair care products Body Scrubs/Moisturizers $40 and up	Sunscreen products $18 and up	Beauty supplements Type 2: The Fuss Pot This is for the the ones who seem to know it all and have it all, who seem to have no need for anything and are sooo difficult to please. You probably spend the most time cracking your head on what to get them. The way to please and impress them is to get them stuff of good quality, that cannot be easily found on the mass retail shelves. This would give them some bragging rights and make their Christmas a little merrier. Budget	Gift Ideas $20 and up	Vasse Virgin moisturisers $40 and up	Recherche $50 and up	Auolive $60 and up 	Ceramiracle Type 3: The Boss This is a tricky one... you would want to play it safe and get something tasteful with a touch of class. Earn some brownie points! Budget	Gift Ideas $20 and up	Quality body cleansers $30 and up 	Hand lotion $40 and up	Vasse Virgin Diffusers ** Type 4: The Jetsetter** The one who is always out of town and spends more time on the road than back at home. The one whom you have difficulty keeping tabs of their whereabouts. While the jetsetting lifestyle might seem enviable to some, these frequent flyers need some TLC for the body as the intense travelling could take a toll on their bodies. Budget	Gift Ideas Below $20 	Body Mists (which doubles up as a room spray too!) $20 and up 	Body massage oils to knead those tired muscle knots away $40 and up 	Suncare and skin brighteners (yes, this is very much needed!) Ceramiracle first light reboot mask Type 5: The Colleagues The people that you meet everyday at work and whom you work closely with (but yet not close enough to be BFFs). You want to show some appreciation by getting them something nice (but not too expensive!). In this instance, a little goes a long way... so you can continue on a good working relationship for the new year. Budget	Gift Ideas Below $20 	Utena face masks Body Mist (to use after lunch!) $20 and up	Body scrubs/ Moisturizers Shampoo/Conditioner ** Type 6: The Guys** *This one is a toughie. They do not seem to care about receiving any gifts. And yet, you can't get past yourself to not get them anything. So, something that they could use in their daily lives would probably work well. * Budget	Gift Ideas $10 and up 	Coconut oil $40 and up	Sunscreen products ** Type 7: The Parents** Ahhhh... our lovely parents. The ones who love us so dearly but gets on our nerves so badly sometimes. As they move into their sunset years, getting them stuff that helps them keep healthy would be a gesture that they would greatly appreciate. Budget	Gift Ideas $15 and up 	Digestive health supplement $40 and up 	Fish oil supplement Type 8 : Secret Santa Can’t run away from this! Can’t go too sloppy either. 'Cos everyone will open their presents in front of everyone! And you don’t want to look like you didn’t make any effort for the celebration… The savvy choice will be to get a general crowd pleaser. (without breaking the bank) Budget	Gift Ideas $10 to $30 and up 	Facial oils, Massage oils, body mists, body scrub Make use of the tips provided here to get your Christmas gifting sorted and spread some good cheer this yuletide. Enjoy the season of Christmas and take this time not just to celebrate, but also to reflect and be thankful for the year that has passed. We wish you a very merry & blessed Christmas and a very happy new year! Christmas Grand Sale: 10% Off Storewide [12-18 December] Spread more joy to your loved ones with perfect gifts from Glovida! Enjoy greater savings by taking 10% off everything + $12 off your next purchase!* Brands include Ceramiracle, LactoGG, Viviscal, Vasse Virgin & more!   S$14.90  2 FOR $12.90 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description The powerful nasal spray from Fess just got even better with its best formulation made especially for kids aged 2 to 10 years old! Fess Children’s Saline Nasal Spray is a non medicated nasal spray that offers a natural way to relieve kids’ blocked nose. It is made from micro-filtered seawater and relieves sinus and nasal congestion brought on by allergies, colds, and sinusitis. It effectively manages children’s allergies by stimulating the nose’s natural defences and calming sinus and nasal cavity inflammation by breaking down the mucus. Finally, this product helps wash away dust, pollen, and other allergens. Fess Children’s Saline Nasal Spray is safe and free from preservatives and harmful chemicals, promoting better nasal health for kids! BENEFITS: • Naturally relieves congestion by thinning and clearing excess mucus. • Protects from dust and other pollutants, especially allergens that cause hay fever. • Promotes and strengthens nasal health by neutralising the acidity in the sinus cavity. • Softens dried blood for post-operative care so as not to irritate sinus passages. Made in France DIRECTIONS: Use 2-3 sprays per nostril as needed. Direct the nozzle into the right nostril. Angle the nozzle away from the centre of the nose pointing towards the right ear. Press the spray pump 2 or 3 times. Repeat in the left nostril. EXPIRY DATE: 30-May-2024 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 3 Ratings Love our product? Well look no further than Sambucol Black Elderberry Immune Defence Lozenges! These delicious throat lozenges contain powerful antioxidant properties of black elderberry, one of nature's strongest defense against free radicals.  Black elderberries have twice the natural antioxidant capacity of blueberries and more than 50% the overall antioxidant capability of cranberries. This product also contains the additional power of Zinc, Vitamin C & soothing Honey which are specially formulated to soothe sore throat. Convenient on the go immune support everyday. BENEFITS: • Provides fast relief from sore throat • Support immune system health & function • Provide Antioxidant support that help reduce free radicals formed in the body Made in Australia DOSAGE: Adults: Take 1-2 lozenges every hour, or as needed; up to 16 lozenges per day.  Children (9-12 years): Take 1 lozenge every 1 to 2 hours, up to 8 per day.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy 4 Essential Supplements You Should Never Go On Vacation Without Love going on vacations, but hate the packing? We have made it easier for you by coming up with this list of essential supplements that you should pack into your luggage for your next trip. Make sure you add them to the checklist when packing for your next flight out! 1. IMMUNITY BOOSTERS Falling sick while on vacation is no fun! What more with all the exciting things that you have on the itinerary, you would definitely want to stay healthy in order to enjoy your long-awaited break! Keep your immunity in check, and give a boost to your energy levels with Berocca Performance Orange Flavour Effervescent Tablets! For some, it is helpful in dealing with jetlag! This immunity booster is formulated with Vitamin B and C, plus essential minerals like calcium, magnesium, and zinc. It’s dissolved in water and builds up people’s immune system across age group. Plus, it tastes yummy too! Alternatively, Sambucol Cold & Flu Forte Elderberry Capsules help to build your immune defenses and reduces the risk of catching the common cold wherever you go. It is formulated not only to fight and provide relief from the symptoms of cold and flu; it also acts as a powerful support to one’s natural immune function. Every capsule has concentrated black elderberry, combined with the immune supporting ingredients of Vitamins C and Zinc. 2. THROAT LOZENGES Cough is one of the most common illnesses that can strike when travelling. Thus, it’s essential to equip yourself with lozenges that can soothe your throat effectively! Elderberry has been studied for its ability to remedy the common cold and flu. The fruit is a rich source of antioxidants and have, on its own, been proven to treat a whole load of health problems like constipation, sinus infections, and even hay fever. This main ingredient is what makes Sambucol Black Elderberry Lozenges so effective! This supplement is bursting with the enticing flavour of black elderberry and has combative properties that’s been proven to be anti-cancer, anti-diabetes, and anti-inflammation. Additionally, it provides relief from sore throat and is packed with antioxidants, plus Vitamin C and Zinc, that helps support the immune system. People on vacation are often wary of taking medicines during their trips for fear of drowsing and missing out. With Leftose 30s Tablets for Chesty Coughs and Sore Throats, you can leave all these worries behind as it contains a non-drowsy formula! It’s made up of lysozyme, a natural enzyme that contains anti-inflammatory and mucolytic properties that provide fast relief from sore throats and chesty coughs. What it does is that it breaks down hard-to-remove phlegm, allowing one to cough it out easily. With its effectiveness in relieving discomfort and swelling caused by sore throat, this supplement will come in handy when one falls ill while travelling! 3. PROBIOTICS When we travel to different places, one of the best ways to soak up the local culture is to enjoy local delicacies! As much as we want to stuff ourselves with delicious food, there’s that chance we could get adverse reaction to some stuff. So, one of the most important supplements on our list is probiotics which can help to prevent and cure uncomfortable digestives disorders. Lacteol Fort is a great probiotic that takes care of our gut health by providing effective relief from acute, chronic, and Traveler’s diarrhea. It has the powerful Lactobacillus acidophilus LB Strain 10 billion that prevents diarrhea and improve symptoms of IBS or Irritable Bowel Syndrome. Another robust probiotic supplement is LactoGG. LactoGG’s effectiveness is well-researched; it boasts over 700 scientific papers and 200 clinical trials under its belt. The overwhelming support for its claims of health benefits is traced to its powerful probiotic strain, Lactobacillus rhamnosus strain GG, which prevents constipation and provides relief from all kinds of diarrhea. Aside from gut-related benefits, LactoGG also contributes to stronger immune systems (for both adults and children) and lowers the risk of contracting infections across age group. Already a good, stand-alone product, LactoGG is also packed with bio-therapeutic qualities that make it an ideal complementary supplement to various medical treatments. 4. SUNBLOCK With or without the excuse for vacation, it’s important that we take supplements and products that protect us against harmful ultra violet rays. Good thing we have Heliocare Ultra Oral in our repository! Boasting over 40 published studies and very convincing collaborations with Harvard Medical School as well as experts in the field of sun protection, Heliocare Ultra Oral contains Fernblock as its key ingredient, a robust antioxidant that reduces the existence of free radicals by up to 50%. Never be afraid of stepping out into and enjoying the sun again; this supplement provides an entire skin surface protection that blankets your entire skin from UV rays and increases our skin’s resistance against sunburn, too! Not only does it do wonders for your skin, it also contains lycopene, lutein, vitamins C and E, which have the ability to protect your eyes from UV rays. Another supplement that can provide the essential sun protection you need is the Ceramiracle Invi-Sun Skin Defense Supplement. It provides long lasting protection against the sun’s rays, protecting our skin from prolonged sun exposure without the negative effects. What this supplement does is that it strengthens the skin’s natural resilience and protective barriers which allows us to withstand up to 56% more UV rays. It’s powered by NutroxSun, a component from Spain, that actively builds up the skin’s resistance. This oral sunblock also helps to reduce skin redness with its grapefruit and rosemary extracts. So, relish that local delicacy, bask in the sun longer, and sing your heart out wherever! Whatever you do, never shy away from the adventure that awaits you during your vacations again by taking these 4 essential supplements wherever you go! Join Mailing List For 10% Off! Stay gorgeous and healthy with the widest range of supplements and vitamins from Glovida! Sign up for our mailing list today to enjoy 10% OFF with a min. spend of $40 on health and beauty essentials from Heliocare, LactoGG, Vivomixx, BioGaia, Physiogel and more!     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Beauty 〉   Ceradan Ceramide Skin Barrier Repair Cream 150g   Ceradan Ceramide Skin Barrier Repair Cream 150g (6) Brand: Ceradan S$68.00     vs. Retail Price:     S$68.80  2 FOR $66.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Ceradan® repair cream is a ceramide-dominant skin barrier repair moisturizer that replenishes ceramide levels. For those with skin conditions such as eczema, ceramide levels are markedly reduced in the correct 3:1:1 ratio of intercellular physiological lipids (ceramide, cholesterol, free fatty acids). Ceradan® repair Cream contains a large concentration of ceramides. Ceramides are natural lipids which bind skin cells together and comprise a major component of the skin’s surface structure. People suffering from skin conditions which make the skin dry, sensitive and inflamed are often low in ceramides. Irritated skin usually has a compromised protective barrier, which leaves it vulnerable to being affected by various environmental irritants. BENEFITS: • Mildly acidic pH levels inhibit skin serine proteases from breaking down the skin barrier. • Laboratory tested and verified to be hypoallergenic. • Suitable for both facial and bodily use. • Safe for use at all ages, from newborns to the very elderly. • Contains no: Parabens, steroids, Lanolin, colours, fragrance or plant-derived squalene. Developed in Japan, Made in Singapore DIRECTIONS: Apply twice daily or as many times as needed. EXPIRY DATE: 30-May-2024 If you have any questions about the ideal use of this scientifically formulated cream, its benefits, ingredients or anything else, feel free to fill in an online enquiry form. Our representatives will be happy to help. Alternatively, you can call us on +65 9484 3356 for assistance. Rating & Reviews 5 /5 6 Ratings Love our product? I buy multiple quantities - one at home, one at childcare, one at my mum's and one at my in-law's. haha. thankful for the cheaper prices when i buy in bundles. Fu Karen 2020-11-05 Repeat purchase I have bought this product many times via Glovida. Recommended by my dermatologist. So far I've found Glovida to have the best price. Price at Glovida was more competitive too Shinn 2020-02-22 Very good product It is a very very good product, my baby used it until now for half year, his skin become much more better then before. Janice 2019-08-13 Glad that you have this cream in a bigger size! Thank you, Glovida for always bringing in good quality items at great value. I have been buying this Ceradan barrier repair cream with you and am so glad that you now have it in a bigger size. It is certainly better value for money and I am not able to find this elsewhere! Kudos to your resourcefulness. Keep up the good work and great service. Always enjoy shopping with you. Product Details Description Flexiseq Gel is a topically applied knee pain cream that eases the pain associated with osteoarthritis. Packed with powerful joint-care ingredients, Flexiseq Gel specifically targets and lubricates the affected joints to reduce overall joint stiffness and address tissue damage. Every application provides overall pain relief to stiff and swelling joints and brings back movement on the affected areas! BENEFITS: • Clinically proven safe and drug free. • Effectively eases joint pain and swelling. • Brings mobility back to affected joints. • Deeply absorbable to relieve persisting knee pains. • Suitable for all osteoarthritis patients. • Can be used safely with medicines for osteoarthritis and/or other medical conditions. Made in Germany HOW TO USE: 1) Apply twice daily, in the morning and the evening, to the soft tissues around affected joint. 2) Apply a quantity appropriate to the size of the joint being treated for example, for the knee joint 2.2g of gel is recommended (corresponding to a gel length of 7cm) 3) Allow the treated area to dry out before covering. Failure to do so may impair the absorption of the product. The gel should dry after no more than 15 minutes. If drying time takes longer, just use a little less next time. EXPIRY DATE: 30-Sep-2025 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 2 Ratings Love our product?     Login to leave a review and earn points! 2 0 0 0 0 Reviews Tee Aun Lim 2021-11-27 Review flexiseq 3rd purchase from Glovida. Flexiseq worked in reducing knee pain but need to be applied long term which raised issue of affordability versus an injection of synovial fluid. If Flexiseq is priced lower it will definitely be a viable alternative to synovial injection. Benjamin 2019-03-07 Recommended This is a good topical application for joints. Notify Me Product Details Description REFINING - This hand wash is a complete sensorial experience that helps your mind feel balanced, and your hands to feel super soft, soothed, and hydrated! To give you clean, refreshed hands that smell ah-mazing, we’ve put the good stuff in, like the calming, woody aroma of botanical cedarwood. For a natural exfoliation, we’ve used finely milled pumice that’s gentle on skin, as well as aloe vera leaf juice and chamomile extract. • No SLS, SLES, EDTA, Parabens, propylene glycol, harsh petrochemicals, triethanolamine, harsh detergents, mineral oils, artificial colours • Not tested on animals and vegan friendly. • Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: With a pump of wash and a little water, rub your hands together and massage well for exfoliation, or lather lightly for a gentler clean. Rinse off, pat dry and walk away counting down the minutes until you get to wash your hands again. EXPIRY DATE: All our products have a minimum shelf life of 12 months, unless stated otherwise.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Beauty skincare you can eat and drink? What to know and 10 brands to try Skincare supplements and collagen drinks have been around for a while, but the edible beauty trend has only really taken off recently, with more and more brands jumping on the eat-your-skincare bandwagon, and consumers very ready to swallow the promises of glowing skin and lush locks brought on by imbibing supplements. With the increasing obsession with wellness and health, and changes in lifestyle brought on by the pandemic, people are looking for new ways of helping their bodies (including their skin and hair) cope, and remain in optimum condition. Interestingly, many of these beauty supplements are from skincare labels, rather than brands more traditionally known for vitamins. Skincare and hair supplements, like health supplements, bring extra vitamins and minerals to the table, adding nutrients that may be missing from our diets. They compress into tiny pills and easy-to-consume sachets various foods and ingredients that may be difficult for us to regularly add to our meals, with the aim of contributing to better health and improved looks, from the inside out. The modern urbanite is cottoning on to the reality that a multi-pronged and holistic approach will help in bringing forth that million-dollar glow – this includes great skincare products, a regimented diet, facials and treatments, and beauty products you can eat. They compress into tiny pills and easy-to-consume sachets various foods and ingredients that may be difficult for us to regularly add to our meals. Of course, as with anything you put on your face or into your body, caution is advised. Read the ingredient labels carefully, make sure the products are safe and approved by the health authorities, and consult a doctor if you have health conditions. Here are some beauty supplements to consider if you plan to eat your way to great skin and hair. 1. IDS SKINCARE LYCO-WHITE ULTRA, S$128 FOR 30 TABLETS What it’s for: Brighter skin, UV protection and improved immunity. Local cosmeceutical skincare brand IDS Skincare’s new and improved Lyco-White Ultra supplements boast an amped-up formula and new ingredients to deliver fairer, brighter and more evenly-toned skin. The 1,500mg of white tomato extract in each tablet is equivalent to eating 187 medium-sized fresh tomatoes, and one pill a day promises to serve up better skin, UV protection and even improved immunity. https://jyx.shop 2. MIRIQA PROFESSIONAL HAIR NUTRITION SUPPLEMENT, S$125 FOR 60 TABLETS What it’s for: Hair growth and hair loss reduction. With a drug-free formula to bring the glory back to your crowning head of hair, this local brand uses botanicals and proteins such as saw palmetto berries, tocotrienol, tripeptide collagen and biotin to boost hair growth, increase hair thickness, improve hair strength and reduce hair loss with two capsules a day. The brand also has skincare supplements for better and brighter skin. https://miriqa.com Read the complete article over at CNA Lifestyle.   vs. Retail Price:     S$48.15  3 FOR $44.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Ultravite Boswellia & Ginger Complex contains four key herbs that are well known to support healthy joints and can also be used for general body and muscle aches. Boswellia, winter cherry, ginger and turmeric, all have a long history of use in traditional medicines as anti-inflammatory agents and are well supported by modern research. This natural supplement can be considered by anyone who wants natural alternatives to pain relief from joint aches. Each capsule contains extracts of: • Boswellia Forte: 200mg • Winter Cherry: 200mg • Ginger: 40mg • Turmeric: 40mg DOSAGE: One capsule 2 to 3 times daily, with meals or as directed by the doctor. Use for a minimum of 4 weeks for maximum results. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Jul-2025 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 7 Ratings Love our product?     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Health 〉   Sterimar Baby Blocked Nose 50ml   Sterimar Baby Blocked Nose 50ml (2) Brand: Sterimar S$16.50     vs. Retail Price:     S$20.50  2 FOR $15.90 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Sterimar Baby Blocked Nose is a hypertonic sea water solution with a high salt concentration than the human body's cells for the quick decongestion of blocked nose. It helps to drain fluids from the nasal mucosa, safely clearing the nose because of its immediate decongestant action. It is recommended for babies from 3 months and children. Sterimar Baby Blocked Nose is a hypertonic filtered sea water solution, 100% natural, drug and preservative free. Rich in mineral salts and marine trace elements with copper and manganese, which is known for their anti-infectious and anti-allergic properties, as well as their importance in cell metabolism. Sterimar Baby Hypertonic has been specially designed for the delicate noses of babies over 3 months and children: the salt content of the hypertonic sea water solution and the pressure of the spray have been developed to respect the nasal mucosa. BENEFITS: • Provide natural relief from nasal congestion (common colds, rhinopharyngitis, allergic rhinitis, sinusitis) • Contribute to reducing bacterial growth • Eliminate even thick mucus • Help to fight cold and limit the risks of secondary infection by washing out nasal cavities. • Recommended for babies from 3 months Made in France CONTENTS: Sea water, copper & manganese salt, purified water. DIRECTIONS: On first use, spray once to start the system. Gently insert the nozzle into the nostril. Spray briefly 1 to 2 times in each nostril. Let any excess solution flow out before wiping the nose. For a deeper cleansing of nasal cavities: 1) Place the baby under 2 years old lying on his back or sitting up from the age of 2. 2) Baby's head tilted to the side, gently insert the nozzle into the uppermost nostril. 3) Press the nozzle for approximately 2 seconds. Let any excess solution flow out of the other nostril then wipe the nose. 4) Repeat the operation in the other nostril if necessary. After each use, clean the nozzle with soapy water and dry. Use 2 to 6 times a day or more until decongestion. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Aug-2025 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 2 Ratings Love our product? Cream 100ml (9) Brand: Physiogel S$46.00     vs. Retail Price:     S$53.90  3 FOR $43.50 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Physiogel Calming Relief A.I. Cream 100ml wields the clinically proven power of Physiogel BioMimic Technology to provide lasting relief for dry and sensitive skin. The gentle cream works overtime to offer relief from eczema discomforts; it's hypoallergenic, lessens skin redness, soothes irritated skin, and protects against the discomfort brought on by excessive itch in eczema-prone skin. The gentle soothing capability of Physiogel, together with the complex make-up of lipids such as Palmitamide MEA (PEA) builds up and repairs the skin's natural, moisture barrier to relieve overall dryness. BENEFITS: • Provides lasting relief from eczema • Soothes dry, itchy skin • Reduces skin redness • Perfect for irritated and sensitive skin • Enhances and builds up the skin’s moisture barrier • Hypoallergenic with no preservatives, perfumes, colorants • Suitable for babies and children • Suitable for localized area of the face & body Made in Thailand DIRECTIONS: Apply twice daily or more if needed. vs. Retail Price:     S$110.35  2 FOR $87.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Promensil Menopause Double Strength is specifically formulated to provide a high dose of active ingredient as an additional dietary support for women in menopause and post menopause. This product is suitable for women experiencing menopause symptoms. Promensil is a supplement based on Red Clover isoflavones specifically standardised to help maintain general wellbeing for women after menopause. Promensil Menopause Double Strength has twice the amount of isoflavones (derived from Red clover), a unique ingredient of natural standardised red clover isoflavones which can help relieve the symptoms of menopause including night sweats, hot flushes and mild anxiety in post-menopausal women. Red clover isoflavones are naturally occurring plant oestrogens. BENEFITS: • Helps support healthy emotional balance and general health and wellbeing in post-menopausal women • Helps relieve menopausal symptoms, such as hot flushes, night sweats, mild anxiety & moodiness in post-menopausal women. Made in Australia Active ingredients per tablet: Contains standardised extract equivalent to dried Trifolium pratense herb 5g (equiv. isoflavones 80mg) DIRECTIONS: Adults: Take 1 tablet daily with a meal While individual responses vary, many women will notice difference in symptoms within 3-8 weeks of daily usage. Notify Me Product Details Description Braun is the leading brand in IR Ear Thermometers in Australia and worldwide, a trusted name recognised by the vast majority of Australian households.Used by doctors and paediatricians and trusted by parents around the world. More accurate than other brands due to: • A unique, pre-warmed tip that minimises the “cooling effect” – inaccuracy which can result from the introduction of a cool probe into the ear. Braun is always ready, no matter what the room temperature. • ‘No-fail’ positioning help – a light and a beep confirms it’s in the right spot in the ear • Memory recall function so you don’t have to remember baby’s last temperature • Safe & hygienic: contains no glass or mercury for peace of mind, especially around young children, and comes with 21 disposable lens filters to minimise transfer of germs • Large, easy to read LCD display • Especially suitable for infants, with a fast, 1-second reading and a gentle, flexible tip designed just for baby’s ear • 2 x AA allakine batteries included KEY FEATURES: • Award-winning, no. 1 Ear Thermometer in Australia and Worldwide • Used in doctor’s & paediatrician’s offices worldwide • Fast – 1 second readings • Clinically accurate, with unique pre-warmed tip • Feedback system for failsafe positioning • Gentle & comfortable, especially for infants NOTE: Due to the hygiene reasons, we do not accept exchanges or returns after products are delivered. S$158.00  2 FOR $142.55 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Vivomixx is backed by the original De Simone Formulation (DSF), a medicinal, microbiotic mix that contains live bacteria. Each sachet of Vivomixx delivers a blend of 450 billion live lactic acid bacteria and bifidobacteria. Vivomixx is highly potent, and each Vivomixx dosage is bolstered with a number of benefits, including a combination of 8 different strains of live lactic acid bacteria and bifidobacteria. This probiotic supplement is safe for daily intake as it is free from any damaging preservatives or synthetic sweeteners. It may contain traces of milk. BENEFITS: • Defends against diarrhoea, constipation, bloating, and irritable bowel syndrome • Protects against a number of gut-related issues • Vivomixx is a high potency probiotic food supplement, including 8 strains of live bacteria in concentrations of 450 billion bacteria per sachet Made in Italy DOSAGE: The recommended daily dose is 1-4 sachets. Dissolve contents of the sachet in water, yogurt or any other cold, non-carbonated drink or food and consume immediately. Do not exceed the recommended daily dosage. Vivomixx is not a food supplement and should not be used as a substitute for a varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle. CARE & STORAGE: Vivomixx products are refrigerated in our warehouse at all times. Vivomixx contains live bacteria which are sensitive to heat, it is therefore recommended to keep the product refrigerated. However it may be stored at room temperature for UP TO ONE WEEK without the quality of the probiotics being compromised. Packing and delivering of probiotics are done on the very same day. We do not accept exchanges or returns after products are delivered. EXPIRY DATE: 20-Jun-2024 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 4 Ratings Love our product? Looks like we ran out of this product. Do register to get notified once we've stocked up! Notify Me Product Details Description Original Sprout's professional quality Miracle Detangler makes combing easy for the whole family! Perfect for baby, toddlers, children, and anyone with long hair. Use with a wide-tooth comb or vent brush. The best way to detangle is to start at the bottom in small sections and work your way up to the scalp. Be gentle as hair is most fragile when wet. Original Sprout Miracle Detangler is free of mineral oils, DEA, colours or dyes. Nourishing organic extracts leave hair ultra soft, smooth and silky. Restores moisture without a waxy or greasy residue. Helps strengthen all hair types including delicate and chemically treated, breakage prone Sprouts. Makes combing effortless. BENEFITS: • Gentle pH of 4.5 – 5.5 • For baby, toddlers, children and adults • Key ingredients: calendula and rosemary • For all hair types and textures • Makes it easier to brush through tangles and helps prevent breakage • No soy, gluten, honey, peanut or dairy • Leave-In Treatment • Suitable for Vegans Made in USA DIRECTIONS: Shake & firmly spritz on to wet or dry hair, comb out & enjoy clean, tangle-free silky locks!     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Beauty 〉   Glowfully Plumicious Brightening Serum 30ml   Glowfully Plumicious Brightening Serum 30ml Brand: Glowfully S$64.60     vs. Retail Price:     S$68.00  2 FOR $61.35 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description This intensive, fast-absorbing formula rejuvenates dull and tired skin to reveal a translucent and radiant complexion. The 3 superfruits - Kakadu Plum, Illawarra Plum and Burdekin Plum are rich in Vitamin C and antioxidants, to liven up dull skin tones and strengthen the skin’s defence against environmental stressors. The natural AHA from Lime Pearl gently exfoliates for a brightened skin-smoothing complexion. Topped off with Niacinamide, Tranexamic Acid and Licorice, to further calm redness, brighten uneven skin tones and fade dark spots over time. Oil-free, silicone-free and fragrance-free, this potent formula is proven to be effective without chemically harsh whitening agents. The fluid texture rejuvenates lacklustre skin to deliver a translucent youthful glow with persistent use. KEY INGREDIENTS: • Kakadu Plum: The Kakadu Plum is touted as the most concentrated natural source of Vitamin C on earth, containing an average of 55 times the Vitamin C found in oranges. Its superior brightening abilities effectively targets dullness and hyperpigmentation for a more radiant and even complexion. The Kakadu Plum is also an antioxidant powerhouse, which protects your skin against premature aging caused by environmental damage. • Illawarra Plum: The Illawarra Plum is packed with anthocyanins, a potent antioxidant that protects your skin from free radical damage and fights signs of ageing. • Burdekin Plum: In addition to high levels of Vitamin C and antioxidants, the Burdekin Plum is also rich in skin-balancing minerals such as Zinc, Magnesium, Calcium and Potassium. • Lim Pearl: Lime Pearl is a natural source of Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHAs), which gently removes pore-clogging debris and promotes natural cell turnover, for a visibly clearer and smoother complexion. • Niacinamide: Niacinamide is a long-time favorite ingredient of ours, due to its versatility and multiple benefits for skin. Not only does it brighten and prevent hyperpigmentation, it also minimises the appearance of pores, balances oil production and strengthens the skin barrier. • Licorice Root: Licorice Root offers anti-inflammatory effects to soothe sensitive skin and reduce redness. It also helps to diffuse existing melanin in the skin and inhibits the production of melanin, which fades existing dark spots and prevents the formation of new ones. • Tranexamic Acid & Alpha Arbutin: Tranexamic Acid is definitely one of the well-deserving IT ingredients of 2021. It is a gentle yet powerful amino acid clinically proven to reduce hyperpigmentation. It works well with Alpha Arbutin, another ingredient that diminishes the look of dark spots, sun-spots, discolouration and post-acne marks. Together, they are the perfect team to boost overall brightness of skin, all while being very gentle on skin. Made in Taiwan HOW TO USE: After cleansing and toning, dispense 1-2 drops of Plumicious Brightening Serum and gently pat onto slightly damp face and neck until fully absorbed. Follow with moisturizer to seal everything in place. Apply daily, AM and PM. Keep in a cool, dry place, away from direct light. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Jan-2025 Rating & Reviews 0 /5 0 Ratings Love our product?
