Retail Price:     S$51.79  2 FOR $46.90 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Motherlove More Milk Special Blend suitable for: • Moms who didn't see an increase in breast size during pregnancy • Moms who delivered prematurely • Moms who plan to re-lactate or adoptive feed This formula blends the herbs in More Milk Plus with Goat's Rue, and was specially formulated at the request of lactation consultants. The herb goat’s rue has been known to support the development of mammary tissue and optimize the breast milk supply. This is a great option for mothers who did not see an increase in breast size during pregnancy or women who have had previous breast surgery or are looking to induce lactation. There are many causes for low milk supply and we recommend that you work with a lactation consultant to determine the root cause of any breast milk supply issues you may be experiencing. Motherlove supplements are concentrated liquid extracts that give you an easily absorbed boost in a convenient, small dose. BENEFITS: • Certified Organic Herbs • Liquid Capsules for Fast Absorption • Non-GMO • 100% Vegan (including capsules) • Gluten free, soy free, dairy free & sugar free. INGREDIENTS: Goat's Rue, Fenugreek, Blessed Thistle, Nettle Leaf & Fennel Seed Made in USA DOSAGE: Take 1 capsule 4 times per day. Women over 175 lbs take 2 capsules 3 times per day. May be taken with 1-2 oz. of liquid. Avoid additional liquids 15 minutes before and after each use. Not for use during pregnancy. Variation and Cancellation Policy You may not vary or cancel the order from the time you submit your order. If the initial Product/s you ordered is unavailable, we will write to you by email to seek your consent to substitute a Product/s for another similar Product/s. If there is no prior consent from the Customer for a substitution, no substitution shall be made. Delivery Policy Shipping in Singapore For the moment, we deliver to any location on mainland Singapore with the following exceptions:   Restricted and high security locations such as military bases, remand prisons, etc. Offshore locations such as Jurong Island, Sentosa, etc. P O Box addresses Delivery Charges – the applicable charges are published on our site which you can review prior to submitting your order. Delivery Period – an automated email will be sent to notify you of when you can expect your order. Deliveries are made anytime between 9am-10pm, and will commence upon pick-up of items from Glovida’s warehouse, by our logistics partner Ninja Van. Tracking Orders – A tracking number will be provided for you to track your orders. International Shipping (Only for Bulk Orders) For the moment, we do not ship outside of mainland Singapore. If your Delivery Address is overseas and you wish to make bulk orders, please write to us at enquiries@glovida.com. If we agree to ship internationally, our International Delivery Policy applies. International Delivery Policy GLOVIDA takes the packing, tracking and safe delivery of international orders very seriously. With these safeguards in place, we stimulate the following terms and conditions for all international deliveries: GLOVIDA will take no responsibility for damaged items or items claimed to be missing. GLOVIDA is unable to ship any liquid or aerosol items internationally. Based on the above 3 conditions, GLOVIDA will not refund nor compensate any international orders where such claims are made. If any Product which was not included in the Customer's order is delivered to the Customer, GLOVIDA shall collect the Product from the Customer. If the Customer has been charged for a Product which has not been delivered, GLOVIDA shall refund or credit the Customer the value of the Product as originally charged to the Customer. If the Customer is charged more than the value of a Product, GLOVIDA shall refund or credit to the Customer the difference. All refunds will be made via the same mode of payment on which the original purchase was made within 7 working days. All replacements of Products shall be effected in the shortest time possible.    ADD TO CART Product Details Description  Zyrtec-R is an antihistamine. It blocks the effects of a substance called histamine which occurs naturally in the body. Histamine is involved in allergic reactions. Zyrtec-R gives fast and 24 hour relief of cold and allergy symptoms such as runny, itchy nose, sneezing, watery & itchy eyes, and itchy skin rash. *Disclaimer: Results may vary based on individual. BENEFITS: • Works in 60 mins• Mini size tablet• Fast and 24 hour relief of cold and allergy symptoms• For children 6 years and above Made in Switzerland DOSAGE: Children aged from 6-12 years old: Half a tablet twice daily. Adults and Children aged 12 years and older: One tablet once daily.Do not take more than one 10mg tablet in 24 hours. EXPIRY DATE: 25-Aug-2027 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 4 Ratings Love our product? Price:     S$68.00  2 FOR $39.80 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description A favourite brand within the aesthetic and sun protection community, Heliocare is developed with Fernblock® Technology, a technology that provides a powerful, overall photoprotection. Backed by over 40 scientific journals and endorsements from leading sun protection experts, Heliocare offers a wide-range of defense against environmental pollutants. Recognised for its innovations, Heliocare is not only a clear winner among customers, it’s also a favourite brand among  aesthetic doctors who swear by its effectiveness. Every product from this line, the topical and oral photoprotectors, contains strengthening properties that are suitable for sensitive skin.  Heliocare 360º Gel Oil Free SPF 50 is locked with the power of Fernblock FC technology that actively repairs the effects of sun damage, DNA damage and premature ageing. It's the brand's best sunscreen which can also act as a complementary day cream that goes well as make-up base. The gel offers an intensive photo-protection, which is perfect for a number of sensitive skin types. This formulation boasts an active antioxidant property that targets the cause of skin damage. With an ultra-light texture, that provides a dry-touch finish, it also contains mattifying actives that help regulate sebum production and reduce excess shine. All in all, this daily sunscreen protects the skin from solar radiation while instantly neutralizing excess shine, lending the skin a smooth and mattified finish. This oil-free SPF 50 formulation is free from harmful chemicals like paraben and alcohol and is loaded with advanced filter and Bioshield System that boosts sun protection. It is particularly suitable for normal, combination and oily skin types. BENEFITS: • Leaves skin soft and smooth perfect for people living in humid climates • Protects against oily skin • Repairs sun damage • Reverses the effects of premature skin ageing • Defends the skin from harmful bacteria with the antibacterial, antimicrobial properties • Defends against oil and the formation of acne Made in Spain DIRECTIONS: Apply in the morning to complete your skincare regime. Gently massage until absorbed. Reapply every 2-3 hours during periods of high sun exposure. EXPIRY DATE: 30-Nov-2025 Rating & Reviews 4.5 /5 12 Ratings Love our product?     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Top 7 Beauty Brands You Have to Know in 2019 Hello 2019! Forget unattainable New Year Resolutions and get to know these top 7 beauty brands that will bring a new radiance and healthy glow to your skin. Cos with the right products, you can look and feel beautiful every single day! 1.HELIOCARE An award-winning brand, backed by over 40 research studies, and collaborations with Harvard Medical School, Heliocare is the all-time favourite among dermatologists and aesthetics doctors. The key ingredient, Fernblock© is an excellent anti-oxidant to reduce free radicals, and protect the skin against sun damage. Heliocare Ultra Oral Sunscreen in a capsule Protection from UV rays Reduce free radicals Increase resistance to sunburn Heliocare Purewhite Radiance Max 240 Additional Fernblock dose + white tech complex Reduce pigmentation Prevent melanin production Promotes skin radiance VIVISCAL Awarded the Best Hair Oral Supplement in 2017 by Singapore Women’s Weekly, and a cult favorite amongst Hollywood celebrities, Viviscal Professional Hair Growth Supplement helps maintain the health of hair and promote hair growth. With over 25 years of research and development, Viviscal is formulated with Biotin and a proprietary marine protein complex – AminoMarC™; to help maintain normal healthy hair growth from within. CERAMIRACLE Ceramiracle is an award-winning brand that specializes in innovative, ageless skincare solution. Based in Santa Monica, California, Ceramiracle has a complete range of topical skincare products as well as supplements to provide support for healthy, beautiful skin. Ceramiracle First Light The Serum is a concentrated serum that mimics the thick, white, waxy-like substance that coats a baby’s skin. This skin-nurturing formula helps stimulate the regeneration of baby soft skin, using key ingredients such as squalene and ceramides to protect and moisturize. Ceramiracle Flowerberry Eye Illuminating Supplement is a revolutionary formula created to tackle pesky dark circles and dull, tired eyes. Each capsule contains a dose of proprietary botanical complex that targets the dreaded “panda eyes”; using the perfect balance of chrysthemum flowers, wolfberry, kale powder and schisandra berry. It also contains lutein which helps filter and protect our eyes from damaging blue light emitted by digital devices. GLOWFULLY Specially formulated for sensitive skin. Glowfully’s Charcoal Beads Gel Cleanser acts like a magnet set to unclog the pores and draw out pollutants and impurities, gently detoxifies the skin without stripping it of its natural moisture. There is also a tinge of Geranium essential oil, so you get a mini spa experience with every wash! UTENA Japan’s leading beauty brand that has been around for 100 years! The Utena Premium Puresa Golden Jelly masks came out tops in a blind test of over 40 facial masks and these are the best sellers - Hyaluronic Acid, Royal Jelly, Collagen and Rose!  AUOLIVE The true multi-functional skincare for modern busy women. Dermatologically and clinically tested, Auolive is a Swiss-formulated, Singapore brand powered by natural ingredients; designed to deliver a multitude of benefits. The Day Glower is a lightweight, non-greasy antioxidant day moisturiser which protects the skin from premature ageing and damage. Enriched with a luxurious blend of natural active ingredients like Ginkgo Bilbao Leaf Extract and Squalene, the skin receives the moisture and nourishment it needs to stay soft, supple and healthy. A formulation packed with more than 80% of pure concentrated Marine collagen, this Night Booster is completed with a natural emollient to penetrate into the skin readily like a serum for deep nourishment. A unique self-remodelling feature creates an elastic and tightening veil, filling up the skin’s surface lines and promoting a lifted and more defined facial contour. Try Auolive's Night Glower today! AVEDA The Aveda Invati™ Advance 3-step system is an innovative system that helps reduce hair loss and thickens hair when used daily. Featuring an invigorating blend of Ayurvedic herbs, to keep existing hair longer, and Ginseng and certified organic tumeric combined with a patented bio-fermented blend to invigorate the scalp when massaged, while certified organic amla instantly helps thicken the hair. The 3 steps consist of Invati Shampoo, Invati Conditioner and Invati Scalp Revitaliser.  Excited about these brands? Our finest bunch is guaranteed to help you see great results in no time! Help yourself to some of our best picks and achieve an ever-lasting, youthful glow this year! soothe dry skin. With a luxuriously light formulation, the fragrance-free QV lotion hydrates for up to 24hrs. It’s easy to apply to all parts of the body. For best results, apply after showering or bathing. Safe for use of the whole family, especially infants and the elderly. BENEFITS: • Helps seal in natural moisture by acting as a protective barrier. • Suitable for use with eczema, dermatitis and psoriasis. • Suitable for sensitive skin and flaking or itchiness due to dry skin conditions. • pH balanced, low-irritant formulation, free from fragrance, colour, lanolin and propylene glycol. • Vegan Friendly - contains no animal derived ingredients. • Particularly suitable for infants and the elderly. Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: Apply to affected areas as often as required, particularly after showering, bathing, shaving, exposure to harsh climatic conditions and at night.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy The Top 5 Probiotic Brands Parents are Buying and Why? Why is everyone talking about probiotics and what does it do for your body? Scientific evidence has shown a strong correlation between probiotics and the gut health of young children. Probiotics play a crucial role in regulating one’s digestion and intestinal function. We’ve gathered some valuable insights from parents and trusted pharmacists to create a guide on what probiotics are, their benefits for your child and the top 5 brands that are popular among parents: WHAT ARE PROBIOTICS? There are some bacteria that reside in our gut which help carry out many of our gut functions and these are what we call “probiotics”. You can think of them as “good bacteria” that’s helping you maintain good balance in your body! 3 WAYS PROBIOTICS ARE HELPFUL TO YOUR CHILD’S HEALTH Probiotics have a lot of benefits to the health of your child. Let us look at 3 major benefits of probiotics: Probiotics help balance the good bacteria in your child’s digestive system Probiotics can boost your child’s immune system It may reduce the severity of certain allergies and eczema PROBIOTICS IS SUITABLE FOR: Preventing and treating diarrhoea/ constipation Traveling: Prevent travellers’ diarrhoea (prophylaxis) Children who don't take enough fibre Antibiotic-associated diarrhoea Taking antibiotics can cause gut imbalance, which can lead to diarrhoea, especially in children. Numerous studies have shown that taking probiotics at the same time as antibiotics can reduce the risk of diarrhoea by more than 50%. However, it is important to take antibiotics and probiotics a few hours apart, to prevent the probiotics from being killed by antibiotics if taken together. Probiotics can also be taken after a course of antibiotics to restore some of the healthy bacteria in the intestines. THE TOP 5 PROBIOTIC BRANDS PARENTS ARE BUYING We recommend parents to only buy probiotics from reputable stores. Also, obvious as it may seem, do review storage requirements of the probiotics brand, and to always remember to check the expiry dates before purchase. Excess heat can degrade the viability of probiotics. Over here at Glovida, we store all our products in 24-hour airconditioned warehouse environment. This helps to ensure the best quality control for all your probiotics. Here are the top 5 probiotics brands that parents are buying: BIOGAIA Probiotics is one of the best probiotic chewable tablets that contains Lactobacilus reuteri Protectis, a natural Lactobacillus that helps in restoring the natural balance of friendly bacteria in your gut. It also comes in drops form which is suitable for infants. LACTOGG’s Probiotics is the world’s most researched and scientifically proven probiotic that has achieved the gold standard status among the doctors. LactoGG's probiotic strain is Lactobacillus rhamnosus strain GG. It has over 44 health benefits that include strengthening the immune system, relief from symptoms of acute diarrhoea and side effects of antibiotics. It is available in both sachet and capsule forms. LACTOKIDS+ is a probiotic designed from natural ingredients such as vitamins B1, B2, B5, B6, B9, and D3, added Colostrum, Calcium and Prebiotics after extensive scientific research that promotes stronger digestive health and enhances the growth of a child. It contains a unique patented combination of Lactobacillus acidophilus, Bifidobacterium longum, Streptococcus faecalis, Lactobacillus plantarum and Lactobacillus rhamnosus. NATURE’S WAY KIDS PROBIOTIC CHOCOLATE BALLS is the fun, delicious and easy way to boost your child's probiotic intake. Each ball has 1 billion good bacteria - Lactobacillus Acidophilus & Bifidobacterium Lactis – plus inulin, a prebiotic to further enhance digestive balance. VIVOMIXX Probiotics - a high potency probiotic food supplement that is made up of 8 strains of live lactic acid bacteria and bifidobacteria that help restore the balance of the intestinal ﬂora. It contains the De Simone Formulation, one of the most widely studied probiotics worldwide. TAKEAWAY: WE CAN ALL DO WITH MORE “GOOD BACTERIA”! All in all, probiotics are great supplements to health. Purchase probiotics today for the kids and everyone in the family. Take them as part of your daily supplement and remember to include them in your packing list for family vacations.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Top 7 Brands for Eczema and Sensitive Skin Eczema can be a stressful (and sometimes embarrassing!) condition to manage. Imagine having to deal with an uncontrollable itch in the middle of an important meeting, having uninvited stares on the visible red, rough patches, or scars (from scratching the itch!) on your body; and sometimes, losing sleep as the itch gets so bad in the middle of the night that it causes you much discomfort; all these can be terribly stressful and that doesn’t help with the eczema situation at all! We’ve had many customers reach out to us for issues on eczema and sensitive skin for themselves and their children. So here, we’ve put together a list of the recommended brands by our in-house pharmacist to help alleviate the skin’s sensitivity and eczema-related discomfort effectively: 1. Ceradan Ceradan is a brand highly recommended by many dermatologists. Perfectly formulated to treat eczema-prone skin, Ceradan Skin Barrier Repair Cream strengthens the skin's protective barrier by replenishing the ceramide often lacking in dry, sensitive skin. On the other hand, Ceradan Hydra Cream prolongs the flare-free period effectively by hydrating your skin to the fullest to soothe the itch of eczema. These products can be used without any restrictions on any skin surfaces and are suitable even for newborns! 2. ISODERM A top favorite among skin specialists, Isoderm Liquid Soap-Free Cleanser has restorative properties that leave one’s skin soft and supple. This moisturizing cleanser regulates your skin’s acidic protective barrier to an optimal level that prevents skin irritation. Apart from shielding your skin against environmental irritants and bacterial infections, it also gives your skin long-lasting hydration! With its hypoallergenic and non-alkaline properties, Isoderm Baby Liquid Cleanser is a perfect option for babies and young kids, too. 3. SUU BALM Developed at the National Skin Centre in Singapore, Suu Balm Soothing Moisturizer provides the perfect care for tender eczema prone skin. Formulated to complement our country’s humid climate, it’s a light, non-sticky moisturizer that contains menthol - an ingredient that cools the skin. Coupled with the powerful moisture-retaining capacity of ceramides, it helps to provide rapid relief from itch. Suu Balm Kids Head To Toe Wash is also ideal for gentle cleansing on sensitive, dry skin. It leaves skin feeling soothed, moisturised, and refreshed after a shower! The absence of parabens, preservatives, and artificial fragrances make these products suitable for all skin types. 4. GLOVES IN A BOTTLE Gloves in a Bottle Shielding Lotion seeks to revolutionise and surpass normal lotions by locking-in the skin’s natural oil and moisture balance. Specifically formulated for skin conditions like dry skin, sensitive skin and eczema, the “invisible gloves” or protective barriers strengthen the outer layer of the skin cells to safeguard it from moisture-sucking irritants or triggers from the environment. 5. Y-NOT NATURAL A winner of Beauty Insider’s Best Organic/Natural Products for 2018, the Y-Not Natural Australian Emu Oil is an all-natural, non-toxic, and hypo-allergenic penetrating oil that reduces the inflammation caused by eczema. Pure emu oil has been long proven to protect skin from harsh elements. It includes anti-bacterial, anti-inflammatory, pain relief and anti-oxidant (anti ageing) properties that are beneficial for the skin. It can also penetrate and moisturize deeper than any other oils in the market today as it is able to mirror our skin's natural lipids! Priding itself as being the most-used natural therapy oil, it has a skin cell regenerator agent that keeps the skin from scarring and heals it after blowbacks from skin treatments. It’s definitely a must-have product that improves eczema, promote healing of wounds, cuts and burns effectively! 6. VASSE VIRGIN Vasse Virgin, an Australian brand, was established to produce high quality natural skincare products that target dry-skin conditions like eczema. To rejuvenate and maintain healthy skin, virgin olive oil is a key ingredient that can be found in all of its products. Not only does the oil intensely hydrates your skin, it also aids in skin repair and renewal. The brand's Chamomile & Lavender Olive Body Lotion serves as a nourishing lotion that is perfect for stressed or dry skin. The extra virgin olive oil plus the calming properties of lavender scent leaves your skin hydrated and refreshed with every application. Perfect for sensitive skin types, Vasse Virgin Kids Soothing Balm soothes dry, irritated skin, and aids in the calming of bites, stings, or stressed skin. 7. SUKIN Sukin Botanical Body Wash contains the skin-softening properties of jojoba and avocado that hydrate and purify even the most sensitive skin types. Not only is this product free from sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS), it is also backed by the aromatic properties of rose hip, tangerine, mandarin, lavender oils, and vanilla extract to keep your skin nourished and moisturised from day to night. Apart from these products above, brands like Cetaphil, Ego QV, and Physiogel are also perennial-favourites. Glovida has the full range of these amazing products and many more. capsule to support women’s urogenital health. This capsule has Lactobacillus reuteri, which is not only used to restore normal vaginal flora, but to improve digestion as well. Apart from boosting urogenital health,  Lactobacillus reuteri also helps treat several problems, including the occurrence of vaginal yeast infection and urinary tract infection (UTI). BENEFITS: • Effectively promotes a balanced vaginal flora • Improves digestion • Promotes & maintains urinary tract health • Protects against occurrence of vaginal yeast infected • Stops the spread of viruses that cause UTI • Free of common allergens • Suitable for vegetarians and vegans • Halal certified Made In Denmark DIRECTIONS: Take 1 capsule a day for 4 weeks, preferably after meals.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy All Brands 〉   Heliocare Purewhite Radiance Max 240 60's   Heliocare Purewhite Radiance Max 240 60's (23) Brand: Heliocare S$80.00     vs. Retail Price:     S$150.00  2 FOR $79.80 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Heliocare is an award-winning European brand celebrated for its distinctive and innovative sun protection capabilities. Powered by its patented Fernblock® Technology, this eminent leader in photoprotection traces its success to numerous collaborations with the prestigious Harvard Medical School, as well as partnerships with and endorsements from a number of leading sun protection experts. Heliocare offers a line of topical and oral photoprotectors that shields users from a range of harmful rays and halts the development of hyperpigmentation. This brand is a true winner among aesthetic doctors; a true antidote that strengthens overly sensitive skin. A vegetable-based capsule, bolstered with additional dose of Fernblock, Heliocare Purewhite Radiance Max 240 gives an extra boost to achieve a more radiant and fairer skin, and enhanced UV protection to prevent hyperpigmentation. Fernblock has excellent antioxidant property that is able to reduce free radicals by up to 50%, preventing the formation of hyperpigmentation caused by UV rays. It protects the entire skin surface, increasing the skin’s resistance against sunburn and redness by up to 300%. The protection from Fernblock also slows down skin aging by up to 55% through the inhibition of collagen depletion caused by UVA. Furthermore, Heliocare Purewhite Radiance Max 240 is enhanced with the exclusive blend of White Tech Complex where it controls and blocks the main enzyme that is responsible for melanin production. The blend in White Tech Complex consists of Pomegranate extract, L-Cysteine, vitamin C and B3, all clinically proven to promote skin fairness and radiance. BENEFITS: • Accelerates skin's whitening • Reduces skin's redness • Protects against hyperpigmentation • Repairs cellular damage which prevents premature skin ageing • Defends against an array of harmful rays Made in Spain DOSAGE: Take 2 capsules daily. 1 in the morning and 1 in the evening.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Health 〉   GC Tooth Mousse Tutti-Frutti 40g   GC Tooth Mousse Tutti-Frutti 40g (1) Brand: GC Tooth Mousse S$33.00     vs. Retail Price:     S$45.00  3 FOR $30.50 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description GC Tooth Mousse is used to provide extra protection for teeth, to help neutralise acid challenges from acidogenic bacteria in plaque and other internal and external acid sources. GC Tooth Mousse is a delicious tasting, water based, sugar free crème that is beneficial for teeth. It contains calcium and phosphate; the major minerals teeth are made from. Because calcium and phosphate are carried in a special milk-derived protein called Recaldent (CPP-ACP), they are available in a soluble form. This means GC Tooth Mousse provides extra protection for teeth, buffers dental plaque acid from bacteria in the mouth and also protects teeth from acidic foods and drinks. GC Tooth Mousse, the first product for professional use to contain this complex of CPP-ACP (Recaldent), is the ideal delivery system for bio-available calcium and phosphate ions. Tooth Mousse is not toothpaste. It is made of milk products so swallowing the product is safe and it can be used throughout the day. However, because Tooth Mousse is derived from milk protein (casein) it is not suitable for people who have a suspected or proven allergy to milk proteins. Natural defence against caries with for people who: • have a low to medium risk of caries • suffer from white spot lesions • experience hypersensitivity before and after teeth whitening • have had professional procedures such as root scaling or cleaning • for children below the age of six BENEFITS: • It contains CPP-ACP a revolutionary new ingredient that helps to repair and restore tooth enamel. • Tooth Mousse provides relief for sensitive teeth. • Regular use will help protect teeth from decay and make them stronger. • It is sugar and lactose free. • Helps prevent white spots during and after orthodontic brackets. FLAVOUR: Tutti-Frutti Made in USA INSTRUCTIONS: 1) Apply to teeth using a clean finger, or cotton tip swab or custom bleaching tray. 2) Leave the Tooth Mousse undisturbed for three minutes in the first instance. 3) Then spread the Tooth Mousse around the mouth with the tongue and hold for a further one or two minutes. 4) Do not to eat or drink for 30 minutes following application. Made in Germany DIRECTIONS: Rinse skin with water, lather Isoderm Liquid Cleanser and apply to face and body, then rinse. Use twice daily. S$55.00     vs. Retail Price:     S$69.35  3 FOR $50.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description  LactoGG is one of the world's most scientifically-backed probiotic supplement. Boasting over 44 proven health benefits verified by extensive research, it contains the power of the probiotic strain Lactobacillus rhamnosus strain also known as "Lactobacillus GG", and is packed with a minimum of 20 billion CFU per capsule. Widely studied and scientifically proven, each capsule of LactoGG Probiotic provides a relief for a variety of symptoms. It boosts the immune system and has active ingredients that provide relief from constipation. The capsules halt the risk of infections and also provide bio-therapeutic benefits that make it a perfect long-term health supplement for gut health. LactoGG is completely vegetarian. It does not contain any gluten, soya, pork, beef or artificial ingredients. BENEFITS: • Effectively improves and balances gut health• Has bio-therapeutic benefits that defend against the spread of bacterial infections• Provides strong and fast relief from acute diarrhoea and constipation• Suitable for adults and children• All ingredients are natural Made in USA DIRECTIONS: Adults: 1 capsule daily. Babies and children: take ½ or 1 capsule daily. LactoGG capsules are designed to be taken apart. You can pull the 2 halves of the vegetable capsule apart and pour out the powdered contents. Mix the powdered contents with your baby's food, milk or water and let your baby consume it. The water, drinks, milk or food should be at room temperature and not be hot, to ensure the probiotic bacteria remain alive. EXPIRY DATE: 13-Mar-2026 CARE & STORAGE: LactoGG capsules' double-aluminum nitrogen-flushed blister is specially designed for the climatic conditions of Asia. LactoGG is a very stable probiotic strain. It has stability studies confirming that it can survive in ambient room temperature. It does not need to be transported or kept in ice.If it is kept in room temperature the bacteria can survive for at least 24 months! Avoid direct exposure to sunlight. Although it is not necessary, LactoGG won't spoil if you wish to keep it in the refrigerator too. We do not accept exchanges or returns after products are delivered. If you have any questions about the ideal use of this probiotic, its effects or anything else, feel free to fill in an online enquiry form. Our representatives will be happy to help.   Rating & Reviews 4.5 /5 20 Ratings Love our product? Brand: Thankyou S$12.90     vs. Retail Price:     S$12.90  3 FOR $12.50 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description MOISTURISING - Made for skin that needs extra TLC. This wash combines moisturising goat's milk with the uplifting scent of lemon myrtle to refresh and nourish. Thankyou Hand Wash in Botanical Lemon Myrtle & Goat's Milk is an extra-gentle, moisturising hand wash, made with naturally-derived ingredients, that is especially designed for sensitive skin. Containing soothing Goat's Milk and uplifting Lemon Myrtle Oil blended with Aloe Vera Juice, Chamomile Extract and Clary Sage Oil, this skin-loving hand wash is naturally antibacterial and leaves your skin feeling hydrated and soft. • No SLS, SLES, EDTA, Parabens, propylene glycol, harsh petrochemicals, triethanolamine, harsh detergents, mineral oils, artificial colours • Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: Massage a coin-sized amount of life-changing hand wash over skin to create a lather. Rinse well with water after use. For external use only. EXPIRY DATE: All our products have a minimum shelf life of 12 months, unless stated otherwise.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Health 〉   Motherlove More Milk Special Blend Capsules 120's   Motherlove More Milk Special Blend Capsules 120's (2) Brand: Motherlove S$85.00     vs. Retail Price:     S$90.95  2 FOR $82.45 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Motherlove More Milk Special Blend suitable for: • Moms who didn't see an increase in breast size during pregnancy • Moms who delivered prematurely • Moms who plan to re-lactate or adoptive feed This formula blends the herbs in More Milk Plus with Goat's Rue, and was specially formulated at the request of lactation consultants. The herb goat’s rue has been known to support the development of mammary tissue and optimize the breast milk supply. This is a great option for mothers who did not see an increase in breast size during pregnancy or women who have had previous breast surgery or are looking to induce lactation. There are many causes for low milk supply and we recommend that you work with a lactation consultant to determine the root cause of any breast milk supply issues you may be experiencing. Motherlove supplements are concentrated liquid extracts that give you an easily absorbed boost in a convenient, small dose. BENEFITS: • Certified Organic Herbs • Liquid Capsules for Fast Absorption • Non-GMO • 100% Vegan (including capsules) • Gluten free, soy free, dairy free & sugar free. INGREDIENTS: Goat's Rue, Fenugreek, Blessed Thistle, Nettle Leaf & Fennel Seed Made in USA DOSAGE: Take 1 capsule 4 times per day. Women over 175 lbs take 2 capsules 3 times per day. May be taken with 1-2 oz. of liquid. Avoid additional liquids 15 minutes before and after each use. Not for use during pregnancy. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Mar-2026 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 2 Ratings Love our product?     vs. Retail Price:     S$45.90  2 FOR $42.50 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description  Ocean Health Bicold Immune Support for Kids is a specially formulated great tasting Elderberry syrup which contains a synergistic blend of three key active ingredients: Wellmune (Baker’s Yeast Beta Glucan), Elderberry and Zinc. It provides optimum immune system support for your child and maintains good health. Having a healthy immune system helps to provide resistance to common cold and flu. BENEFITS: • Elderberry: Traditionally used to help relieve symptoms of cold & flu• Wellmune (Baker's Yeast Beta Glucan): Supports healthy immune system, clinically proven to reduce upper respiratory tract infection• Zinc (Zinc Oxide): Speeds up recovery while reducing the intensity of cold symptoms Made in Itally DIRECTIONS: 1 – 2 years old: 5ml daily2 years and above: 5 – 10ml daily or as prescribed by your doctor.Shake well before use. STORAGE: Store at temperature below 25°C; avoid exposure to localised heat sources, sunlight and contact with water.Use within one month after opening. S$18.40  3 FOR $16.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Hylo-Comod Lubricating Eye Drops is indicated to improve the lubrication of the eye surface in eyes that are dry, burning or have foreign body sensations due to environmental conditions as well as after ophthalmosurgical interventions. Hylo-Comod contains the sodium salt of hyaluronic acid, a natural substance that is found in the eye but also in other parts of the body. Due to its special physical property, it forms a regular, stable. long lasting lubricating moisture film on the ocular surface that is not easily rinsed off. It does, however, not cause blurred vision and protects the eyes from dryness and irritation for a long time. This is particularly important if the user wears contact lenses, because the contact lens needs to swim in sufficient tear fluid in order not to cause any discomfort. Hylo-Comod may be used while wearing contact lenses. Wearing soft or hard contact lenses will be made more comfortable by using Hylo-Comod as it does not form crusts or deposits. As Hylo-Comod is preservative-free, it is usually very well-tolerated. Additionally, Hylo-Comod is free of phosphates so that complications like deposits in the cornea are avoided. Hylo-Comod has a 6 MONTHS Shelf Life upon opening. Each bottle of 10ml is sufficient for about 300 drops. Made in Germany DIRECTIONS: Hylo-Comod should be used according to the instructions given by doctor or contact lens specialist. Generally, instill 1 drop of Hylo-Comod 3 times a day into each eye. If necessary, it can also be used more frequently. EXPIRY DATE: 30-Nov-2024 Rating & Reviews 0 /5 0 Ratings Love our product? $14.20 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Flo Baby Saline Nasal Spray helps clear a baby‘s runny or blocked nose quickly, gently and easily. Flo Baby Saline offers advanced technology to deliver a sterile, preservative-free, non-medicated, non-sting nasal saline for babies and toddlers. Suitable for daily use. Using Flo Baby can help relieve a baby’s nasal symptoms due to COLDS and ALLERGIES because it can: • Wash away mucus including excessive mucus produced by colds, pollens, dust and other allergy-causing particles. • Help remove mucus plugs in the nose. • Moisturise nasal tissues. • Help prevent scabbing in the nose. Flo Baby has been designed with parents and carers in mind to! It is really easy and quick and only takes a few seconds to use – very useful when it comes to wriggly newborns and fidgety toddlers! Parents rate Flo Baby because it can be used at any angle repetitively (without the need for priming with each dose). Look for SPRAYS AT ANY ANGLE clearly marked on Flo Baby packaging. Baby sleep, feeding and settling tip: If your baby has a blocked, runny or snuffly nose, try Flo Baby 10 minutes BEFORE feeding, play and sleep time. This helps thin and clear mucus to enable easier breathing. Easier breathing means your baby may sleep and feed easier too! Made in Germany DIRECTIONS: 1) Position baby comfortably in their most comfortable position. 2) Position Flo Baby Saline applicator tip just below baby's nostril and insert the required dose into each nostril. 3) Wipe baby's nose with a soft clean tissue. DOSAGE: Newborn to 1 year: 1 spray per nostril. Over 12 months: 1-2 sprays per nostril. If congestion persists, please see your health care practitioner. It contains pure L-ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) that penetrates into the deepest layers of the skin. It provides superior anti-oxidant protection, shields the skin against UV damage and promotes healthier collagen production to help you achieve a brighter, healthier complexion. Looks like we ran out of this product. Do register to get notified once we've stocked up! Notify Me Product Details Description Moisturise your face with the soothing Glowfully H2O Jelly Mask 5’s! Each moisturising facial mask is packed with anti-oxidising ingredients that keeps the skin hydrated and protected from free radical damage. These ultra-moisturising jelly masks has the proprietary blends of Aloe Vera, Acerola Cherry, and Carrageenan. It also boosts collagen production to keep skin looking soft, younger, and fresher. What’s more, you could also bathe with this mask! Just take a used mask and melt it on a warm bath or water at about 60 degC and give your whole body a nice, overall pampering! BENEFITS: • Packed with rich proprietary blends of natural ingredients to keep skin moisturized and hydrated. • Boosts collagen production to give you younger-looking skin. • Leaves your face feeling smooth and supple after every use. Made in Taiwan HOW TO USE: 1) Use on cleansed face. 2) Open the sachet, take out the mask and carefully unfold. 3) Remove and discard the protective outer layers. 4) Gently smooth the mask over the entire face, eliminating any folds or air pockets. 5) Leave on for 15-20 minutes before removing the mask. 5) Gently pat any remaining serum into the skin. 6) No rinsing necessary. $24.50 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Ego QV Baby Gentle Wash is a moisturising soap-free wash, suitable for daily use for hair and body on delicate or sensitive skin. The paediatrician-recommended wash is formulated with Vitamin B3 to help support a healthy skin barrier and natural protective properties. The low-irritant formula can be used with conditions such as baby eczema, dermatitis and psoriasis, dry scalp and cradle cap. BENEFITS: • Formulated with Vitamin B3 to help support a healthy skin barrier and natural protective properties. • Soap-free, so it doesn’t strip away natural oils like soap can. • pH balanced, low-irritant formulation, free from colour, fragrance, propylene glycol, and lanolin. • Suitable for use every day for hair and body. • Suitable for sensitive skin, dry scalp and cradle cap. Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: Apply desired amount of QV Baby Gentle Wash to wet skin and lightly massage. Wash, rinse and gently pat skin dry. S$55.00     vs. Retail Price:     S$69.35  3 FOR $50.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description  LactoGG is one of the world's most scientifically-backed probiotic supplement. Boasting over 44 proven health benefits verified by extensive research, it contains the power of the probiotic strain Lactobacillus rhamnosus strain also known as "Lactobacillus GG", and is packed with a minimum of 20 billion CFU per capsule. Widely studied and scientifically proven, each capsule of LactoGG Probiotic provides a relief for a variety of symptoms. It boosts the immune system and has active ingredients that provide relief from constipation. The capsules halt the risk of infections and also provide bio-therapeutic benefits that make it a perfect long-term health supplement for gut health. LactoGG is completely vegetarian. It does not contain any gluten, soya, pork, beef or artificial ingredients. BENEFITS: • Effectively improves and balances gut health• Has bio-therapeutic benefits that defend against the spread of bacterial infections• Provides strong and fast relief from acute diarrhoea and constipation• Suitable for adults and children• All ingredients are natural Made in USA DIRECTIONS: Adults: 1 capsule daily. Babies and children: take ½ or 1 capsule daily. LactoGG capsules are designed to be taken apart. You can pull the 2 halves of the vegetable capsule apart and pour out the powdered contents. Mix the powdered contents with your baby's food, milk or water and let your baby consume it. The water, drinks, milk or food should be at room temperature and not be hot, to ensure the probiotic bacteria remain alive. EXPIRY DATE: 13-Mar-2026 CARE & STORAGE: LactoGG capsules' double-aluminum nitrogen-flushed blister is specially designed for the climatic conditions of Asia. LactoGG is a very stable probiotic strain. It has stability studies confirming that it can survive in ambient room temperature. It does not need to be transported or kept in ice.If it is kept in room temperature the bacteria can survive for at least 24 months! Avoid direct exposure to sunlight. Although it is not necessary, LactoGG won't spoil if you wish to keep it in the refrigerator too. We do not accept exchanges or returns after products are delivered. If you have any questions about the ideal use of this probiotic, its effects or anything else, feel free to fill in an online enquiry form. Our representatives will be happy to help.   Rating & Reviews 4.5 /5 20 Ratings Love our product? Got it for my baby for eczema (recommended by pd) and hopes in long run, it will improves his condition. Fiona 2017-11-09 Thumbs up! Good product especially in helping bowel movements for my toddler! Louisa 2017-08-20 Pricier than other probiotics This product is generally pricier than other probiotics I've tried. But it's like this across other places, and Glovida happens to sell them cheaper than pharmacies. I don't know if this probiotic is the best for me, but so far based on what I have tried, this one seems to work well for me, and I have noticed less occurrences of gastric pains when on this. The downside is that this probiotic needs to be refrigerated, so I tend to forget to take it as regularly as I hope to. I still hope price for this will go down across the board! Jan 2017-08-17 Excellent Product, Price & Personal Service! I have ordered this product from Glovida twice, because of its excellent service. The staff is kind and extremely efficient. The product is a must-have for young kids and prevents most stomach discomforts. The price is good especially when there are promotions such as Mother's Day or Anniversary Promotions! Highly recommended! Rosalind 2017-08-16 Happy with it Fast delivery. Maybe can put expire date on the website. Rosalind 2017-08-16 Happy with it Fast delivery.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Best Hair Products that Keep Bad Hair Day at Bay Bad. Hair. Day. Sure, we know there could be worse things in life. But waking up with a head full of crazy fly-aways, frizzy hair, uncontrollable or downright limp hair could set you up for a cranky and irritable day. Thank goodness for quality hair products that can help us set things straight (or curly, if you prefer!). Our hair is made up of 3 layers - medulla (the inner layer), cortex (the middle layer) and cuticle (the outer layer). To make your hair healthier and shiner, it’s essential to nourish your hair both inside and out with the best hair products. VIVISCAL Raved and loved by the hottest and most glamorous Hollywood stars – Miley Cyrus, Kate Hudson, Reese Witherspoon, Cate Blanchett, Gwyneth Paltrow and many more! Viviscal Professional Hair Nutritional Supplement is becoming a well-known solution to promote hair growth amongst many in the know! “I started taking Viviscal hair growth tablets, and I see a crazy difference," said Goop guru Gwyneth Paltrow. This 100% drug-free supplement is formulated with Biotin and AminoMarC™, a proprietary marine protein complex, that addresses the cause of thinning from within. Some have experienced noticeable growth and strengthening of their hair in under 6 months! AVEDA Recommended by the top hairstylists around the world, Aveda is a trusted, quality brand used on many celebrities as well for shoots and magazine features. Counting amongst them Kiera Knightley, Amanda Seyfried, Angelina Jolie, and the list goes on. Whether to cover up greys or to be at the fashion forefront with trendy-colored-manes; the gentle, plant-infused Aveda Color Conserve Shampoo can help maintain the vibrance of hair color and prevent it from fading so you can enjoy the hair color for longer! Used together with the Aveda Color Conserve Conditioner; it helps further extend the hair color and leave hair silky, smooth and healthy. Y-NOT NATURAL This is definitely something to take the stresses out of your tresses; especially for dry, brittle hair or scalp and seborrheic dermatitis. Y-Not Natural's Nourishing Shampoo & Moisture Repair Conditioner duo is an innovative and unique natural shampoo with emu oil; and formulated with rich essential oils, which include Peppermint, Ylang Ylang, and Rosemary to stimulate healthy growth, cleanse the scalp, and nourish root and follicle. It also helps to moisturise the scalp, soften the hair and prevent split-ends. This Superior Quality Emu Oil has been Awarded: Best Organic / Natural Products by SG Beauty Insider’s Choice Award 2018. OVELLE We need good quality hair oil to condition our hair, especially at the hair ends; to give it moisture and shine; and improve its texture. Ovelle’s Coconut Oil is clinically tested and proven to reverse the effects of hair damage and works well for all hair types. This hypoallergenic oil has pure Cocos Nucifera, or coconut oil, which is extracted and purified to strengthen hair. UTAMA SPICE You might have heard about argan oil and for good reason, too; often called “liquid gold” for its extensive moisturising and softening abilities. The argan oil concoction of Utama Spice contains large amounts of fatty acids and vitamin E which is known to promote hair growth and boost cell generation. Utama Spice Argan Oil is best used for dry or frizzy hair; and can also be used on the skin for a good overall hydration. BLACKMORES If you’re looking for something that addresses not only your hair needs, Blackmores’ Nails, Hair, & Skin got you all covered!Australia's most trusted brand for nutritional supplements, this product is a compound supplement that contains biotin, silica, zinc, vitamin C, folic acid, iron, manganese, beta-carotene, and vitamin B5. These core ingredients serve to strengthen your hair so that it’s safe against any potential hair loss and further damage! SWISSE Another compound supplement to look into is Swisse’s Hair, Skin, Nails+. For over 40 years, Swisse has been investing in products formulated with premium quality ingredients based on scientific research and traditional evidence. The premium formula in this product helps boost collagen production which results in healthier hair, stronger nails, and more supple skin! It contains Biotin which maintains healthy, strong locks and Vitamin C which supports the production of collagen, a great protector against oxidative stress that results in hair breakage! Invest in your hair health – this is one crown that you will never take off from your head. Start nourishing your hair with these top recommended hair care products for that luscious, healthy hair that will make you want to get out of bed to face the world. Looks like we ran out of this product. Do register to get notified once we've stocked up! Notify Me Product Details Description GAIA Natural Baby Shampoo is a mild, soap and sulphate free gel that is extremely gentle on little scalps as well as your baby's skin and eyes. This nourishing baby shampoo is pH neutral, low foaming and gently cleansing for the hair and the scalp without stripping your baby’s natural protective oils. It contains added moisturising properties to stop dry and flaky scalp, minimising the chance of cradle cap. Not only suitable for newborns, babies and toddlers but great for all the family as well and a little goes a long way so you don't need to use a lot to get beautiful, shiny hair. Ideal for everyday use. GAIA Natural Baby Shampoo is enriched with: • Certified organic sweet orange, naturally antibacterial to gently cleanse • Certified organic evening primrose oil to soften and condition baby's scalp and hair • Certified organic chamomile to brighten and bring out the natural highlights BENEFITS: • Extremely mild and gentle even on eyes • Moisturising and calming properties of chamomile and evening primrose oils • pH balanced • No soap, sulphates or harsh cleaning agents • No silicone or petrochemicals Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: Wet their heads a little using your hand, a small cup or a cloth, making sure water doesn’t trickle down the face. Take a pea-sized amount of GAIA Natural Baby Shampoo and gently lather it into their hair. Don’t rub vigorously! Use your hand, the cup or cloth to rinse out the shampoo carefully. Note*- It uses plant-based surfactants and therefore low foaming. EXPIRY DATE: 30-Nov-2025 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 1 Ratings Love our product? $17.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Nappy rash is the most common skin condition that can affect your little one during infancy. That's why QV have developed pediatrician recommended QV Baby Barrier Cream. The soothing, rich formula helps protect delicate skin against nappy rash. It is also suitable to help protect against infant facial rash, heat rash and irritation. It forms a barrier that shields baby’s skin from water, detergents, chemicals and other irritants. QV Baby Barrier Cream’s non-sticky, non-greasy, low-irritant formulation and moisturising base also helps to rehydrate skin and prevent moisture loss from baby’s soft bottom. Contains Zinc Oxide. BENEFITS: • Forms a barrier to shield baby’s skin from water, detergents, chemicals and other irritants. • Non-sticky, non-greasy protective cream. • Low irritant formulation. • pH balanced. • Suitable for the most sensitive areas of the body. • Vegan Friendly - contains no animal-derived ingredients. • Cream suitable for sensitive skin. Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: At nappy change, remove soiled nappy and clean area thoroughly. Apply QV Baby Barrier Cream to affected skin at every nappy change. Pay particular attention to ensure application to the folds of the baby's skin. Avoid eyes. If irritation occurs, wash affected area and discontinue use. Do not use soap as it may irritate.    S$74.00  SAVINGS: 12% OFF    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Pilose is a home care brand with the scientific prescription for scalp hair healthy consisting of the latest strengthening ingredient that is proven the effect based on the pharmacological theory. This product manages the complicated cause of hair loss by section based on world famous dermatology journal(SCI level) and clinical test. This product is most commonly used by Korea’s renowned university hospitals and dermatologists. In general, university hospitals or dermatologists do not use the product that its effect is not surely proven or a new theoretical base does not exist. The theory of Pilosehas been introduced in “"Hair Loss Prevention and Treatment Guide," written by 55 dermatologists selected as a best seller in 2010 and this product has been introduced as the most recommended item. Pilose Condensed Activating Serum is pharmacologically formulated hair cosmetic solution to help the treatment of thinning hair for men and women. It is formulated by powerful and effective ingredients that make your hair healthy, strong and lively. Pilose Condensed Activating Serum is a higher concentration of active ingredients and designed to provide extra nourishment. These ingredients are absorbed directly to your scalp, making your hair lively Made in Korea DIRECTIONS: Use more than 1-2 times every morning and/or evening, and apply on the scalp evenly and gently massage with your fingertips.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy High Fever in Children: When to Seek Emergency Medical Attention and When to Stay At Home 1. Introduction A high fever can be a concerning symptom for parents, especially when it comes to their children. It does not help if the high fever is also discovered at a time where all nearby medical clinics are closed. However, before you decide to seek emergency medical attention at the nearest hospital, it is important to evaluate if you need to make a trip to the A&E, or if your child can be self-treated at home first. In this article, we will discuss the symptoms to look for, over-the-counter remedies, and when to seek emergency medical attention for a child with a high fever. 2. Symptoms to Look For A fever is defined as a body temperature of 38°C or higher. By itself, it is usually not a cause for concern as it is the body's natural response against an infection. Children with high fever tend to be less energetic and more irritable. They may sleep more than usual to recover from the underlying illness. It is also normal for them to have a reduced appetite for solid food and to drink less. They may also experience shivers as their body temperature rises. It is important to note that a higher grade fever also does not mean that your child has a more severe illness. Similarly, a low-grade fever does not necessarily mean that the illness is minor. Hence, it is more important to monitor if the child is experiencing other symptoms that may indicate an underlying infection or other serious conditions that require prompt medical attention. Some of the warning signs that your child may need emergency medical attention include: Fever that reaches a temperature of 41.0°C (or 38.0°C for children less than 3 months old) Having difficulty breathing Having severe headache and/or neck stiffness or pain Having less than usual fluid intake and/or urine output Experiencing greater difficulty in awakening from sleep Interacting with you lesser than usual Feeling confused and disoriented Feeding poorly and vomiting Seizures or fits Developing new symptoms like abdominal pain or rash / purple spots If your child's fever is accompanied by any of the warning signs listed above, it may indicate a serious condition and you should seek emergency medical attention at a hospital's A&E department. If your child's condition is stable and they are not experiencing any of the warning signs, you can try to reduce the fever with over-the-counter medications and keep them hydrated, and see a doctor during clinic hours if the fever persists for more than 72 hours (or 24 hours for children less than 2 years old). When in doubt, parents or caregivers should contact the child's healthcare provider to get further advice on the available treatment options. 3.            Over-the-Counter Medications for your Child If your child's condition is stable and they are not experiencing any of the warning signs mentioned above, you can try to reduce the fever with over-the-counter medications such as paracetamol or ibuprofen. These medications can typically help to lower your child's body temperature by 1 - 2°C and relieve any discomfort they may be experiencing. Do note that you will also need to know exactly how much medication to give your baby/child, which may be based on his/her weight and not age. To be safe, parents should consult a doctor or pharmacist to check the correct dosage, especially if the child’s weight has significantly changed since the last visit to the doctor. For the first line of treatment, paracetamol can be used every 4 hours (if the temperature is above 38.5°C) to 6 hours (if the temperature is below 38.5°C). Do not use paracetamol in infants less than 3 months old. Ibuprofen can be given every 6 hours if the temperature is persistently above 38.5°C, 1 to 2 hours after giving paracetamol.  Do not use ibuprofen in infants less than 6 months old. For infants between 6 months and less than 1 year old, ibuprofen can be given every 8 hours. 4.            Other Measures to Consider It is also important to keep your child hydrated by offering plenty of fluids, such as water, ice pops, or clear fruit juices. You should also dress your child in light clothing to allow heat exchange and keep the room cool and well ventilated. Check the temperature of your child every 4 hours in the day to monitor the condition. It is not advisable to use ice/cold water to bring a high fever down as it may cause chills or shivering, further raising the baby’s temperature. Instead, use tap or lukewarm water and apply a cool compress to the forehead, nape of neck, armpits, neck and groin area, for no more than 30 minutes at one time. If your child starts to shiver, stop the sponging. 5.            Recommended Products To Bring Down The Fever Sambucol Black Elderberry Cold & Flu Relief Kids Liquid 120ml Children love the taste of Sambucol Black Elderberry Cold & Flu Relief Kids Liquid! This powerful medicine is packed with black elderberry, elderflower, honey, zinc and vitamin C that relieves children of cold and flu symptoms. This oral liquid contains black elderberries as its main antioxidant ingredient that gives it an overall berry flavour! The 120 ml bottle has all-natural ingredients that help expunge free radicals and protect children from viruses, therefore building their immune system in the process. Ease-A-Cold Kids Cold & Flu Chewable Tablets 24's Ease a Cold Kids Cold & Flu chewable tablets are specially formulated with Black Elderberry, Echinacea, Zinc, Vitamin C and bioflavonoids to help reduce the duration of common colds and relieve the severity of cold & flu symptoms including runny nose, sore throat, coughing and congestion as well as improves immune function to maintain your child's healthy immune system. Fluimucil 100MG Effervescent Granules Expel the icky, nasty phlegm with Fluimucil 100mg Effervescent Granules 30s, a powerful mucolytic ingredient that provides instantaneous relief from throat congestion! Each granule defends against respiratory infections, including illnesses common during the seasonal influenza outbreak such as cold, cough, and sore throat. What Fluimucil does is it breaks down and dissolves excessive mucus build-up to facilitate its quick removal and provide instant relief from lung congestion. Breathe more easily with this powerful mucolytic! Brufen Oral Suspension 60ml Brufen oral suspension contains Ibuprofen 20mg/ml. Ibuprofen is a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID). It works by blocking your body's production of certain natural substances that cause inflammation. This effect helps to decrease swelling, pain, or fever. Nurofen Children Oral Suspension Orange Flavour 60ml Nurofen for Children is suitable for most babies and children from 6 months, to be given orally. Nurofen for Children provides a fast, effective and long lasting reduction in temperature (including that associated with immunization) and soothes away the pain from teething and toothache, earache, sore throat, and minor aches and sprains. Ease-A-Cold Kids Cough, Cold & Flu Relief 120ml Ease a Cold Kids Cough, Cold & Flu Relief is formulated to help shorten the duration of the common cold and relieve cough in children so they can get better quicker. This great tasting berry liquid contains Echinacea, Ivy Leaf, Zinc and Blackberry. It helps support your child's healthy immune function, reducing the number of colds children catch in a year (and we all know that kids seem to get colds all year round!) 6.            Conclusion A high fever in children can be a sign of a serious condition and it is important to recognize the symptoms that indicate your child needs emergency medical attention. Stocking up on over-the-counter remedies such as paracetamol and ibuprofen, together with proper hydration can help to reduce the fever and relieve any discomfort for non-emergency cases. That being said, it is essential to seek medical attention if your child is experiencing any of the warning signs, such as difficulty breathing, severe headache, neck pain, lethargy, seizures, or a rash. By being aware of the symptoms and seeking the appropriate medical attention, you can ensure that your child receives the right care they need to recover from their high fever. Disclaimer: The information contained in this article should not be used as a substitute for the medical care and advice of your pediatrician. To get professional healthcare advice, you can reach out to your healthcare provider or any of our pharmacists via WhatsApp* here*. The groundbreaking skincare technology in Gloves in a Bottle outperforms other moisturisers in the market. With its powerful protective and restorative properties, it supports the skin’s outer layers, so you regain your natural oil and moisture balance! Dermatologist recommended and scientifically proven safe for babies and people of all ages and skin types. BENEFITS: • Controls and keeps eczema condition in check. • Moisturises hard, cracked skin to keep it skin soft and supple. • Locks in the skin’s natural oils and moisture balance to facilitate the overall moisturisation process. • Keeps out harmful toxins, allergens, and dirt so you get protected, clean skin. • Light, non-greasy, and easily absorbable. • This product is 100% gluten, dairy, wheat, nut-free, steroid-free. Price:     S$29.90  ADD TO CART Product Details Description Hope's Relief Premium Eczema Cream for the symptomatic relief of Eczema, Psoriasis, Dermatitis, and Itchy Dry Skin. Contains highly concentrated 300mg/g of Natural Active ingredients. Rich creamy consistency ideal for treating acute flare-ups and targeted areas. Contains medical grade antibacterial Manuka Honey. Soothes and calms dry, irritated and inflamed skin. Promotes natural skin healing, relieves itchy. Clinically proven to provide 24 hours+ hydration. Certified by dermatologists for sensitive skins. BENEFITS: • Soothes itching • Anti inflammatory • Calms dry or irritated skin • Moisturises + softens dry skin • Ideal for babies, children and adults • Can be used on your face, hands and body • Five Natural ingredients have been specially selected, which have a traditional history of assisting in soothing and calming irritated, itchy dry skin. • Natural Formula – Cortisone Free • No perfume, propylene glycol, lanolin, paraffin, parabens or artificial colours. Five natural ingredients have a traditional history of assisting in soothing and calming irritated, itchy dry skin: • CALENDULA - antiseptic, anti-inflammatory, anti-fungal and assisting in skin repair. • MANUKA HONEY NPA 10+ - Hospital Grade anti bacterial - Hope's Relief uses ManukaHoney NPA 10+ hospital grade with high anti bacterial activity eliminating Staphylcococcus Aureus. Staphylococcus Aureus has been shown to be present on the skin of 90% of eczema sufferers. Also nourishes and promotes tissue regrowth. • ALOE VERA – antibiotic, cooling and soothing . It is one of the great healing plants. It penetrates deeply to moisturise and soothes the skin. Clinical trials have proven its effectiveness in clearing the scaly plaques associated with psoriasis. • GOTU KOLA – Research has proven Gotu Kola stimulates various stages of tissue development. The first step in tissue repair, the process of replacing skin after sores or ulcers. It has also been shown to increase healing time and reduce scar tissue formation. • LICORICE ROOT – Licorice is thought to function as an adrenal stimulant and as a natural source of cortin, a hormone similar to cortisone. Studies have shown licorice to contain anti-inflammatory properties, a natural cortisone. Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: Apply 3 - 4 time daily or as needed. for SGD69.00 each and save 22%    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Oxithion Sublingual Tablets is a supplement containing reduced L-Glutathione (100mg), a natural tripeptide. It is the most powerful endogenous anti-oxidant. Glutathione protects the body from oxidative stress, inflammation and toxins, thereby improving the body’s functional status. Oxidative stress causes damage to cellular macromolecules resulting in physiological aging and the degenerative processes that occur in age-related diseases. Glutathione supplementation helps to delay the aging and degenerative processes, thereby keeping the body healthy and youthful. Many studies have shown Glutathione superior benefit in lightening and brightening complexions while simultaneously retarding free radical damage. It thus keeps skin youthful, supple and fair. The innovative sublingual Oxithion Sublingual Tablets is formulated as fast dissolving sublingual tablets, with an innovative patented technology. L-Glutathione is thus rapidly absorbed through the mouth mucosa into the body without being metabolized and then inactivated by the liver. The sublingual absorption also ensures a series of important benefits to the effectiveness of the product: ease of administration even in people with difficulties in swallowing; high tolerability; increased bioavailability of the active ingredients. BENEFITS: • Brightening for a radiant and luminous complexion • Prevention or reduction of age-related or photo-induced dark spots on the skin • Lightening of skin tone on the face and body • Provides antioxidant protection against skin aging   Made in Italy DIRECTIONS: How to Use: Place one tablet under the tongue and allow to dissolve before swallowing.Recommended Daily Dose: 1-2 tablets daily, preferably between meals.   ADD TO CART Product Details Description Amplified antiaging for oily skin types! Featuring 15% Glycolic Acid, this lightweight gel is designed for experienced users of Glycolic Acid. The lightweight silky gel is formulated for powerful skin-smoothing results! Glycolic Acid, an Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA), helps to reduce the appearance of enlarged pores, while smoothing the appearance of rough texture and evening skin tone. Gel Plus is a daily treatment gel that targets oily and blemish-prone skin concerns, as well as helping visibly improve signs of skin aging like fine lines and uneven skin tone. If you are looking for a daily exfoliator, add this Glycolic Acid treatment to your list! BENEFITS: • Lightweight exfoliating gel • AHA formula smooths rough texture and evens skin tone • Ideal for experienced AHA users with non-sensitive skin • Suitable for oily, acne-prone skin or hot humid climates • Fragrance-free, oil-free KEY INGREDIENTS: 15% Glycolic Acid Made in USA DIRECTIONS: Apply to face and other desired areas once daily for 2 weeks and twice daily thereafter, as tolerated. Daily use of sunscreen or sun avoidance is recommended with use of this AHA product and for one week after to minimise the risk of sun sensitivity / sunburn.     SOLD OUT      Oh no! Looks like we ran out of this product. Do register to get notified once we've stocked up! Notify Me Product Details Description A powerful lightweight serum infused with Niacinamide, Snow Fungus and Velvet Horn to provide immediate, deep and lasting hydration for all skin types. This potent formula hydrates, visibly strengthens, firms and improves skin’s defense against irritation and damage. Oil-free, Fragrance-free, silicone-free KEY INGREDIENTS: • ANTARCTICINE: Antarcticine is a rare ingredient derived from glaciers in Antarctica. It is known for its anti-ageing and collagen regeneration properties. Antarcticine provides the appearance of youthful skin by smoothing fine lines and wrinkles. Skin is instantly moisturized and fine lines are diminished. • SNOW FUNGUS: Snow fungus have similar hydration properties as Hyaluronic acid with its molecules being smaller than that of Hyaluronic acid. This allows the magic ingredient to penetrate deeper into the skin. Snow fungus also inhibit melanin production which fosters to brighten up the skin. • VELVET HORN: Velvet horn is also known as Codium Tomentosum which is a type of Marine Algae. It instantly provides deep levels of moisture for a prolonged period on the skin. Not only does it provide intensive hydration on the skin, it also plumps up the skin for a healthier glowing skin effect. • NIACINAMIDE & VITAMIN B5: Niacinamide inhibits the transfer of melanin to the skin surface, preventing the formation of sunspots and freckles. Niacinamide also reduces the appearance of pores, balances oil production and strengthens the skin barrier. Vitamin B5 eliminates the sticky residue left by conventional serums, leaving skin skin soft and moisturised. Made in Taiwan HOW TO USE: After cleansing and toning, dispense 1-2 drops of Deep Sea Glow Serum and gently pat onto slightly damp face and neck until fully absorbed. Follow with moisturizer to seal everything in place. Apply daily, AM and PM. Keep in a cool, dry place--away from direct light. vs. Retail Price:     S$211.00  2 FOR $139.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description The essential first part of the Invati™ 3-step system, exfoliation sets the stage for a full-hair reborn care. To make sure you set the tone right for that gorgeous hair blow-out, try Aveda’s Invati Advanced Exfoliating Shampoo Rich 1L! This shampoo cleanses and renews the scalp, smoothly invigorating the hair by stripping it away of accumulated pollution. The wintergreen-derived salicylic acid in every bottle unclogs the pores by removing dirt build-up. Every bottle contains the invigorating blend of Ayurvedic herbs, ginseng, and organic turmeric, ingredients that are combined to become the patented densiplex™. It has a large following in Singapore, Aveda's Invati range has everyone excited for its effective thicker hair solution, which also protects against hair loss and breakage. Comes in 1000ML and 200ML bottles. BENEFITS: • Provides a gentle but thorough exfoliation benefits to assist hair renewal process. • Removes accumulated dirt and pollution build-up on the tresses to keep it clean and healthy-looking. • Removes dirt build-up by unclogging the pores. • Offsets hair loss and breakage by assisting the growth of new hair effectively. • Ideal for medium to thick hair; normal to dry scalp • Sulfate cleanser-free formula with low lather • Color safe • Vegan • Free From: Sulfated Cleansers, Parabens, Mineral Oil, Petrolatum, Formaldehyde, Animal Ingredients, Synthetic Fragrance & Gluten Made in USA USAGE: Massage into wet hair and scalp. Rinse. Follow with invati advanced™ thickening conditioner and scalp revitalizer. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Jul-2024 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 10 Ratings Love our product? Natural ingredients, such as Xylitol and Calendula, help to prevent cavities, soothe gums, and fight tooth decay all while keeping the toothpaste super delicious for your little one. The toothpastes are a gel formula & don’t foam which means your kids can brush their teeth anywhere – even in the car on the way to childcare or school on the morning run! BENEFITS: • Safe to swallow • Rich in xylitol • Organic calendula to soothe gums • All Natural Ingredients • Certified Cruelty-free, Vegan, Gluten-free, Fluoride Free, and SLS Free • BPA free • Suitable From 6 Months Made in Australia FLAVOUR: Strawberry INSTRUCTIONS: Wash your hands! Use a small amount on finger or toothbrush. With minimum pressure, brush with a circular motion twice a day. Not harmful if swallowed! Price:     S$23.00  2 FOR $20.50 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Evolve Carmellose are soothing eye drops intended for use in the relief of discomfort that arises from dry eye sensations. They provide soothing relief for sore eyes from grit, itchiness and other foreign body irritations. • Great for mild to moderate dry eyes. • Osmoprotective. • Preservative Free Multi-Dose bottle. • Contact Lens Friendly. Dry eye sensations may also be produced by use of TVs and computer screens, infrequent blinking, certain medical treatments including refractive laser eye surgery, atmospheric pollution and drying atmosphere e.g. air conditioning, central heating, wind and sun. Evolve Carmellose is a unique system designed to combine the benefits of unit dose preservative free eye drops with the convenience of a standard eye drop bottle. Once opened the bottle can be used for up to 3 months. Evolve Carmellose is both preservative free and phosphate free, ideal for sensitive eyes and frequent users. Made in UK DIRECTIONS: Place one drop of Evolve Carmellose into each eye two to four times a day. Evolve Carmellose is compatible with all types of contact lenses.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Health 〉   Pro-Gut Probiotics Capsules 100's   Pro-Gut Probiotics Capsules 100's Brand: Pro-Gut S$88.00     vs. Retail Price:     S$96.00  3 FOR $83.30 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Pro-Gut is an oral probiotic to promote a healthy balance of digestive flora. Pro-Gut is a synbiotic: a combination of probiotics and prebiotics. Probiotics are live non-harmful bacteria that, when consumed in adequate amounts, confer a beneficial effect to the health of the host. Prebiotics are non-digestible food ingredients that benefits the host by selectively stimulating the growth and/or activity of one or a limited number of bacterial species that can support the health of the host. For instance, prebiotics can be beneficial to probiotics such as Bifidobacterium and Lactobacillus. Each Pro-Gut capsule contains a minimum of 9 billionlive bacteria from a unique blend of 8 different probiotic strains that are characteristic of a healthy normal human gut microflora, and include strains of Lactobacillus, Bifidobacterium and Streptococcus. To ensure the survival of these bacteria during the journey through the stomach, Pro-Gut is micro-encapsulated. In addition, the prebiotic inulin is included to stimulate the growth of friendly and healthy intestinal bacteria which supports good colon health. BENEFITS: • Effective for diarrhoea, IBS & other gut disturbances. • Micro-encapsulation technology to ensure the survival of the good bacteria. • 100% Natural Synbiotic • Vegetarian capsule 8 Probiotic Strains in each capsule: 1. Lactobacillus Acidophilus - 2.25 billion 2. Lactobacillus Casei - 2.25 billion 3. Lactobacillus Lactis - 2.1 billion 4. Lactobacillus Bulgaricus - 75 million 5. Bifidobacterium Infantis - 1.5 billion 6. Bifidobacterium Bifidum - 450 million 7. Bifidobacterium Longum - 75 million 8. Streptococcus Thermaphilus - 300 million Made in Canada DOSAGE/ DIRECTIONS: Take 1-6 capsules a day after meals or as directed by the physician. Pro-Gut may also be consumed without the capsule. Simply open the capsule and pour the content into warm or cold food or drink. The powder content has a plain and acceptable taste. STORAGE: No refrigeration required. Avoid direct sunlight. Retail Price:     S$34.60  3 FOR $32.15 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Vivomixx Probiotics Drop contains freeze-dried lactic acid bacteria and bifidobacteria. Eight different stains of bacteria were selected, grown in specific culture media and then mixed in proportion to optimize the effects. Liquid suspension works particularly well with small children who are incapable of swallowing capsules. A popular method to manage the problem is opening the capsules and dissolving the content in water or juice; however, that is not a good way because the manufacturer of the product might not have prepared the product for such a form of administration, which can limit its activity. Vivomixx Probiotics Drop does not contain gluten, soy, preservatives and synthetic sweeteners. It may contain traces of milk. 0.5 ml correspond to 5 billion live lactic acid bacteria and bifidobacteria & 400 IU Vitamin D Content: 1 bottle of 10 ml with a 1500mg sachet and 1 graduated dispenser BENEFITS: • Defends against diarrhoea, constipation, bloating, and irritable bowel syndrome • Protects against a number of gut-related issues • Vitamin D3 for support immune system, bone health and muscle strength. • 1 bottle contains 10 ml, equivalent to 100 drops. Made in Italy DOSAGE: Recommended dosage: 0.5-1 ml per day, corresponding to 5-10 billion bacteria and 400-800 IU of Vitamin D. The product can be mixed with water and non-carbonated drinks or other cold liquids. For infants, Vivomixx drop can be added to formula milk. DIRECTIONS FOR USE: Screw the bottle cap in anti-clockwise direction to break the seal. Tear open the sachet containing the probiotic powder. Empty the sachet contents into the bottle. Shake vigorously to obtain a uniform suspension. Remove the bottle cap and place the graduated dispenser. Always shake before every use. Once reconstituted, it must be kept refrigerated and used within 3 weeks. CARE & STORAGE: Vivomixx products are refrigerated in our warehouse at all times. Vivomixx contains live bacteria which are sensitive to heat, it is therefore recommended to keep the product refrigerated. However it may be stored at room temperature for UP TO ONE WEEK without the quality of the probiotics being compromised. Packing and delivering of probiotics are done on the very same day. We do not accept exchanges or returns after products are delivered. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Jul-2024 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 7 Ratings Love our product?
