FOR $37.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description [NEW PACKAGING!] Vivomixx Capsule 30's is a probiotics supplement that is essential to restoring and maintaining a healthy gut. Every Vivomixx capsule contains at least 112.5 billion live bacteria. Vivomixx is a safe, gluten-free food supplement that can be taken daily to help achieve a balanced digestive system. It does not contain preservatives nor synthetic sweeteners. It may contain traces of milk. Each Vivomixx dosage is bolstered with a number of Vivomixx benefits, including a combination of 8 different strains of live lactic acid bacteria and bifidobacteria.  BENEFITS: • Defends against diarrhoea, constipation, bloating, and irritable bowel syndrome • Protects against a number of gut-related issues • Gluten-free, without preservatives, colouring agents or synthetic sweeteners. Made in Italy CARE & DOSAGE: 1 to 8 capsules per day, or as directed by the physician. It is recommended to take Vivomixx in the morning on an empty stomach and/or in the evening. Capsules can be taken with a glass of water or opened and mixed in water or yogurt. Do not exceed the recommended daily dosage. Should not be used as a substitute for a varied and balanced diet and healthy lifestyle. STORAGE: Vivomixx products are refrigerated in our warehouse at all times. Vivomixx contains live bacteria and it is therefore recommended to keep the product refrigerated. However it may be stored at room temperature for UP TO ONE WEEK without the quality of the probiotics being compromised. Packing and delivering of probiotics are done on the very same day. We do not accept returns or exchanges once products are delivered. EXPIRY DATE: 31-May-2024 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 23 Ratings Love our product? Looks like we ran out of this product. Do register to get notified once we've stocked up! Notify Me Product Details Description Remescar assists in the healing process of both new and old scars resulting from surgery, burns, bug bites, acne, stretch marks, etc., by releasing a thin and discrete silicone-based film to provide a suitable healing micro-environment for the scar while maintaining the skin’s natural moisture balance. It can also be used as a preventive therapy on closed wounds to reduce scarring or for post laser treatment and helps to relieve the burning and itching of the scarred tissue. Beta-glucan has strong, calming, protective and hydrating properties. It's an excellent film former. The combination of β-glucan with polymeric film formers such as PVP (Polyvinyl pyrrolidone) and PVA (Polyvinyl alcohol) help to accelerate the wound healing process. Besides the film formation, which is the first and most important action of Remescar, it also contains strong UV filters. It is widely known that scars need to be protected from UV radiation. That is why this scar stick incorporates powerful UV-A and UV-B filters. BENEFITS: • For old and new scars • Smoothes, softens and helps to reduce scar tissue • Easy to use stick applicator • For all areas of the face and body • Use twice a day for 2 to 3 months • Invisible upon application Made in Belgium USAGE: Ensure the scarred are is closed, clean and dry. Apply Remescar scar stick gently on the affected area and around the border of the scar. Apply twice a day for 2 to 3 months. Powerful results. Start your skincare routine strong with this soap-free, non-foaming gel facial cleanser, clinically shown to help reduce the look of blotchiness and increase brightness. Ideal for all skin types including sensitive and reactive skin, this gentle cleanser is formulated with Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA), to gently exfoliate while it cleanses without irritation. This cleanser has been shown to be well tolerated, even by those with sensitive or reactive skin. PHA Facial Cleanser is perfect for those seeking an antiaging facial cleanser that is also gentle enough for dry, sensitive and reactive skin. This non-foaming gel formulation effectively removes makeup and impurities without drying or stripping the skin. BENEFITS: • Formulated with a gently PHA exfoliant • Effectively removes makeup and impurities without irritation • Lightly exfoliates without drying skin’s protective moisture barrier • Ideal for all skin types, including sensitive and reactive skin • Soap-free, fragrance-free KEY INGREDIENTS: 4% GLUCONOLACTONE (PHA) Made in USA DIRECTIONS: Apply a moderate amount to wet skin and gently massage. Rinse with water. Use twice daily. EXPIRY DATE: 30-Jun-2024 Rating & Reviews 0 /5 0 Ratings Love our product?     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Health 〉   Nasaval Cold & Flu Blocker Natural Barrier Dosed Nasal Spray 800mg   Nasaval Cold & Flu Blocker Natural Barrier Dosed Nasal Spray 800mg Brand: Nasaval S$16.05     vs. Retail Price:     S$16.05  ADD TO CART Product Details Description Nasaval Cold & Flu helps the body to create a barrier against germs, makes you less likely to ‘catch a cold’. Airborne germs are the most common way to catch cold and viruses, particularly in crowded places. Using Nasaval Cold & Flu before exposure to a crowded area will make it much more difficult to pick up colds and germs, hence acting like an invisible mask. Nasaval Cold & Flu is a natural nasal powder spray containing a blend of micronized cellulose, peppermint and wild garlic that delivers fast protection from airborne germs that are inhaled via the nose. By trapping, absorbing and neutralising air borne germs, Nasaval Cold & Flu stops the causes of infection rather than just treating the symptoms. Simply squeeze from the easy to use dispense bottle into each nostril will rapidly distribute fine powder throughout the upper nasal passages and sinuses and remain effective for several hours. This product is non- drowsy and does not have any known side effects which is suitable for children from 3 years, adults, pregnant and breast-feeding women. BENEFITS: • Shorten the duration and severity of cold and flu-like symptoms • Scientifically proven to block airborne allergens and germs • Starts to defend in 2 minutes • Natural ingredients without any antihistamines, steroids, drugs or medicines • Non- drowsy and without known side effects • Suitable for vegans Made in UK INGREDIENTS: HPMC 93%, Peppermint Powder 2%, European wild garlic powder 5% DIRECTIONS: Step 1: Blow your nose. Step 2: Remove cap and shake the bottle side to side. Step 3: Administer a test spray to gauge the pressure required for an ideal dose, which is a 10 to 15cm plume of powder. If you find the bottle too stiff to squeeze with one hand then use both hands (once you are used to taking Nasaval Cold & Flu Blocker the test spray is no longer needed). Step 4: Place the nozzle of the bottle just inside the nose and apply 1 to 2 sprays into each nostril. Inhale gently while squeezing but do not inhale deeply. Step 5: Re-apply each time you blow your nose. Apply 2 to 3 times per day to maintain an effective barrier or if symtops have already started, use Nasaval Cold & Flu Blocker 3 times per day until symtoms disappear. If used concurrently with other nasal spray, Nasaval Cold & Flu Blocker should be re-applied afterwards to ensure that the barrier created is not disturbed. Do not use this product if you are sensitive to cellulose, mint or garlic. Not suitable for children under 3 years old EXPIRY DATE: 30-Sep-2025 Rating & Reviews 0 /5 0 Ratings Love our product? moisturising their skin at the same time. It is effective in repelling mosquitoes that cause dengue, malaria, encephalitis and West Nile fever. BENEFITS: • Contains 10% DEET. • Ceramide-dominant 3:1:1 ratio to optimally rebuild the protective skin barrier. • Tested Hypoallergenic.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Looking for a clinic-exclusive product but don't want to wait in line for a doctor? You may just be able to find it at this online retailer The most effective beauty and wellness products are often the ones recommended by doctors and typically only stocked at clinics. Just think about the eczema-moisturisers that your family doctor advise you to get or the skin-brightening supplements that your dermatologist offers as a solution to hyperpigmentation. You’ve used these products and know that they work. But when it comes to replenishing them, you dread it. That’s because you probably need to secure an appointment at the clinic, go through a review with the doctor, and then purchase the products while paying for a consultation fee. We already feel the dreadful fuss just by typing the previous sentence. Here’s a life hack you probably don’t know yet: you can actually get clinic-exclusive products without seeing a doctor - if you know exactly where to look! Where to get clinic-exclusive products You may think that you need to get a prescription to purchase clinic-exclusive products such as eczema treatment cream and beauty supplements, guess what - you don’t! These products, while highly recommended by doctors, aren’t considered prescription medication, and are allowed to be bought off the shelves, even though they are commonly stocked at clinics because of how often medical professionals tell their patients to use them. But we’ve come across a gem that stocks clinic-exclusive products online. We’re talking about Glovida, an online health and beauty retailer that has been doing so for the last six years. Glovida may have only been set up in 2016, but it is supported by a parent company that is recognised as an expert in the pharmaceutical industry and has been in this business for almost 50 years. This is why Glovida understands the market and is able to bring in clinic-exclusive products that are 100% authentic. Thanks to its established relationship with many brand owners, Glovida is able to stock these products at affordable prices too. Supplements are also replenished regularly due to high demand so that you’d be sure that you’re getting the freshest stocks. In fact, the expiry dates are clearly indicated for all products listed, so you can have a peace of mind when you make a purchase. For those who still require an expert’s input, Glovida’s in-house pharmacists can provide advice over WhatsApp messages - super convenient! And if we can’t emphasise enough on convenience, Glovida also offers free next-day delivery; something that customers who are purchasing essentials urgently will really appreciate. Read on to see which popular products are available on it. Popular products to get on Glovida Ceradan Ceramide Skin Barrier Repair Cream Those who suffer from eczema-prone skin or extremely dry and flaky skin will be familiar with Ceradan’s line of products. The brand is often recommended by dermatologists to those who suffer from dry, itchy or sensitive skin because of its patented formula that features a unique ratio of ceramides, proven to improve eczema-prone skin. While Ceradan also carries body wash, diaper cream and even mosquito repellent cream, its Ceramide Skin Barrier Repair Cream is definitely its standout product. This gives relief to dry, sensitive, inflamed, and irritated skin with a compromised skin barrier, and it is also safe to be used on newborns, and on both body and face. Glovida stocks the Clinic Pack Size that you can usually only find in clinics. While its retail price is similar to what you can typically find in the market, it offers a special price of $66 each (instead of $68) if you purchase two units as a bundle - this is a steal that you can’t get anywhere else! Get it here. To see the rest of the article, head over to Daily Vanity. Back to All Articles PURVEYOR OF HEALTH & BEAUTY About Glovida Articles Terms of Use Privacy Policy GET REWARDED. S$69.90  2 FOR $45.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Heliocare Ultra-D Capsules have a high concentration of Fernblock so is ideal as a daily supplement during periods of medium and high risk. It is the most complete formulation with 5mcg of Vitamin D, making it ideal for people with a concern regarding Vitamin D levels. It is effective from the first dose so provides immediate and safe protection. Heliocare Ultra Oral has been extensively tested for its safety and efficacy. Formulated with 480mg of the key ingredient, Fernblock®, it has excellent antioxidant property to reduce free radicals by up to 50%, preventing formation of hyperpigmentation caused by UV rays. Heliocare Ultra Oral also protects the entire skin surface, increasing the skin’s resistance against sunburn by up to 300%. The protection from Fernblock® also slows down skin aging by up to 55% through the inhibition of collagen depletion caused by UVA. Fernblock® has been extensively researched in Harvard Medical School for more than 12 years. Bolstered with lycopene, lutein, vitamin C and vitamin E, Heliocare Ultra Oral has additional antioxidant benefits and also, has the abilities to protect the eye from UV rays. Other than protecting your skin from harmful UV rays, Fernblock repairs existing damage in the cellular level, preventing cell mutation and premature skin aging. BENEFITS: • Additional free radical protection from within PLUS vitamin D • For periods of high sun exposure • Boosts skin health • Green tea extract and Beta-carotene • Gluten free • Suitable for daily consumption for intense sun protection and post dermatological procedural care. • Vitamin D (5mcg) Made in Spain DOSAGE: Take 1 capsule daily before sun exposure. Do not exceed the recommended daily dose. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Jul-2025 Rating & Reviews 0 /5 0 Ratings Love our product? vs. Retail Price:     S$22.90  3 FOR $22.50 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description SEIZE THE CLAY: After using this exquisite clay body scrub, you may feel inclined to do a cartwheel or book a skydiving lesson. That's perfectly normal. Thankyou Botanical Cedarwood Clay Body Scrub packed with full of green French clay, which has a rep for being super revitalising and stimulating, absorbing and removing impurities from the skin and leaving only the good stuff behind. And the mineral mud from the Dead Sea will tighten, tone and brighten your complexion to glowing new heights. Combined with the foresty scent of Cedarwood, this scrub is your skin's new best friend. • Contains 100.0% naturally derived ingredients • Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: 1) Scrub - Wet your skin and massage small handfuls of clay scrub in a circular motion all over your body. Spend a lil more time on marks, bumps and dry areas. 2) Chill - Wait 2 minutes to let your skin absorbs the natural oils. 3) Reveal - Rinse with water to reveal your smooth skin. Use your fave Thankyou Body Wash to help remove excess oils. EXPIRY DATE: All our products have a minimum shelf life of 12 months, unless stated otherwise. FOR $9.95 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Give your child a daily boost with this blend of Cod Liver Oil, containing Omega-3 fatty acids (DHA + EPA), Vitamin A, Vitamin D and Calcium. Scott’s Emulsion Original has 2 times better DHA absorption30* than non-emulsified free flowing cod liver oil. It contains nutrients that can help support your child’s brain development and healthy vision. Vitamin A and Vitamin D help support normal immune function and healthy growth as well as development. Calcium is beneficial for strong bones and teeth. What’s more, Scott’s Emulsion is pre-emulsified. This means the Cod Liver Oil in Scott’s Emulsion is broken down into tiny droplets that are evenly mixed through the formulation. These tiny emulsified droplets of oil are closer to the way our body naturally break down oils, so it helps make it easier for our body to digest the nutrients in Scott’s Emulsion. By giving your child Scott’s Emulsion Original daily, you can feel more confident that you are helping to support their healthy growth and development. * Based on results of iAUCO – 10h value for DHA at 1.96 times greater with Scott’s Emulsion Original vs a non-emulsified cod liver oil, in a pharmacokinetic study in 47 healthy adults, to determine and compare the plasma Omega 3 (DHA & EPA) levels after ingestion of Scott’s Emulsion Original and a non-emulsified fat. Made in Malaysia DOSAGE: 1-3 years: 5ml once a day 4-8 years: 15ml once a day > 9 years: 15ml thrice a day FLAVOUR: Original EXPIRY DATE: Jul-2024 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 1 Ratings Love our product? S$19.20  2 FOR $15.45 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Sterimar baby is recommended for daily cleansing of baby's nose. Sterimar Baby is an isotonic filtered sea water solution, 100% natural and free from preservatives. It provides the beneficial properties of mineral salts and marine trace elements. With a specially designed nozzle and very gentle pressure and microfine spray, Sterimar Baby ensures gentle nasal rinsing and cleansing. By clearing impurities and germ filled mucus from your baby’s nose, Sterimar Baby not only helps ensure your little one can breath naturally but also helps support the nose’s natural filtering function. This helps ensure it is working as effectively as possible as a first line of defense, helping to prevent infections and allergic reactions. BENEFITS: • Gently cleanse the nose and eliminate impurities (dust, fine pollution, mucus, allergens) • Aids in natural breathing and bottle feeding. • Stimulates the natural defenses of the nasal lining. • 100% Natural • Safe to use in babies 0-3 years of age. Made in France CONTENTS: Sea water, purified water. DIRECTIONS: 1) Sterimar baby is recommended for daily cleansing of baby's nose. Prime the spray by briefly pressing the nozzle. Lay baby down on his/her side or sit up with baby's head tilted to one side. 2) Gently insert the nozzle into the nostril. 3) Press the nozzle briefly-let any excess solution run out before wiping the nose. 4) Repeat the operation in the other nostril. 5) Clean the nozzle with soapy water, rinse and dry. Use 2 to 6 times a day or more if required in each nostril. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Jan-2026 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 6 Ratings Love our product?     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Ouch! Best Pain Relieving Supplements for Joint Pain Crippled by persistent pain or discomfort in your joints? Joint pain is more common than we think and could occur on areas like your shoulders, lower back, and especially the knees. The pain could be a dampener, especially if you are used to moving around and enjoy going on runs or long walks. Instead of resorting to expensive surgery or drastically reduce your physical activities; getting yourself good quality supplements for the joints or topical application could very likely be your next best bet. So, we have put together some of the best pain-relieving supplements and topical applications for your joint concerns: 1. Artrex DS 60’s for Maintenance of Healthy Joints & Cartilage Just because you don’t have arthritis, or haven’t been really plagued by joint pain yet, it doesn’t mean you can’t anticipate and combat the risk. More a prevention than a cure, Artrex DS 60’s is an all-natural, highly dependable and effective supplement used to maintain healthy joints and cartilage, as well as manage arthritic joint pains. Each tablet is formulated with natural ingredients like Winter Cherry (Withania somnifera), Indian Frankincense (Boswellia serrata), Turmeric (Curcuma longa), and Ginger (Zingiber officinale) that help to boost your joint health. Word of caution though; this brand sells like hotcakes on Glovida, so we suggest you stock up for future purposes! 2. Flexiseq Gel 50g Providing relief from osteoarthritis, the Flexiseq Gel 50G is applied directly on the affected joint. The gel uses the power of Sequessome Technology (Seq Tech) and penetrates deep into the affected cartilage, providing lubrication to the impaired joint and halts the incidence of osteoarthritis. Every application activates key lubricating ingredients that directly targets damaged joints so this soothing topical gel can ease the stiffness of your joints. The lubrication helps the joint’s cartilage restore its functions and improve the joint’s overall flexibility. What’s more is that many users see fast improvements in joint movement and flexibility with every application! 3.Omical 60’s Organic Milk Calcium Tablets We should all live by the maxim “prevention is better than cure”. For joint pain, you can take this motto to heart by trying Omical 60’s Organic Milk Calcium Tablets—milky tablets that provide strong calcium support! Omical is an all-natural milk-based tablet that contains 205mg of Elemental Calcium and added 200 IU of Vitamin D3 which helps the body absorb calcium better. It’s free from toxic metals like arsenic, lead, and mercury and is a wholesome form of calcium, making it the best calcium choice for children and expectant mothers! To meet the daily recommended calcium intake, we suggest taking 2 Omical tablets daily. Help your bones and teeth effectively absorb calcium before joint pains hit you hard with these milk tablets! 4. Piascledine 300mg Capsules 30’s: Avocado and Soybean Oil for Improvement of Joint Function Good news to avocado lovers out there! Do you know that avocados serve as a good source of Vitamin E, a very effective micronutrient with anti-inflammatory effects? Avocado consumption is linked to a decreased risk of joint damage, especially during the early stages of osteoarthritis. That’s why Piascledine 300mg capsules is an absolute winner in joint care! Many have complimented this product for its efficacy and ability to reduce joint pain greatly! This effective supplementcontains the powerful blend of avocado and soybean oil that provides overall improvement of the joint function and improvement in mobility. 5. UC-II Standardized Cartilage 40mg Capsule 30’s (Type II Collagen) UC-II Standardized Cartilage 40mg is derived from chicken sternum cartilage and is responsible for retaining the cartilage’s tensile strength and toughness. UC-II ® is a patented form of collagen that complements the immune system in order to support healthy joints and take care of the cartilage. Human clinical studies have successfully established that a 40mg capsule of UC-II per day are linked to greater joint comfort and reduced joint tension! 6. Ultravite Boswellia & Ginger Complex 60’s Capping off this list is Ultravite’s Boswellia & Ginger Complex 60’s. This supplement has key herbs that not only support healthy joints, but also provide relief from body and muscle pains. Every capsule is formulated with the natural ingredients of Boswellia, winter cherry, ginger, and turmeric—perfect substances that trace years of effectivity and is backed by modern research. This is a perfect choice for anyone considering a natural alternative to relieving joint pain! The cartilage protecting the ends of our bones wears down and thins over time, that’s why it is inevitable to experience joint pain and osteoarthritis for many as we age. However, getting the right relief is attainable if you find the right supplements! Apart from maintaining a healthy weight and staying fit, be sure to get yourself some of our recommended pain-relieving, bone-strengthening supplements to boost your joint health and alleviate the aches!   vs. Retail Price:     S$19.95  3 FOR $18.50 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Ease a Cold Kids Cold & Flu chewable tablets are specially formulated with Black Elderberry, Echinacea, Zinc, Vitamin C and bioflavonoids to help reduce the duration of common colds and relieve the severity of cold & flu symptoms including runny nose, sore throat, coughing and congestion as well as improves immune function to maintain your child's healthy immune system. Ease a Cold Kids Cold & Flu chewable tablets can be administered to children as young as 2 years of age. Not only are Ease a Cold Kids Cold & Flu chewable helpful in relieving symptoms, they have a delicious berry taste when they burst in the mouth! INGREDIENTS: • Black Elderberry: Helps to reduce cold and flu symptoms and maintains immune system to fight illness. • Echinacea: Supports immune health, shorten duration of common colds and helps reduce severity of cold and flu symptoms. • Vitamin C & Zinc: Are necessary for normal immune system function. Made in Australia FLAVOUR: Berry DIRECTIONS: Cold & Flu Symptoms: It is important to begin at the first sign of cold & flu symptoms. Always take with food. Children 2-3 years: Chew one tablet 2 times daily. Children 4-8 years: Chew one tablet 4 times daily. Children 9-12 years: Chew two tablets 3 times daily. Maintenance: To help support healthy immune function during the cold & flu season or when immune health is weakened. Children 4-8 years: Chew one tablet daily. Children 9-12 years: Chew two tablet daily. EXPIRY DATE: 30-Nov-2025 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 1 Ratings Love our product? Restoring Lip Balm 50ml is packed with powerful lipids that promote an enduring skin moisturisation. It is clinically proven for fast reduction of itch and redness for soothed skin, and strengthens and repairs the skin's moisture barrier. This hypoallergenic lipid balm is gentle and has no damaging preservatives, making it a perfect skin moisturisation choice for babies and children and can reduce the discomfort caused by insisted itch without the fuss. *Disclaimer: Results may vary based on individual. BENEFITS: • For very dry, irritated and reactive skin • High lipid content with ceramide, contains 40% essential lipids • Leaves skin soft and supple • Reduces itch and skin redness • Strengthen and repair the skin's moisture barrier • Gently moisturises infants' and children's skin since it has no preservatives, perfumes or colourants Made in Thailand DIRECTIONS: Apply twice daily.    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Duolac Derma is a lactic acid bacteria supplement for the whole family which contributes to the maintenance of normal skin. It is made from natural ingredients and is scientifically developed. The Duolac probiotics are protected by a unique patented dual coating technology developed to maximize their survival rate 100 times higher than uncoated probiotics. The dual coating technology protects the probiotics from mechanical pressure during manufacturing, transportation, heat and moisture. Its unique pH-dependent release mechanism ensures survivability of probiotics against gastric acid and bile salts, while releasing them in the intestine to ensure their effective colonization and proliferation. BENEFITS: • Convenient powder formulation• 4 clinically validated strains• Contributes to the maintenance of normal skin• Suitable for Vegetarians• Recommended for the whole family• Lactose free, Gluten free, Halal certified PACKING: One box consists of 30 sticks (10.0 billion CFU per stick) Made in Korea INGREDIENTS: Lactobacillus casei CBT LC5, Lactobacillus rhamnosus CBT LR5, Lactobacillus plantarum CBT LP3, Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis CBT BL3, Polydextrose, Dextrose, Fructooligosaccharide, Microcrystalline cellulose, Magnesium stearate. DOSAGE: 1 stick daily (with/without water).For anyone, aged 1 year and over, who is seeking probiotic support on a daily basis. For entire family.Use in Children: Children too young to swallow powder are advised to take with water. STORAGE: Does not require refrigeration. Keep in a cool, dry place. We do not accept exchanges or returns after products are delivered. EXPIRY DATE: 16-Nov-2024 Rating & Reviews 0 /5 0 Ratings Love our product? S$25.00     vs. Retail Price:     S$25.90  2 FOR $23.70 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Australia’s natural antiseptic, Tea Tree Oil is distilled from specially selected Melaleuca alternifolia leaves, a plant native to the coastal regions of northern New South Wales and south eastern Queensland, Australia. This 100% pure, 100% natural oil is a powerful antiseptic which inhibits a broad spectrum of bacteria and fungi and cleanses and protects skin abrasions. Tea Tree Oil is well tolerated by healthy skin tissue, and does not inhibit normal cell growth. BENEFITS: • Relieves minor cuts, burns, abrasions, pimples, bites and stings • Treats fungal infections such as athlete’s foot and nail infection • Natural acne treatment • Cleaning: Kills 99.9% household germs • Free from SLS, parabens, synthetics and fillers Made in Australia HOW TO USE: Apply sparingly to minor cuts, burns, abrasions, pimples, boils, bites and stings. Apply Tea Tree Oil directly or on a cotton bud. For external use only. EXPIRY DATE: 30-Apr-2025 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 1 Ratings Love our product? S$54.00     SOLD OUT      Oh no! Looks like we ran out of this product. Do register to get notified once we've stocked up! Notify Me Product Details Description Remescar Eye Bags & Dark Circles is an instant and effective eye cream which helps to diminish bags under your eyes and the appearance of dark circles with just one single application per day. You’ll feel refreshed and feel years younger in just a few minutes, all day long. The effectiveness of Remescar Eye Bags & Dark Circles has also been proven clinically and works for all skin types. Remescar Eye Bags & Dark Circles gives you an instant effect because of its revolutionary EYESYL technology that immediately targets eye bags & dark circles, by using a unique combination of clay minerals and a bi-peptide complex which will lead to strong skin tightening, a decrease of fluid accumulation under the eyes and a micro-muscular pause.These actions will help to reduce the puffiness of the eyes and eliminate the appearance of dark circles. BENEFITS: • Erases the appearance of eye bags and dark circles in just a few minutes! • Instant visible results • Effective from 1st application • Clinically proven Made in Belgium USAGE: Step 1: Wash your face gently and pat dry. Step 2: Squeeze out a small amount of product on your fingertip. You should aim for the size of a grain of rice; any less will not be enough, and any more is generally too much and won’t fully absorb into the skin or could cause sensitivity. This is one of the key factors to make Remescar Eye Bags & Dark Circles work correctly. Step 3: Gently apply the cream on your entire under-eye area, and smooth it out from the inside to the outside with one finger. Blend in using a light gentle sweeping motion until the cream completely absorbs into the skin. Step 4: Remain expressionless for 2-3 minutes while the product dries to achieve dramatic results (fanning will accelerate the process). Simply tissue off the excess of cream with a bit of water if too much cream is applied. Wash hands and close the tube after use. For under makeup: First, apply your usual products (eye serum, daily moisturizer, etc.) and allow time for these products to penetrate the layers of your skin (a minute or two). Then you can apply a very thin layer of Remescar Eye Bags & Dark Circles to the targeted area as instructed above. If you see a white residue you have either used too much product or did not use moisturizer. Simply tissue off the white residue with a bit of water. Once the product has dried, apply your makeup as usual. Note: Oil-based makeup may reduce the effectiveness of Remescar Eye Bags & Dark Circles.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Yucky Phlegm? The 3 Best Expectorant Brands for Phlegm-Busting! We’re no strangers to the effects of an annoying, persistent cough—the yucky, sticky phlegm, that swollen, painful throat and chest congestion! For effective relief from all these symptoms, try expectorants for a speedy recovery from coughs! Expectorants help loosen phlegm to make it easier to cough out. It does so by increasing the water content of the mucus, thinning it out so it is easier to be expelled. In this list, we share three phlegm-busting and expectorant-formulated brands that can help lighten and provide immediate comfort from chesty coughs! 1. FLUIMUCIL Fluimucil 100mg Effervescent Granules 30s is perfect for when you’re already feeling heavy and in need of a quick, no-fuss solution for your sore throat. Just dissolve these granules, drink, and feel fast relief from chesty coughs! Formulated to break down phlegm and clear out your lungs, Fluimucil’s Effervescent Granules is a must-have during seasonal influenza. This fast-acting mucolytic agent directly targets the thick and sticky mucus structure in order to clear our airways and provide instant relief from throat and lung congestions. Like its granule counterpart, the Fluimucil A 600mg Effervescent Tablets 10s also dissolves sticky phlegm, therefore clearing the respiratory tract for faster cough relief! Perfect for both adults and children 6 years and older, these handy effervescent tablets allow for an easier phlegm expulsion because of its intense mucolytic agent. 2. LEFTOSE Cough tablets can sometimes cause drowsiness. Good thing there’s the non-drowsy Leftose® Syrup 100ml: Lysozyme Hydrochloride! Prescribed by doctors for over 40 years, Leftose is a 2-in-1 product for chesty coughs and sore throats. This sweet, easy on the taste buds cough syrup is a perfect cough and phlegm remedy especially for kids! This product quickly dissolves phlegm and reduces the inflammation brought on by sore throat. Its immediate and long-lasting effects help to relieve throat pain and swelling effectively. Leftose® 30’s Tablets for Chesty Coughs and Sore Throats contain lysozyme hydrochloride which is a natural enzyme found in the human body - tears, saliva, breastmilk; which helps thin the hard-to-remove phlegm from airways, making it easier to release and cough out. Formulated to be non-drowsy, each tablet provides instant relief from sore throat and reduce inflammation. 3.PROSPAN Backed by over 65,000 rigorous clinical evidence in over 65,000 patients, Prospan is one of the most famous non-drowsy cough remedy in the market! Formulated with the exclusive extract EA 575 or Ivy leaf extract, it serves to provide an impactful and fast relief from chesty cough. In addition, the brand’s products are also sugar-free, making them a perfect natural cough-combat for people of all ages. Prospan Cough Syrup 200ML is a perfect remedy for busy days, especially when you cannot afford to miss out on work and your everyday tasks. Specially formulated for adults, this product naturally remedies the effects of persisting, chesty cough without the drowsiness. It opens the throat airways to relieve chest congestion and break up the mucus build-up effectively! Of course, Prospan comes in a formula perfect for kids! A companion to the adult formula, Prospan Cough Syrup for Children provides the same level of comfort to children’s airways, calming the throat without blocking it up for better relief from mucus build-up. While coughs usually go away after a day or two and are sometimes best left to run its course, they can be made worse by excess phlegm. Price:     S$31.90  ADD TO CART Product Details Description Sourced from organic milk, Omical puts all the calcium goodness from milk, into an easy to swallow, absolutely absorbable, little tablet! It is also the ideal calcium supplement for pregnant mummies and their baby! Each Omical tablet contains 250mg of calcium with added Vitamin D3 to help the body absorb the calcium better. Depending on your daily recommended calcium intake, you can easily meet the recommended amount with Omical. Calcium is better absorbed when taken in small amounts throughout the day, hence, taking 2 Omical tablets at a go is ideal. Omical does not contain Calcium Carbonate, which may be sourced from non-food sources, such as rocks and shells. Omical is also free from toxic metals, such as arsenic, lead and mercury, making us the choice calcium supplements for you and your family. HOW IT WORKS: Sourced from milk, each milk-mineral tablet provides your body with 250mg of Elemental Calcium and 200 IU of Vitamin D3. Vitamin D is essential for calcium to be effectively absorbed into our bones and teeth. Made in Canada DOSAGES: Intake is not dependent on food, can be taken any time of the day. other internal and external acid sources. GC Tooth Mousse is a delicious tasting, water based, sugar free crème that is beneficial for teeth. It contains calcium and phosphate; the major minerals teeth are made from. Because calcium and phosphate are carried in a special milk-derived protein called Recaldent (CPP-ACP), they are available in a soluble form. This means GC Tooth Mousse provides extra protection for teeth, buffers dental plaque acid from bacteria in the mouth and also protects teeth from acidic foods and drinks. GC Tooth Mousse, the first product for professional use to contain this complex of Recaldent (CPP-ACP), is the ideal delivery system for bio-available calcium and phosphate ions. Tooth Mousse is not toothpaste. It is made of milk products so swallowing the product is safe and it can be used throughout the day. However, because Tooth Mousse is derived from milk protein (casein) it is not suitable for people who have a suspected or proven allergy to milk proteins. Natural defence against caries with for people who: • have a low to medium risk of caries • suffer from white spot lesions • experience hypersensitivity before and after teeth whitening • have had professional procedures such as root scaling or cleaning • for children below the age of six BENEFITS: • It contains CPP-ACP a revolutionary new ingredient that helps to repair and restore tooth enamel. • Tooth Mousse provides relief for sensitive teeth. • Regular use will help protect teeth from decay and make them stronger. • It is sugar and lactose free. • Helps prevent white spots during and after orthodontic brackets. FLAVOUR: Strawberry Made in USA INSTRUCTIONS: 1) Apply to teeth using a clean finger, or cotton tip swab or custom bleaching tray. 2) Leave the Tooth Mousse undisturbed for three minutes in the first instance. 3) Then spread the Tooth Mousse around the mouth with the tongue and hold for a further one or two minutes. 4) Do not to eat or drink for 30 minutes following application. Suitable for individuals 12+ years old. and save 17%    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Hiruscar Post Acne is a 100% anti-bacterial, clear gel which has been specially formulated for fast, easy skin absorption. The unique 3-in-1 formulation works simultaneously to improve the appearance of existing acne scars, dark marks as well as prevent acne reoccurrence. It also heals wounds naturally while fading dark spots and/or brown marks. In order to see the best results, treatment must be at least 2 weeks – 2 months, 2 to 3 times daily application. Treatment period can also vary depending on the condition of the acne wound too. BENEFITS: • Lightens pimple scars and dark marks • Improves and smoothens depressed pimple scars • Helps to prevent acne re-occurrences • Suitable for oily and acne prone skin • Quick absorbing, Non-greasy • Non-comedogenic. Hypoallergenic. Alcohol Free. With continuous and recommended usage, the appearance of acne scars will be less visible: • 4 weeks of continuous treatment is suggested for any dark spots and redness. • More than 4-8 weeks continual treatment is suggested for depressed acne scars. • To prevent acne from developing into scars, once the acne appears less inflamed, apply Hiruscar Post Acne gel continuous for 4 weeks. • Continuous treatment can also help prevent acne re-occurrences. *INDIVIDUAL RESULTS MAY VARY USAGE: For existing acne scars and dark marks, Hiruscar Post Acne should be applied generously to the area gently for 2-3 times daily. Use regularly after skin treatment and before make-up for continuous and better outcome for scars management. Always wash hands before and after use.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Staying Healthy Became So Much Easier With Glovida® What makes Glovida® different from other online health and supplement stores is that not only does it offer you a wide array of supplements and products in easily accessible categories (such as Edible Beauty, Immunity Boosters, and Mom’s Fave), it offers bestsellers at better prices. On average, customers can expect savings of about 10% off the usual retail prices for most products, and, on occasion, even savings of up to 50%. Glovida® also has a category called Clinic-Exclusives, which retails products usually found only in medical clinics, such as Heliocare Ultra Oral 30’s and Artrex DS Joint Supplement. This means that you can now get products that are not available over the counter, without the hassle of leaving your home. We tried the Glovida® Family Kit which came filled with products for the whole family, from sanitisers, to children’s surgical masks, supplements and hand washes. Twinkle 3-in-1 Hand & Body Sanitizer, $19.90 is just perfect for when you are on the go. We love that it protects the skin against both damaging UV rays as well as germs, bacteria and pollutants. This is a definite must-have in every handbag. Keeping your gut healthy will keep the rest of you in good condition, which is why we love the Lactomin Advance+ Probiotics 30’s, $39.00. One of the most powerful holistic probiotic products developed in Korea and one of Singapore’s most popular probiotics for the whole family, the supplement is powered by essential vitamins B, D, B1, B2, B5, B6, B9 and D3, which work to strengthen immunity and promote better digestion.   vs. Retail Price:     S$20.50     SOLD OUT      Oh no! Looks like we ran out of this product. Do register to get notified once we've stocked up! Notify Me Product Details Description A spray-in conditioner and detangler in one. Enriched with organic oils and extracts that are good for little scalps. You can use GAIA Natural Baby Conditioning Detangler after shampooing on damp hair to condition with no need to rinse so washing hair just got a little less stressful! It can also be used on dry hair when you need a little assistance brushing knots, putting hair into a pony tail, taming static and sorting out morning bed hair! An all natural hair conditioner/detangler that is suitable for newborns, babies, toddlers and all the family. The spray-in formula is extremely gentle on little scalps and soothing for dry, sensitive skin. It's silicone and dimethicone free so wont coat your little one's hair or block their pores and it's enriched with certified organic oils, extracts and strengthening properties to reduce splitting so your little one will have beautiful, shiny hair that is soft and manageable. BENEFITS: • Enriched with wheat protein to strengthen and reduce splitting • Contains D-panthenol (pro-Vitamin B5) provides conditioning effects leaving hair soft and easy to comb • Certified organic chamomile brings out natural highlights leaving hair soft and shiny Made in Australia SUGGESTED USES: • Spray in after shampooing to condition • Spray in after towel drying to detangle • Tame unruly bed-hair after sleeping • Spray into dry hair to assist with brushing knotty, hard to comb hair • Spray onto dry hair to assist with pony tails! EXPIRY DATE: 31-May-2025 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 1 Ratings Love our product?     Login to leave a review and earn points! 1 0 0 0 0 Reviews Sassy May 2021-06-07 very useful for detangling the little girl's hair! TO CART Product Details Description Ginflex is a natural drug-free option for the relief of joint and muscular pain. Ginflex capsules have 4 active ingredients like Aflapin, Ginger, Tumeric, and Winter Cherry to reduce pain & swelling. Aflapin is a novel, patented formulation shown to have higher absorption and more powerful anti-inflammatory effects, thus further reducing pain and inflammation more quickly. BENEFITS: • Relieve pain, aches & strains • Reduces inflammation & swelling • Decreases joint stiffness • Improves physical function • Natural, 100% plant-based, drug-free • Suitable for adults, including vegetarians and elderly. Combines 4 plant-based active ingredients with both analgesic and anti-inflammatory properties: • Resina Withania Somnifera Extract (Winter Cherry) 180mg • Resina Boswellia Serrata Extract (AFLAPIN Indian Frankincense) 100mg • Rhizoma Curcuma Longa Extract (Turmeric) 72mg • Rhizoma Zingiber Officinale Extract (Ginger) 72mg Made in Malaysia DIRECTIONS: Take 1 capsule daily after meals. ADD TO CART Product Details Description Heptral 400 protects the liver cells from toxins and helps the liver to perform its normal functions. Each tablet of Heptral 400 contains Ademetionine or S-adenosyl-L-methionine 400 mg. S-adenosyl-L-methionine (SAMe) is a derivative of the amino acid methionine and is a naturally-occurring substance distributed throughout the human body. It is present in all living cells and takes part in many biochemical reactions in the body and it is important for a large number of metabolic pathways in the body. Ademetionine is not easily available from typical dietary sources. Heptral 400 is used for adults: • Supporting healthy liver function, reduction of tiredness and fatigue • Providing general liver tonic effect • Supporting healthy mood balance Made in USA DOSAGE: Take 1 or 2 tablets per day or as directed by the healthcare professional. Benefits are most likely evident after 7-14 days and are maintained with continued use. Do not exceed maximum daily dose of 4 tablets. Heptral should be swallowed whole and not chewed. For better absorption of the active ingredient and complete therapeutic effect, Heptral should not be taken with meals. Heptral is not recommended for use in children. .     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy All the hype about probiotics. Does it work? or is it just marketing hype? Probiotics have gained increasing popularity in recent years, and the market for probiotic supplements and foods is rapidly growing. Some people think that probiotics have been overhyped, while others firmly believe in their potential health benefits. In this article, let’s take a closer look at probiotics and explore the potential health benefits they offer. What are probiotics? In simple terms, probiotics are what is commonly known as "friendly bacteria" or "good bacteria". These bacteria live naturally in our body and help ensure the proper functioning of our gut. Some common strains of probiotics include Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium. Often, probiotics help protect our body from infections caused by “bad” bacteria or other germs. Probiotics have also been shown to have potential health benefits, such as improving digestive function and boosting the immune system. How do probiotics work? In order to know how probiotics work, we first need to understand how they interact with our gut. Our gut is made up of trillions of bacteria, viruses and fungi, which is collectively known as the microbiome. Some of these microorganisms are harmful, while others are beneficial. Our body is constantly trying to strike a healthy balance between the “good” and “bad” organisms living inside of us. When an imbalance caused by an overgrowth in the “bad” bacteria occurs, our body may experience issues with our digestive and immune systems, such as diarrhoea and infection. Probiotics can therefore help restore the balance in the gut microbiome by increasing the number of “good” microorganisms and decreasing the number of harmful microorganisms. This balance can have a positive effect on the immune system, digestion, and overall health. How do you choose the right probiotics? When choosing probiotics, here are some factors to consider: Types of strains: Different strains of probiotics have different health benefits. For example, some strains are more effective for improving digestive function, while others are better for boosting the immune system. For general health benefits, you may consider choosing a combination that has a wide variety of “good” bacteria strains. CFUs: CFUs, or colony-forming units, measure the number of live probiotics in a product. Look for a product with a high number of CFUs to ensure that you're getting enough beneficial microorganisms. Delivery system: A high number of CFUs alone may not be enough if the probiotics are unable to survive the harsh environment as they travel through the gut. Hence, it is also important to ensure that the probiotics are well coated to protect them from being killed before they reach the intended site of action. Storage conditions: Some probiotics need to be stored in the refrigerator, while others can be stored at room temperature. Make sure to choose a product that can be stored under conditions that are convenient for you. Consult a healthcare professional: If you are still unsure, it is always best to consult with a healthcare professional such as a doctor or pharmacist before taking probiotics to determine if they are appropriate for you. What are the potential side effects and cautions to take note of? Probiotics are generally regarded as safe, but there are some potential side effects and cautions to be aware of. In some instances, people may experience allergic reactions to certain strains of probiotics, and probiotics can also interact with certain medications. Here are a few reasons why someone might choose not to take probiotics: A weakened immune system: If you have a weakened immune system due to a chronic illness or medical treatment such as chemotherapy, you may be at higher risk of infections. Allergy to probiotics: Some people may be allergic to certain strains of probiotics, and may experience allergic reactions such as skin rashes or difficulty breathing. If you experience an allergic reaction after taking probiotics, it's important to stop taking them and consult with a healthcare professional. You are taking certain medications: Some medications, such as antibiotics, can interact with probiotics. It's important to consult with your healthcare professional before taking probiotics if you're taking any medications. If you are still unsure, do consult a healthcare professional such as a doctor or pharmacist to see if probiotics are suitable for you. Product Recommendations for a healthy gut. Vivomixx VIVOMIXX Probiotics - a high potency probiotic food supplement that is made up of 8 strains of live lactic acid bacteria and bifidobacteria that help restore the balance of the intestinal ﬂora. It contains the De Simone Formulation, one of the most widely studied probiotics worldwide. TS6 The TS6 Probiotic formula is composed of 6 probiotic strains of bacteria created with a special fermentation technology, synergised to overcome a number of gut-health issues and promote better digestion. The healthy bacteria strains in these capsules promote smooth defecation, boost metabolism, help digestion, and improve lactose intolerance in both adults and children. Lacteol Fort Lacteol Fort offers effective and instant relief from acute and chronic diarrhea. It has the Lactobacillus acidophilus LB Strain 10 billion, a probiotic strain that activates good bacteria in the stomach to promote healthy gut and address issues related to digestion such as indigestion, diarrhea, IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome) and upset stomach. Lacteol Fort promotes healthy gut and protects people from unexpected, unwelcome cases of Traveler’s Diarrhea. LactoKids Lactokids is a probiotic designed from natural ingredients such as vitamins B1, B2, B5, B6, B9, and D3, added Colostrum, Calcium and Prebiotics after extensive scientific research that promotes stronger digestive health and enhances the growth of a child. It contains a unique patented combination of Lactobacillus acidophilus, Bifidobacterium longum, Streptococcus faecalis, Lactobacillus plantarum and Lactobacillus rhamnosus. LactoGG LACTOGG’s Probiotics is the world’s most researched and scientifically proven probiotic that has achieved the gold standard status among the doctors. LactoGG's probiotic strain is Lactobacillus rhamnosus strain GG. It has over 44 health benefits that include strengthening the immune system, relief from symptoms of acute diarrhoea and side effects of antibiotics. It is available in both sachet and capsule forms. Conclusion Probiotics can have a positive effect on the gut microbiome and overall health. While they are generally considered safe, it's important to choose the right probiotics that are able to provide the maximum effectiveness for your body with minimal side effects. If you would like to know more, feel free to reach out to your healthcare professional or our friendly Glovida pharmacist to see if probiotics are suitable for you. Science, Auckland University of Technology AUT-Roche Diagnostics Research Lab Director in New Zealand. Since 1992, Dr Merien has authored/co-authored 113 articles/journals in the area of biomedical science, immunology and molecular diagnostics. NMN plays a key and vital role in celluar repair, hence has anti aging effects. NMN is a precursor to a vital molecule for energy production and metabolic health called nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide (NAD+). Many studies have already demonstrated that by increasing NAD+ levels throughout the body in animals, NMN improves metabolic health during aging. EZZ NMN provides 4 vital benefits: • Anti Aging properties • Increase Energy Production • Repair Damaged Cells • Reduce Neurological disorders What is NMN? NMN stands for nicotinamide mononucleotide, a molecule naturally occurring in all life forms. NMN is the direct precursor of the essential molecule nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide (NAD+) and is considered a key component to increase NAD+ levels in cells. NAD+ is an essential coenzyme required for life and cellular functions. What does NAD+ do? NAD+ is the most abundant molecule in the body besides water, and without it, an organism would die. NAD+ is used by many proteins throughout the body, such as the sirtuins, which repair damaged DNA. It is also important for mitochondria, which are the powerhouses of the cell and generate the chemical energy that our bodies use. In cells, NAD+ serves as that booster. NAD+ can decrease or increase enzyme activity, gene expression, and cell signaling. As organisms grow older, they accrue DNA damage due to environmental factors such as radiation, pollution, and imprecise DNA replication. According to the current aging theory, the accumulation of DNA damage is the main cause of aging. Almost all cells contain the ‘molecular machinery’ to repair this damage. This machinery consumes NAD+ and energy molecules. Therefore, excessive DNA damage can drain valuable cellular resources. Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: Take 1 - 2 tablets with meals daily.  vs. Retail Price:     S$36.00  2 FOR $27.50 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description A must-have for both pregnant women and their babies! Blackmores Pregnancy & Breast-Feeding Gold 60’s is packed with the essential nutrients needed to support mothers and their babies. All nutrients are important during pregnancy and breastfeeding. The following provides additional information on some special nutrients important during pregnancy and breastfeeding, that are in Pregnancy & Breastfeeding Gold. • Folic acid – According to guidelines in Australia* this product contains 500 micrograms of folic acid, as it is recommended that women of childbearing age take 400-500 μg of folic acid per day for at least one month before pregnancy and for the first 3 months of pregnancy. • Iodine - Requirement for iodine is increased during the whole pregnancy, especially the first 20 weeks. • Iron - Approximately one quarter of pregnant women report getting constipated when taking high doses of supplemental iron. That is why Pregnancy & Breastfeeding Gold contains a low-constipation, low-nausea, gentle on the tummy form of iron. • Omega-3 fatty acids - During pregnancy there can be an increased sensitivity to tastes, especially in the first trimester. Odourless fish oil means pregnant women can get the benefits of omega-3s without the fishy aftertaste. • Vitamin D - Vitamin D supports healthy foetal development. • B group vitamins - Vitamins B2 and B12 support a healthy pregnancy by helping the body to use folic acid. Blackmores Pregnancy & Breast-Feeding Gold provides 20 important nutrients in total including a daily dose of: • 500 microgram of folic acid which, if taken daily for one month before conception and during pregnancy, may reduce the risk of having a child with spina bifida/neural tube defects • 150 microgram of iodine for baby's brain and hearing development • Lower constipation iron • Odourless and concentrated fish oil, rich in DHA for baby's brain and nervous system development Made in Australia DOSAGE: 2 capsules a day with meals, or as professionally prescribed. Do not exceed the stated dose of folic acid. EXPIRY DATE: 06-Feb-2025 Rating & Reviews 4.5 /5 5 Ratings Love our product? Notify Me Product Details Description Get rid of the sticky, nasty phlegm with Fluimucil A 600mg Effervescent Tablets 10s! Each Fluimucil Tablet is packed with powerful mucolytic ingredients that address a variety of seasonal respiratory infections. Each tablet provides relief from mucus build-up by targeting and breaking down the mucus structure, easing the expulsion of phlegm that blocks the airways. It prevents colds, coughs, and sore throats and quickly removes phlegm congestion on the lungs so you and your kids can breathe easily! BENEFITS: • Effectively breaks down and dissolves mucus build-up with its powerful mucolytic ingredients. • Addresses a variety of seasonal respiratory infections. • Reduces the duration of colds, chesty coughs, and sore throats. • Powerfully removes phlegm build-up on the lungs and chest. • Suitable for adults and children above 6 years old. • Lemon Flavouring Made in Switzerland DOSAGE: 1 effervescent tablet of FLUIMUCIL® A 600 mg once a day  HOW TO USE: Dissolve the tablet in a glass containing a small quantity of water, mixing it, if necessary, with a spoon. A palatable solution is thus obtained to be drunk immediately. It is preferable not to mix other drugs with the FLUIMUCIL® A 600mg solution. Looks like we ran out of this product. Do register to get notified once we've stocked up! Notify Me Product Details Description Limp, flat hair can be a drag. But your hair doesn’t have to be with Aveda’s Volumizing Tonic 100ml! Perfect for fine to medium hair, this tonic lifts your hair and boosts the roots for maximum volume that lasts throughout the day! Formulated with certified organic aloe and wheat amino acid, this volumizing tonic helps scalp your hair’s body and form. This affordable 100ml bottle pounds on the hair roots and energises it for a fuller, voluminous look. BENEFITS: • Volumises dry and limp hair to help you achieve full, healthy hair. • Lifts and forms your hair’s body to give it a more refined, revitalised look. • Pounds hair with organic aloe and wheat amino acid to energise hair roots. Made in USA USAGE: Spray on damp hair. For maximum volume, apply at roots. TIPS : "Rough-dry" hair using a blow dryer and your fingers until it is about 80% dry. Lift sections of hair and spray volumizing tonic™ near the scalp area; then use a round brush, blow dryer and hands to further enhance volume. FOR $19.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Get effective skin moisturising and hydrating benefits with Ego QV Skin Lotion Repair 500! QV Skin Lotion is scientifically formulated with a triple-moisturising blend of occludents, emollients and humectants to help relieve and soothe dry skin. With a luxuriously light formulation, the fragrance-free QV lotion hydrates for up to 24hrs. It’s easy to apply to all parts of the body. For best results, apply after showering or bathing. Safe for use of the whole family, especially infants and the elderly. BENEFITS: • Restores the skin’s moisture by effectively hydrating the skin. • Provides lasting relief from several skin conditions such as eczema, dermatitis, and scaly skin. • Suitable for sensitive skin and flaking or itchiness due to dry skin conditions. • Seals in natural moisture by acting as a protective barrier over the skin. • pH balanced, low-irritant formulation, free from fragrance, colour, lanolin and propylene glycol. • Vegan Friendly - contains no animal derived ingredients. • Particularly suitable for infants and the elderly. Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: Apply to affected areas as often as required, particularly after showering, bathing, shaving, exposure to harsh climatic conditions and at night. Avoid soap as it may irritate sensitive skin. EXPIRY DATE: 30-Nov-2027 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 2 Ratings Love our product?     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Health 〉   YourgutPlus+ Probiotic Capsules With Vitamin D3 60's   YourgutPlus+ Probiotic Capsules With Vitamin D3 60's Brand: YourgutPlus S$47.35     vs. Retail Price:     S$47.35  ADD TO CART Product Details Description   YourGutPlus+ is the ideal 3-in-1 prebiotic with probiotic and vitamin D3 supplement for good gut health and immunity. It contains a special mix of 5 different, scientifically-selected butyrate enhancing lactobacillus probiotic bacteria, and is supported by an effective prebiotic. Each capsule contains 10 times the amount of natural bacteria as a large yogurt. It is also supported by an effective prebiotic soluble fibre, inulin which aids the gut microbiome. There’s no recommended amount of probiotics one should consume daily. Most numbers vary from 1 to 10 billion that you can consume once or twice daily. A lack of probiotics might hinder your progress. However, this doesn’t mean consuming more is the best option. The vegetable-based slow-release capsules are designed to dissolve later, and bypass the stomach to the gut, withstanding stomach acids, where the healthy bacteria can perform its functions. This allows the probiotics inside to be unaffected b other substances. Exposure to the stomach acids will result in the probiotics being destroyed and not establishing itself in the gastrointestinal tract, which will render consuming YourgutPlus+ ineffective. YourgutPlus+ contains multi-strain, scientifically tested, lactobacillus probiotics which are non-dairy. These help to break down healthy foods and nourish the gut lining cells, maintaining a healthy gut wall. BENEFITS: • Scientifically selected for the national Phyto-V nutritional intervention study • Patented delayed release vegan capsule – bacteria get to where they are most needed. 100% Natural, lactose, gluten and artificial chemical free • Multi-strain clinically proven lactobacillus probiotics which help to break down healthy foods and feed the gut lining cells maintaining gut wall integrity• 10 Billion colony forming units (CFU) per day (10 times the CFU of an average live yogurt) which improve the diversity of gut flora • Vitamin D3 enhancement and bioactivation – Contains more than enough of the RDA so you do not have to take extra vitamin D supplements.  Vitamin D combined with probiotics is known to greatly improve  absorption, bioavailability and healthy functions of vitamin D • Made by a trusted UK company with comprehensive quality assurance certification including Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) so has a high safety profile possible. • Suitable for Vegetarians Made in UK INGREDIENTS: Probiotics: Lactobacillus Plantarum, Lactobacillus Rhamnosus, Lactobacillus Bulgaricus, Lactococcus Lactis, Lactobacillus Paracasei. Anti Caking Agents; Magnesium Stearate, Microcrystalline Cellulose. Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol). Delayed Released Capsule; Plant Hypromellose And Gellan Gum. (One Capsule Is 380mg) DOSAGE: One capsule twice a day with a drink. Do not exceed intake. STORAGE: Keep in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight. Do not store above 25 degree. We do not accept exchanges or returns after products are delivered. EXPIRY DATE:   31-Mar-2024 Rating & Reviews 0 /5 0 Ratings Love our product? Mustela gentle cleansing gel with organically farmed avocado gently and effectively cleanses the skin and scalp of newborns and children. It soothes baby’s skin and compensates for the drying effect of bathing, while leaving a unique and delightful scent on baby's skin The main active ingredient which comes from avocados respects newborns' skin and helps to protect newborns' precious yet fragile skin cellular capital. BENEFITS: • Thoroughly cleanses while respecting newborn, baby and child's skin and delicate scalp. • High-tolerance, it soothes and compensates for the drying effects of bathing. • Guaranteed safety from birth on • Paraben, Phthalate, and Phenoxyethanol free. • Hypoallergenic and specially formulated to minimize the risk of allergic reactions. • Tear-free formula. Made in France DIRECTIONS: This Gentle cleansing gel is specially designed to cleanse your baby's hair and body. It comes in a pump bottle - perfectly fitted for bath time. Step 1: Pump a dollop of Mustela's Gentle Cleansing Gel into your hand and lather. Step 2: Gently wash your baby's body and scalp. Step 3: Rinse carefully. Notify Me Product Details Description Thicken your hair with Aveda Invati Advanced Thickening Conditioner 200ML! As the vital second part of Invati™ 3-step set, this conditioner swoops in with its powerful hair thickening and strengthening capacity. Used in conjunction with the exfoliator and revitaliser bottles, this thickening conditioner thickens the hair with nourishing natural ingredients, invigorating the scalp and restoring hair’s fullness in the process. Aveda Invati Advanced may be right for you if: You're concerned about thinning hair or you're experiencing hair loss due to breakage from scalp-pulling styles (such as tight braids, ponytails, or extensions), aging or post-pregnancy. Defend your hair from further breakage and enjoy a weightless, voluminous hair! Product comes in 1000ML and 200ML bottles. BENEFITS: • Strengthens hair to keep it from breaking with the help of natural ingredients that prevent further damage. • Invigorates the scalp to revitalise hair growth. • Facilitates the growth of healthy, moisturised strands. • Effectively restores the hair’s fullness and volume by thickening it. Made in USA USAGE: Massage into wet hair and scalp after shampooing with invati advanced™ exfoliating shampoo. Rinse. Towel-dry. Follow with invati advanced™ scalp revitalizer. Safe and trusted for maintaining the health even of sensitive eyes. DIRECTIONS FOR USE: • Spray all over body before leaving house as a shield against UV rays and as an insect-repellent to keep mosquitoes and bugs away • Spray on hands for disinfecting effect to eliminate germs and bacteria whenever necessary • Spray on wounds for antiseptic properties and to boost wound healing EXPIRY DATE: 28-Feb-2023 Expiry's shorter on this item. S$31.00  ADD TO CART Product Details Description Flo Sinus Care is a gentle sinus wash designed to relieve congestion caused by sinusitis, chronic rhinosinusitis, hayfever and allergies, CPAP therapy as well as post-operative care. Flo Sinus Care is a non-medicated, preservative-free isotonic irrigation solution for washing the nasal passages and sinus cavities to help thin mucus and clear irritants that cause painful congestion. The solution closely resembles the body's natural extracellular fluid, so it is gentle to use. BENEFITS: • Gentle Sinus Wash • Non-medicated • Preservative-free • Thins Mucus And Clears Irritants This refill pack contains: 50 x 1.9g pre-mixed sachets. To be used with a FLO wash bottle. DIRECTIONS: Read enclosed leaflet carefully before use. Use as directed. Add contents of one FLO sachet to 200ml lukewarm pre-boiled water and shake until all powder has dissolved. Use as directed. If symptoms persist see your healthcare practitioner. DOSAGE: Use twice daily or as directed by your healthcare practitioner. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Aug-2025 Rating & Reviews 0 /5 0 Ratings Love our product? Price:     S$90.95  2 FOR $82.45 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Motherlove's More Milk Plus is the most popular blend of breast milk supplements. If you are experiencing low milk supply or seeking to increase your breast milk supply so that you can pump and store, this is the blend for you. Concentrated liquid capsules absorb quickly for fast results in a convenient small dose. This product has been crafted to support and optimize breast milk supply for breastfeeding mothers, and is often taken to increase freezer stashes. Made from the best quality certified organic herbs - fenugreek, blessed thistle, nettle leaf and fennel seed in a proprietary blend designed to safely and effectively increase your milk supply. There are many causes for low milk supply and we recommend that you work with a lactation consultant to determine the root cause of any breast milk supply issues you may be experiencing. BENEFITS: • Increase Milk Supply Fast • Liquid Capsules for Fast Absorption • 100% Vegan, including Vegan Capsule • Suitable for Vegetarians • Alcohol-Free Formula • USDA Certified Organic Herbs • Gluten free, dairy free & sugar free INGREDIENTS: Fenugreek , Blessed Thistle, Nettle Leaf & Fennel Seed Made in USA DOSAGE: Take 1 capsule 4 times per day. Echinacea and Vitamin C may reduce the severity and duration of colds. Echinacea has traditionally been used for the symptomatic relief of mild upper respiratory tract infections such as cold and flus and to support the immune system. Vitamins A and E as well as Zinc are also important for the maintenance and normal function of the immune system. BENEFITS: • A combination formula with echinacea, vitamin A, C, E & zinc • Support healthy function of the immune system • May shorten the duration and decrease the severity of cold symptoms • May decrease the incidence of colds Made in Australia DOSAGE: Adults: Take 1 tablet 3 times a day with a meals, or as professionally prescribed. Children 2-12 years: Only as professionally prescribed. Not to be used by children under 2 years of age without medical advice. Price:     S$16.90  2 FOR $16.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description This deep conditioner is not only gentle and non-irritating but is also safe for use on infants and children. This Original Sprout conditioner will intensively nourish and hydrate hair that is prone to tangles and flyaway, making it the preferred natural choice for everyone in the family! Cucumber and rosemary extracts are used to improve manageability and help detoxify in order to improve ease of hair styling and ensure a smooth comb-through while Kukui Nut Oil is used to alleviate itchy scalps. BENEFITS: • Helps repair, smooth and enhance shine! • Made with organic and natural ingredients! Gentle and safe for your baby! • No Soy, Gluten, Honey, Peanut or Dairy. 100% vegan! • For All Hair Types & Textures • For Babies, Children & Adults Made in USA DIRECTIONS: Apply onto ends for optimal moisture and movement, leave on hair for at least five minutes. For a deeper treatment, try wrapping hair in a warm towel or shower cap for 15 minutes to help the ingredients penetrate deeper before rinsing. S$14.90  3 FOR $13.90 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Telfast Fast and Non-Drowsy Allergy Relief is used for treatment of allergic rhinitis. It provides 24-hour relief from allergies in just one tablet. This can be used for relief of the following allergy symptoms: - Sneezing, Runny Nose, Itchy Nose, Itchy Throat, Itchy, Watery Eyes. BENEFITS: • Give fast allergy relief - Provides fast allergy relief within 60 mins • Non-drowsy - Experience hours of allergy symptom relief without the drowsiness so you can get on with your day perfectly fine. • 24-hour relief - Enjoy 24-hour relief from allergy symptoms. • Relieves allergy symptoms - Get allergy relief caused by indoor or outdoor pollution such as dust mites, mould, carpet fibre or even pet fur. Made in Indonesia DOSAGE: Adult and children over 12 years: 1 tablet once daily. Take Telfast with a glass of water. Telfast may be taken with or without food. ADD TO CART Product Details Description Ceradan Diaper Cream provides triple protective actions that help to protect and prevent diaper rash. Uniquely formulated with three active ingredients, ceramide-dominant essential skin lipids to rebuild the skin’s protective barrier, zinc oxide to seals out wetness and octenidine to control yeast growth in the diaper. It is also hypoallergenic, making it suitable for sensitive or allergic skin. BENEFITS: • Creates a moisture barrier that keeps your baby’s skin dry, allowing it to heal. • Helps relieve inflamed skin and control yeast overgrowth. • Repairs your baby’s broken skin barrier. • For all skin type. Suitable for newborns onwards. Developed in Japan, Made in Singapore DIRECTIONS: With every diaper change, clean and dry diaper area. Apply liberally and evenly on skin. S$6.00  3 FOR $5.65 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Address eye dehydration and provide instant comfort to dry eyes with Lumecare Hypromellose Eye Drops 10ml! Hypromellose’s eye drops, commonly known as “artificial tears”, is an ophthalmic solution that protects the eyes from drying out. What it does is it stimulates a cellulose called hypromellose, which offers extended moisturising benefits to the eyes. It acts as an effective eye lubricant that provides effective hydration and relieves eye dryness and soreness. Furthermore, it protects against conjunctivitis or “pink eye”. Make your eyes feel more comfortable with this tear substitute now! BENEFITS: • Reverses eye dehydration by providing “artificial tears” that keeps the eye moisturised • Protects the eyes from drying out and defends against further damage • Protects against conjunctivitis or “pink eye” Made in UK DIRECTIONS: Place one drop of Lumecare Hypromellose eye drops into each eye two to four times a day. If you are contact lens wearer remove your lenses and do not replace then until 30 minutes after using the solution. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Mar-2026 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 2 Ratings Love our product? Bring home the salon quality protection of OLAPLEX with this hydrating daily conditioner featuring the brand's patented active ingredient, which works on a molecular level to seek out broken bonds caused by chemical, thermal, and mechanical damage, restoring a healthy look and feel to hair. Made in USA HOW TO USE: After shampooing, apply and massage to wet hair from mid-length to the ends of your hair. Rinse thoroughly. Anti-Bacterial Lozenges combine the anti-inflammatory benzydamine with an antiseptic to help relieve pain and help kill the germs that cause minor throat and mouth infections. Provides fast relief from the pain, swelling and redness of sore throats and mouth conditions − including pharyngitis, tonsillitis, mouth ulcers, and after dental procedures, mouth or throat surgery. Helps to fight minor throat and mouth infections. BENEFITS: • Benzydamine targets swelling and pain • Antiseptic helps kill germs that can cause minor throat infections • The lozenge format increases moisture in your mouth and throat to provide soothing relief • Sugar Free, Lactose Free, Gluten Free FLAVOUR: Eucalyptus & Menthol Made in India DIRECTIONS: Age: Adults and children aged 6 years & over Dosage: 1 lozenge every 1-2 hours as required (maximum 12 lozenges per day). Slowly suck and allow lozenge to dissolve in mouth, avoid chewing on it. Difflam is not recommended for children below 6 years old.
