    Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Privacy Policy GLOVIDA takes your privacy seriously and we will only collect and use personal data as stated in this Privacy Policy. Collection and use of personal data We will only use or disclose your personal data with your consent or as authorised by applicable laws and regulations. The personal data collected may include:   Name NRIC / FIN / Passport Number Date of Birth Gender Home Address Delivery Address Email Telephone / Mobile Number By creating an online account with us (whether directly or on your behalf), you consent to our collection, use and disclosure of your personal data for any or all of the purposes specified below:   Administer your online account with us Provide the products or services purchased from us online (and for all other matters relating to such purchase) Verify and carry out financial transactions in relation to payments made for online purchases from us Managing, investigating or responding to feedback, request, claims or complaints provided or made by you Audit the downloading of data from our site Improve or customise the layout or content of our site Identify visitors to our site With your consent, we may collect, use and disclose your personal data for any or all of the purposes specified below:   Deliver marketing or promotional materials relating to our products, services or special offers (and other information which you have requested) Inform you of updates to this site Provide information or services relating to our products, promotions or offers Conduct market surveys, research or data mining Your personal data will be retained by us and will be accessible to our employees and third parties engaged by us for any of the purposes stated in this Privacy Policy. You authorise us to (a) disclose all or any of your personal data to such third parties, and (b) collect your personal data from any other sources available to us (including credit referral agencies). Insufficient or incorrect personal data provided to us by you may result in delays or failure in providing the products or services purchased by you. Confidentiality of personal data Personal data provided to us by Customers or visitors to this site will be kept confidential and will only be disclosed for the purposes stated in this Privacy Policy. We may disclose personal data to third parties who perform certain tasks relating to the provision of our products or services to our Customers or to visitors to this site. All such third parties are required by us to use the personal data strictly to provide the products or services, and are required to maintain the confidentiality of the personal data. Any questions, comments, suggestions or information (other than personal data) sent or posted to this site by Customers or visitors will be deemed voluntarily provided to us on a non-confidential and non-proprietary basis. We may use, reproduce, disclose, transmit, publish, broadcast or post elsewhere such information in connection with the development, manufacture and marketing of products or services, to meet the needs of our Customers or visitors or for any other purposes. We will only disclose your personal data without notice to you if required to do so by law, or in the good faith belief that such disclosure is necessary to:   Comply with legal process, or under compulsion of an order of court or governmental agency served on us Protect our rights, property or safety This Privacy Policy applies only to personal data collected via this site. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or policies of other sites accessible via this site. By activating a link (e.g. by clicking on the banner of an advertiser), you leave this site and we do not have control over any personal data or any other information you give to any other person or entity after you have left this site. Information collected by cookies Our site may pass a "cookie" (a string of information that is sent by a site to reside in your computer’s hard drive and/or temporarily in your computer’s memory). The purpose of a cookie is to tell the web server that you have returned to a particular page, to retain log-in information or to remember preferences and enhance your experience on our site. We may allow third parties to set cookies through our site in order to help us manage and analyse the performance of our site. You may set your browser to decline cookies. If you do so, you may not be able to fully experience some interactive features of our site. Collection of computer data When you visit this site, our company servers automatically record information that your browser sends whenever you visit a site. This information may include:   Your computer's IP address Browser type Sites visited before our site Pages visited within our site (including time spent on those pages) Other items and information searched for on our site, access times and dates, etc. This information is collected for analysis and evaluation in order to help us improve this site, and the services and products we provide. This information will not be used in association with any personal data. Access request; Withdrawal of consent; Updating of personal data You may update your profile preferences that you registered on our site to (a) access your personal particulars, (b) withdraw your consent to our use or disclosure of your personal data, or (c) terminate your online account with us. Requests to withdraw your consent to use or disclose your personal data may result in delays or failure to provide you with the products or services purchased from us. You may also update or correct your personal data by accessing your online account with us. Every email we send via our sending infrastructure will contain an unsubscribe link which is both clearly visible and easy to use. The unsubscribe functionality will not require you to send an unsubscribe request via email or to log in to your user account first. The unsubscribe form will comply to the following:   Unsubscribing will be cost-free The unsubscribe process will not be hidden behind a login and/or password process Request deletion of your personal information Subject to certain exceptions prescribed by law, you may request that Glovida delete information stored about you that is stored in our systems by sending an email to enquiries@glovida.com Security of personal data Personal data collected by us will be (a) safely and securely stored, and (b) disposed when no longer needed by us for business or legal purposes. Links to other websites Our website may contain links to other websites of interest. However, once you use these links to leave our site, you should note that we do not have any control over other websites. Therefore, we cannot be responsible for the protection and privacy of any information which you provide whilst visiting such sites. Such sites are not governed by this privacy statement. You should exercise caution and look at the privacy statement applicable to the website in question Changes to Privacy Policy We may change this Privacy Policy at any time without prior notice to our Customers or visitors. Any changes to this Privacy Policy will be updated on this site. Contact Us If you have any questions about our data protection policy or practices, you may email us at enquiries@glovida.com PURVEYOR OF HEALTH & BEAUTY About Glovida Articles Terms of Use Privacy Policy GET REWARDED.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Pharmacist, a Mother’s best ally when it comes to your child’s health As a mother, you wish for the best for your child in all areas of his/her life. When it comes to their health, it can be overwhelming to navigate through the information and options available. However, there is a professional that you can approach, someone who can be your ally and support system in taking care of your child's health: the pharmacist. Pharmacists are knowledgeable in the field of medications, nutrition and disease prevention. They are also accessible and approachable healthcare providers who can provide valuable advice and support to mothers. Here are some ways pharmacists can be a mother's best friend when it comes to their children's health: Providing comprehensive medication advice Pharmacists can provide sound advice to mothers on medication use and safety for their child, such as advising on the right dosage, administration, and potential side effects. They can help mothers choose the appropriate medication for their child's condition and provide recommendations for over-the-counter medications, supplements, and vitamins. Pharmacists can also provide advice on how to properly store medications to prevent accidents and ensure the medications retain their effectiveness. Educating on proper nutrition Proper nutrition is essential for the healthy growth and development of children. Pharmacists can advise mothers on the appropriate nutrition for their child based on their age, weight, and health condition. They can also provide advice on nutritional supplements, such as vitamins and minerals, that may be necessary for their child's health. Guiding on disease prevention Pharmacists can provide guidance on disease prevention and immunization schedules for children. They can also educate mothers on common illnesses in children, such as colds and flu, and provide advice on how to prevent the spread of infectious diseases in the home and community. Additionally, pharmacists can offer advice on lifestyle modifications that can help prevent chronic diseases in the future. Offering emotional support Being a mother can be stressful, especially when it comes to taking care of a sick child. Pharmacists can offer emotional support and understanding to mothers who may be feeling overwhelmed or anxious. They can provide a listening ear and offer reassurance and advice on how to manage their child's health effectively. Working collaboratively with other healthcare providers Pharmacists can work collaboratively with other healthcare providers, such as doctors and dietitians, to ensure optimal health outcomes for children. They can provide valuable input to help manage a child's medication regimen and advise on potential drug interactions. Pharmacists can also communicate with other healthcare providers to ensure continuity of care and address any concerns or questions a mother may have. In conclusion, pharmacists can be a mother's best ally when it comes to their child's health. They can provide comprehensive medication advice, educate on proper nutrition, guide on disease prevention, offer emotional support, and work collaboratively with other healthcare providers. By building a relationship with a pharmacist, mothers can be reassured that they have a trusted resource and partner in taking care of their child's health. Talk to our pharmacists today At Glovida, our certified pharmacists are always at your service, providing expert advice and assistance for any questions you may have. Reach out to us via our Whatsapp (+65 81015555) or E-Mail (enquiries@glovida.com) between Monday and Friday, from 9:00 to 17:00, and get the guidance you need to make informed decisions about your health and wellness. With their support, you can confidently navigate our vast range of products and select the best options for your unique needs. For all mothers out there We have a treat for all amazing, awesome, and absolutely fantastic mothers. Thank you for all that you do, and all the love that you give. You truly deserve the best! HAPPY MOTHER'S DAY. 💐 From now till 15 May ('cos Mother's Day should not be just a one day affair! 😘), enjoy $20 off storewide with a minimum purchase of only $180.  Key in promo code momsdeservebest at checkout. $39.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Iberet Folic 500 is the complete iron supplementation. A combination of iron, vitamin C and B complex including Folic Acid. Iberet Folic 500 is a multivitamin indicated for the prevention and treatment of iron deficiency due to poor diet, certain illnesses, or during pregnancy. Formulated as a controlled release product, iron is slowly released from the tablet to faciliate absorption. In addition, Iberet Folic 500 contains Vitamin C which further improves gut iron absorption and folic acid which is essential during pregnancy. Iberet Folic 500 can be used for treatment of iron deficiency and prevention of concomitant folic acid deficiency in non-pregnant adults. In pregnancy, it can also be used for the prevention and treatment of iron deficiency. The Complete Iron Supplementation with iron, vitamin C, vitamin B complex and folic acid: • Ferrous Sulphat (High elemental iron content) for replenishment of iron stores • Vitamin C to enhance iron absorption and for immunity • Vitamin B Complex to help your body to utilize energy through metabolism of carbohydrate, protein & fat • Folic Acid to help reduce risk of neural tube defects and to help produce normal red blood cells & prevent anemia • With controlled release Gradumet technology to improve iron absorption and minimize gastric irritation Made in Indonesia DIRECTIONS: Usual Adult Dose (including in pregnancy): One tablet daily, or as directed by a physician.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy THE BIRTH OF GLOVIDA About Glovida Glovida is a team of people with diverse strengths, personalities and skill-sets. Between us, we have decades of healthcare, medical, marketing and sales experience. Why did we start Glovida? Because we believe that it is important to offer consumers the best in healthcare and beauty, at better prices and greater convenience. We believe the era of ecommerce is already here, and a dedicated platform that offers the best in health & beauty with ready information is much needed in the Asian context. If we are not eating, sleeping or breathing Glovida, we are praying. Praying that that our platform can truly add value to the lives of those whom we touch, be it providing a reliable source of health & beauty essentials at better prices (please note that we do not believe in constant price-slashing and bleeding ourselves & other competitors to death, but abide in giving CONSISTENT good value and service for money) or simply being a very accessible platform for others to source and ask about health and medical related topics dear to their hearts. After all, health is the greatest wealth. This is what got us started on the journey of Glovida. Glovida is made up of the words "Glow" and "Vida", which means "Life" in Spanish. We want to empower all our customers to embrace life and live life healthier. OUR VALUES These are values we live by and represent our promise to you: AUTHENTIC We care for your wellbeing like we care for ours. That is why we do not sell what we will not use on ourselves. We endeavour to bring in only genuine, quality and trusted products that you can use with confidence. Our vitamins & supplements are stored in 24-hour air-conditioned warehouses at all times to ensure product quality is never compromised. GENEROUS We offer unbeatable prices by passing back substantial savings to you. That means you only pay for the product and delivery, unlike at brick-and-mortar stores where overheads like high rental and labour costs are added to the final retail price you pay. HONEST We hold ourselves to fair, ethical standards and practices. While our prices are reduced, we do not cut corners on what we offer and how we serve you. At all times, with no exceptions. ENLIGHTENING Value does not end at our low prices – we offer professional evaluation of the products and offer you a platform to "ask our pharmacists" for health queries that concern you and your family. RELATABLE We see ourselves, first as consumers; so we are able to understand and meet your needs. PURVEYOR OF HEALTH & BEAUTY About Glovida Articles Terms of Use Privacy Policy GET REWARDED. EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Address the symptoms of atopic eczema with an essential emollient body wash from Ego—Ego QV Flare Up Wash 150ml! A popular body wash in Singapore, Ego QV Flare Up Wash provides a gentle cleanse that reduces and totally eliminates the symptoms of atopic eczema and rids the skin of irritating, painful flare-ups. This non-drying formulation protects the skin from bacteria and breaks through the “itch-scratch" cycle to improve the skin’s overall condition. This product is safe for use and has no harmful chemicals like soap and fragrance. Use this product for small areas of the skin for more potent and visible relief! BENEFITS: • Gently yet powerfully addresses and reduces the symptoms of atopic eczema. • Relieves painful flare-ups and several of its symptoms. • Protects the skin against harmful bacteria. • Ideal for treating smaller areas of skin and when a full bath is not possible or practical. • It is Non-drying, PH balanced, Fragrance-free, Soap-free, Removes bacteria, Foaming and Dermatologically tested. • Vegan Friendly - contains no animal-derived ingredients. • Suitable for sensitive skin. Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: Use daily in the shower, bath or basin. Massage onto your wet skin, rinse and pat dry. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Dec-2025 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 1 Ratings Love our product? ADD TO CART Product Details Description Reverse dry skin and let your skin enjoy the highly concentrated moisturising cream from Ego QV! Ego QV Cream Pump 500g repairs dry and sensitive skin with its powerful ingredient squalene, a natural component found in the skin's oil. This rich moisturising product boasts five moisturisers, all of which thoroughly hydrate the skin and seal its natural moisture. It targets areas prone to dryness like the hands, knees, and elbows and powerfully addresses numerous skin conditions like eczema, psoriasis, xerosis, and dermatitis. Everyone can enjoy the hydrating benefits of this powerful cream as it's perfect for people of all ages, especially infants and the elderly. QV Skincare established since 1953, is one of Australia's most favourite skincare brands. BENEFITS: • Replenishes dry and sensitive skin for people of all ages, especially infants and elderly. • Powerfully hydrates the skin with the combination of five moisturisers. • Acts as the skin's effective protective barrier by sealing off the skin's moisture. • Suitable for skin conditions such as dry, scaly skin, eczema, psoriasis and dermatitis. • pH balanced, low-irritant formulation, free from fragrance, colour, lanolin and propylene glycol. • Vegan Friendly - contains no animal derived ingredients. Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: Apply to affected area as often as required, particularly after showering, bathing, shaving and exposure to harsh climate conditions and at night. Suitable for daily use. For best results, remember to moisturize immediately after your bath or shower for soft hydrated skin. S$14.90  2 FOR $12.90 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Fess Original Saline Spray 30ml is part of the Fess’s line of nasal sprays. It’s a non medicated saline nasal spray that clears the sinus by breaking down the mucus structure to relieve congestion and offering fast and effective relief from allergies, especially during bouts of sinusitis, hay fever, and colds. This spray keeps the nasal passages moist and free from allergens by washing away dirt and dust build up. What’s more, it’s suitable for pregnant and lactating women. To use, just directly depress the pump of the nozzle into your right nostril then follow immediately on your left nostril. BENEFITS: • Naturally relieves congestion by thinning and clearing excess mucus. • Protects from dust and other pollutants, especially allergens that cause hay fever. • Promotes and strengthens nasal health by neutralising the acidity in the sinus cavity. • Softens dried blood for post-operative care so as not to irritate sinus passages. • Suitable for use during pregnancy and while breastfeeding. Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: Adults: 2-6 sprays per nostril. Children: 2 to 3 sprays per nostril or use FESS Children's. Babies: use FESS Little Noses. Direct the nozzle into your right nostril. Aim slightly back and out towards the top of your right ear. Fully depress the pump. Repeat in the left nostril. EXPIRY DATE: 31-May-2025 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 2 Ratings Love our product? It prevents from redness or nappy rashes at each nappy change. And, even better: it repairs baby's skin barrier with a long-lasting effect, even during diarrhea or teething periods. Mustela vitamin barrier cream has been clinically tested in extreme conditions, so you can safely use it every day. This cream contains 98% ingredients of natural origin and benefits from our exclusive complex of patented natural active ingredients which guarantees its triple efficiency. Three-fold effectiveness: 1. PREVENTS from nappy rash and irritations 2. SOOTHES baby's skin 3. RECOVERS irritated skin Easy to apply and to clean off. Guaranteed safe for use from birth on. Hypoallergenic formula contains 0% fragrance, paraben, phthalate and phenoxyethanol. Made in France DIRECTIONS: Use our Mustela Vitamin Barrier Cream at each nappy change. Step 1: Clean Baby's bottom - don't forget those folds! And dry thoroughly before applying the cream. Step 2: Apply a good layer of cream on Baby's clean and dry nappy area. Step 3: Close the nappy carefully. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Dec-2023 Expiry's shorter on this item. Take them off our hands and save some money for your pockets. These are yours to have. FOR $37.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description [NEW PACKAGING!] Vivomixx Capsule 30's is a probiotics supplement that is essential to restoring and maintaining a healthy gut. Every Vivomixx capsule contains at least 112.5 billion live bacteria. Vivomixx is a safe, gluten-free food supplement that can be taken daily to help achieve a balanced digestive system. It does not contain preservatives nor synthetic sweeteners. It may contain traces of milk. Each Vivomixx dosage is bolstered with a number of Vivomixx benefits, including a combination of 8 different strains of live lactic acid bacteria and bifidobacteria.  BENEFITS: • Defends against diarrhoea, constipation, bloating, and irritable bowel syndrome • Protects against a number of gut-related issues • Gluten-free, without preservatives, colouring agents or synthetic sweeteners. Made in Italy CARE & DOSAGE: 1 to 8 capsules per day, or as directed by the physician. It is recommended to take Vivomixx in the morning on an empty stomach and/or in the evening. Capsules can be taken with a glass of water or opened and mixed in water or yogurt. Do not exceed the recommended daily dosage. Should not be used as a substitute for a varied and balanced diet and healthy lifestyle. STORAGE: Vivomixx products are refrigerated in our warehouse at all times. Vivomixx contains live bacteria and it is therefore recommended to keep the product refrigerated. However it may be stored at room temperature for UP TO ONE WEEK without the quality of the probiotics being compromised. Packing and delivering of probiotics are done on the very same day. We do not accept returns or exchanges once products are delivered. EXPIRY DATE: 31-May-2024 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 23 Ratings Love our product?     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Moms & Kids 〉   Flo Kids Saline Nasal Spray 15ml   Flo Kids Saline Nasal Spray 15ml Brand: Flo S$15.80     vs. Retail Price:     S$17.00  3 FOR $14.20 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Flo Kids is an isotonic saline solution with added minerals. It helps clear a child’s runny or blocked nose quickly, gently and easily. It delivers a gentle, non-medicated, preservative-free nasal saline that is suitable for daily use. Using Flo Kids can help relieve a kid’s nasal symptoms due to COLDS and ALLERGIES because it can: • Wash away mucus including excessive mucus produced by colds, pollens, dust and other allergy-causing particles • Help remove mucus plugs in the nose. • Moisturise nasal tissues. • Help prevent scabbing in the nose. Flo Kids Saline can be used at any angle, making it quick & easy to clear your child's nose. Flo Kids Saline is ideal for kids. The thumb drive pump is easy to use - some children can even do it themselves! Always make sure it is under parental supervision. Children who are involved in their own treatment are often happier and more co-operative, making them easier to treat. Made in Germany DIRECTIONS: 1) Get your child to sit or stand in a comfortable position. 2) Position the Flo Kids Saline Nasal Spray applicator tip just below the child’s nostril and insert the required dose into each nostril. 3) Wipe their nose with a soft clean tissue (or get them to do themselves!). 4) All Flo Kids packs include a Consumer Information Leaflet giving detailed instructions and further information. DOSAGE: Children 0 to 2 years: insert up to 2 sprays per nostril. Children 2 years to 6 years: Insert up to 3 sprays per nostril. Over 6 years: Up to 4 sprays per nostril. If congestion persists, please see your health care practitioner. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Oct-2025 Rating & Reviews 0 /5 0 Ratings Love our product?  S$32.10  3 FOR $29.85 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description A high potency probiotic, Vivomixx Kids contains a special blend of eight strains of live bacteria to help maintain the balance of intestinal flora. Each 1.5g sachet of Vivomixx Kids contains 10 billion live lactic acid bacteria and bifidobacteria. BENEFITS: • Defends against diarrhoea, constipation, bloating, and irritable bowel syndrome • Protects against a number of gut-related issues • Kid-friendly taste: Cookie flavour DOSAGE AND DIRECTIONS FOR USE: For children and teenagers: 1-2 sachets daily Tear open the sachet and pour the contents directly into the mouth. May be mixed with infant formula, cold milk, water or juice and consumed immediately. Do not take with hot foods or hot beverages. CARE & STORAGE: Vivomixx products are refrigerated in our warehouse at all times. Vivomixx contains live bacteria which are sensitive to heat, it is therefore recommended to keep the product refrigerated. However it may be stored at room temperature for UP TO ONE WEEK without the quality of the probiotics being compromised. Packing and delivering of probiotics are done on the very same day. We do not accept exchanges or returns after products are delivered. EXPIRY DATE: 28-Feb-2025 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 8 Ratings Love our product?     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Beauty 〉   NeoStrata Skin Active Triple Firming Neck Cream 80g   NeoStrata Skin Active Triple Firming Neck Cream 80g (1) Brand: NeoStrata S$76.50     vs. Retail Price:     S$102.70  2 FOR $76.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Don’t neglect your neck! This award-winning antiaging neck cream is formulated with a complex of three ingredients, each with a unique action to target visible discoloration and reduce visible signs of aging on the neck and décolletage for skin that appears firmer, lifted and more evenly toned. NeoGlucosamine, NeoCitriate and Pro-Amino Acid work together to firm the appearance of sagging skin and target skin’s volumizing matrix. Clinically proven, NeoGlucosamine and NeoCitrate are able to plump up the wrinkles and lines through the synthesis of Hyaluronic Acid and Collagen, restoring youth to the skin. Furthermore, NeoGlucosamine helps to create a supportive skin structure and reduces discoloration and age spots in the neck. Bolstered with Pro-Amino Acid, it helps stimulate pro-collagen production in the skin’s deep layers, ensuring the reversal of wrinkles formation. This potent cream is fortified with Apple Stem Cell Extract to help protect the longevity of skin’s essential cells, helping your skin to behave like younger skin. Ideal for anyone seeking a more even-toned, firmer, lifted appearance for the delicate neck area. This potent antiaging neck cream is ideal for dry, normal and oily skin types. BENEFITS: • Reduces visible signs of ageing on the neck and decolletage for skin that appears firmer, lifted and more evenly toned • Reduces the look of creases, lines and wrinkles • Helps reduce the appearance of uneven tone on the decolletage • Oil-Free Made in USA KEY INGREDIENTS: NeoGlucosamine, NeoCitriate, Pro-Amino Acid DIRECTIONS: Apply to clean skin on neck and décolletage twice daily. Gently massage in with an upward motion. EXPIRY DATE: 31-May-2025 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 1 Ratings Love our product? contains ingredients derived from nature. The combination of botanical extracts of zesty orange and almond will leave your hands feeling revitalised. Give your skin a well-deserved break with Thankyou Botanical Sweet Orange & Almond Hand Wash. This cleansing and fragrant wash contains ingredients derived from nature, and will get your hands squeaky clean in no time. Using plant-based, botanical extracts instead of harsh detergents or artificial colours means this wash will be kind to you and nature too. • No SLS, SLES, EDTA, Parabens, Propylene glycol, Harsh petrochemicals, Triethanolamine, Harsh detergents, Mineral oils, Synthetic fragrances, Artificial colours • Not tested on animals and vegan friendly. • Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: Massage a coin-sized amount of life-changing hand wash over skin to create a lather. S$34.90  3 FOR $29.95 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Get long-lasting hydration from Ceradan Hydra Cream 80g: Hydrating Moisturiser with Ceramide! Enriched with Ceramide, a natural lipid, this cream also has sodium hyaluronate, another natural ingredient that’s popular for its “non-greasy” feel and powerful moiturising benefits for the whole body! This cream helps the body achieve its optimal ratio and perfectly restores elasticity by pounding life on dry, irritated skin. Safe to use even on the face, it’s perfect for even the most sensitive of skins and provides relief even from eczema. Ceradan Hydra is suitable from 0 months onwards, without restriction on any skin areas including the face. BENEFITS: • Extends powerful and long-lasting hydration to the skin surface. • Has sodium hyaluronate which promotes “non-greasy” moisturisation benefits. • Replenishes dry skin. • Provides optimal relief from a variety of skin irritations. • Provides relief from skin ailments such as eczema with consistent use. Developed in Japan, Made in Singapore DIRECTIONS: Apply regularly to all areas or as directed by your physician. For best effect, use Ceradan® Hydra in between applications of Ceradan. Retail Price:     S$211.00  2 FOR $155.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Aveda Botanical Repair™ Strengthening Shampoo is a bond-building shampoo with plant-power that strengthens and repairs damaged hair. It gently cleanses with Babassu-Betaine and removes sebum and residues and pollution. The gentle shampoo has been developed for stressed hair because its special formula prevents hair friction to avoid further damage. Repair and protection for stressed hair of all hair types and textures. The repairing and strengthening shampoo features the 3-layer technology* with 3 key ingredients: a molecule for hair repair, green macronutrients which help prevent hair breakage and a nourishing complex with maize and coconut. Comes in 1000ML and 200ML bottles. BENEFITS: • Gently cleanses and helps strengthen and repair from the inside out, improving the condition of damaged hair; with plant-derived technologies • Builds bonds to improve hair strength • Gently removes excess sebum, product build-up and pollution, which can damage hair​ • For all hair types and textures • 94% naturally derived • Safe for color treated and chemically processed hair • Vegan, Cruelty Free • Free From: Silicone, Sulfated Cleansers, Parabens, Mineral Oil, Synthetic Fragrances Made in USA USAGE: Massage into wet hair, rinse well. Follow with botanical repair strengthening conditioner. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Mar-2025 Rating & Reviews 0 /5 0 Ratings Love our product? S$39.90  2 FOR $37.90 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Hydrate, balance & renew your skin. Specially formulated for blemish prone skin featuring Vitamin B5, jojoba, aloe vera & vitamin E. Say hello to the healthy, clear, smoother looking skin you deserve with SkinB5. Just like our bodies, healthy skin requires daily hydration that is both soothing and regenerative. Light & non-greasy, this nourishing moisturiser provides deep hydration while healing & restoring a healthy skin barrier. Specially formulated with antioxidants, it is ideal for skin that may be prone to irritable breakouts. BENEFITS: • Cell renewal & healing • Natural extracts • Cleans & revitalises pores Made in Australia KEY INGREDIENTS: Aloe Vera: Recent studies have shown that aloe vera facilitates the healing of wounds and damaged skin tissue. Green Tea: Green tea has proven anti-bacterial properties. Green tea's antioxidants have been shown to be highly beneficial in treating acne. Vitamin B5: Helps control skin oil and will assist in soothing and purifying the skin. Bergamot Oil: Bergamot has antibacterial and drying properties making it an ideal pimple treatment. It exudes a citrus aroma that has a calming effect on the mind, body, and soul. Salicylic Acid: Helps gently remove dead skin cells that cause pimples. A very safe effective ingredient for treating acne and oily skin. No Benzoyl Peroxide, No Parabens, No SLS or SLES, No Synthetic Fragrances DIRECTIONS: Gently massage 1 pump into face & neck after cleansing. Apply alone or under makeup as a primer. In drier seasons, add 1 or 2 drops of high quality skin oil. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Oct-2023 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 2 Ratings Love our product? $21.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Aloe Vera (Aloe barbadensis miller) possesses healing and nourishing properties produced by the unique and precise chemical compounding that takes place naturally in the plant. The plant is like a living pharmaceutical laboratory with twenty amino acids, eight vitamins, eight minerals, enzymes and high amounts of polysaccharides including Acemannan which has powerful healing and health benefits. The special care and attention taken in harvesting and processing of the Aloe Vera ensures that the beneficial properties are retained in Acuralle Aloe Vera Gel. Acuralle Aloe Vera Gel helps heal, soothes, clears and reduces a variety of conditions. BENEFITS & FEATURES: • Relieves - Sunburn, minor burns & cuts, abrasions, ulcers, mouth ulcers, bruises • Soothes - Rashes, diaper rash, itch, insect bites, inflammation, chafed nipples (nursing mothers) • Clears - Acne, pimples, blisters • Reduces - Scars, stretch-marks • Other Uses - Natural UV protector, hair conditioner, after shave gel, non-greasy moisturiser. • For all skin types • 98% Pure Aloe Vera, Paraben Free, Phthalate Free, Alcohol Free, Fragrance Free. Made in Australia DIRECTIONS: Apply to affected area. Repeat as often as needed. Acuralle Aloe Vera is made using only the inner leaf (gel) part of the plant. Allergic reactions are rare but if your skin is very sensitive, test on a small area of cleansed skin (eg. behind the ear). Leave on for 24 hours. If irritation occurs, wash off with waterand avoid further use. *Acuralle's Special Tip: Add one or two drops of Acuralle Argan Oil to Acuralle Aloe Vera Gel for an enhanced moisturising effect on your skin!* EXPIRY DATE: 31-Aug-2024 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 5 Ratings Love our product? Price:     S$75.00  2 FOR $55.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Relieve pesky urinary tract infection (UTI) with LactoCran+ Premium Cranberry Probiotics 30’s! LactoCran + probiotics work in a synergistic triple effect combining USA CranMax with specially selected 19 active probiotics, 10 Billion CFU and prebiotics to block the pathogenic effects of many UTI causing bacteria. Cran-Max (The best cranberry extract from USA) *Clinically Proven Cran-Max is delivered by a unique, patented delivery system called Bio-Shield Technology. Bio Shield Technology protects the Cran-Max as it passes through the digestive system until it reaches the lower gastrointestinal tract where it can be better absorbed. LactoCran + is able to lower the dependency on antibiotics for the common UTI and helps to prevent recurrent UTI. With no antibiotic side effects. BENEFITS: • Effectively relieves urinary tract infection (UTI) • Promotes cleansing of urinary tract • Promotes better digestive health • Blocks out the pathogens in UTI-causing bacteria • Lowers one’s dependency on antibiotics • Lowers the risk of bacterial infection Made in Korea DOSAGE: Adults and Children > 12 years and above: • For maintenance: 1 sachet a day. • For intense support: Up to 2 sachets a day.     vs. Retail Price:     S$65.00  3 FOR $50.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description  With nearly 700 scientific papers  and more than 200 clinical trials to back it up since its introduction in 1985, LactoGG has been extensively researched for its powerful probiotic strains. It is formulated with the Lactobacillus rhamnosus strain GG or "Lactobacillus GG" and combines the power of this effective probiotic strain and Fructooligosaccharide (FOS) to provide over 44 scientifically verified gut health and probiotics benefits. Each sachet of LACTOGG®+ contains at least 20 billion live GG probiotic bacteria and the natural dietary fibre called Fructooligosaccharide(FOS), it is especially suitable for kiddos with bad or chronic constipation problem. The FOS content in LactoGG+ can further promote regular, normal bowel function! Each sachet provides relief from a variety of symptoms such as acute diarrhoea and constipation, and is effective in halting the risk of bacterial infections in adults as well as children. The probiotic benefits of LactoGG has been widely studied, earning it the "gold standard" of probiotic strains in the medical community and boosts the immune system BENEFITS: • Improves overall gut health and strengthens immune system• Aids digestion• Restores the balance in our gut health• Defends against the spread of bacterial infections• Provides strong and fast relief from acute diarrhea and constipation Ingredients from Europe, Made in Hong Kong. DIRECTIONS: Babies and children: 1 sachet a day. Adults: 1 - 2 sachets a day.Mix into room temperature, milk, drinks or baby food or consume the powder directly. Will not cause tooth decay. Amount may be increased when colonisation is interfered EXPIRY DATE: 11-Apr-2026 CARE & STORAGE: LACTOGG®+ sachets' multi-layered aluminium foil packing is specially designed for the climatic conditions of Asia. LACTOGG® is a very stable probiotic strain. It has stability studies confirming that it can survive in ambient room temperature. It does not need to be transported or kept in ice.If it is kept in room temperature the bacteria can survive for at least 24 months! Avoid direct exposure to sunlight. Although it is not necessary, LACTOGG® won't spoil if you wish to keep it in the refrigerator too. We do not accept exchanges or returns after products are delivered. If you have any questions about the ideal use of this probiotic, its effects or anything else, feel free to fill in an online enquiry form. Our representatives will be happy to help. S$15.00  ADD TO CART Product Details Description Treat fever blister with the protective Herpatch Herpes Cold Sore Serum 5ml! Cold Sore Serum is the innovative and effective way to treat cold sore symptoms easy and fast. Herpatch Cold Sore Serum can be applied easily on the cold sore with the easy to use tube. The healing property of the serum is activated once applied to the skin and forms a transparent patch over the wound to protect it instantly. It soothes the affected area and shields the skin to minimise the appearance of cold sores. Finally, it speeds up the healing process of the affected areas with its improved active oxygen formula to minimise the burning and itching pain. BENEFITS: • Serum turns into a protective film that protects the wound instantly. • Has active oxygen property to speed up the healing process of affected areas. • Hides and minimises the appearance of scars. • Effectively helps prevent itching, burning sensation, and scabbing over wounds. • Powerfully protects the wound over possible virus spread. • Has skin firming and toning properties. • Reduces swelling, redness, and blistering. • Painless removal. Made in Belgium HOW TO USE: 1) Before use, make sure that your hands are clean and dry. 2) Wash or rinse the affected area. 3) Gently apply the film-forming Serum on the cold sore so that it adequately covers all lesions and a margin of healthy skin surrounding them. 4) After a few minutes, the white serum forms a protective and transparent film over the cold sore. 5) The Serum can be reapplied, if necessary, every 3-4 hours until the cold sore is completely healed. The film can be removed, if necessary, with warm water. You can use Herpatch Cold Sore Serum at any stage of the outbreak. However, we suggest applying it at first sign of an outbreak. Price:     S$19.50  SAVINGS: 10% OFF    ADD TO CART Product Details Description  Minor scrapes and scratches are all part of baby's daily adventures. Wave goodbye to these skin mishaps with Mustela Cicastela Moisture Recovery Cream! Specially designed for babies' dry and fragile skin, its formula is based on a blend of complementary active ingredients. It soothes by moisturizering and helps restore the skin. Over time, it also helps to strengthen the skin's hydration barrier and helps to keep the skin properly balanced. Ideal for baby's daily irritations, even newborns. Its light texture leaves a non-greasy non-sticky protective film on the skin. BENEFITS: • Suitable for boo-boos, rashes, insect bites, minor cuts & superficial burns• 91% naturally-derived ingredients, including plant-derived hyaluronic acid and Avocado Perseose.• Provides immediate and long-lasting soothing comfort• Protects the skin barrier to preserve its richness• High skin tolerance• Paraben, Phthalate, and Phenoxyethanol free.• Hypoallergenic and specially formulated to minimize the risk of allergic reactions.• Dermatologist and Pediatrician tested. Made in France DIRECTIONS: The tube's narrow, user-friendly nozzle allows for localized application.Step 1: Apply on clean and dry affected areas (do not apply on oozing spots).Step 2: Apply twice a day.Step 3: Seek medical advice if your child's skin appearance doesn't improve.     Membership Benefits    Terms of Use Privacy Policy Forget Yakult! Here Are the Best Probiotic Supplements for You For most of us, the very first exposure to probiotics is in the little yummy bottle of Yakult drink. That’s when we first learn about the good bacteria in the body and how having more of them is good for our digestive system and health. We’ve come a long way since then. Now with probiotics being the latest buzz word in the world of health supplements, we see a myriad of probiotic products everywhere we go. You have probiotic drinks, cereal, coffee and more food and drinks claiming to be filled with healthy strains of probiotics. And of course, there’s Yakult - one of the most popular probiotic drink, isn’t it? But do you really know what’s in your favourite morning drink? Turns out, a lot of questionable stuff that you don’t expect to find! According to health and fitness coach Alex Fergus, Yakult is filled with a dizzying amount of unhealthy sugar! It actually contains 10.2 grams of sucrose which translates to 2.5 teaspoons of pure sugar - this makes its sugar content greater than the amount found in coke per 100ml! In addition, it also consists of skim milk and other artificial sweeteners that are harmful to one’s body! So all you who’ve sworn-off drinking coke altogether, you might also have to rethink your Yakult consumption. Given that Yakult’s no longer the best option, what are other probiotic alternatives? The answer is simple! PROBIOTIC SUPPLEMENTS! Not only do they help boost a child’s growing immunity, it also strengthens one’s digestive system regardless of age! Continue to read on as our in-house pharmasist breaks down the best probiotic supplements that can help enhance your family's overall health: PROBIOTICS FOR KIDS LactoKids is a great tasting supplement that strengthens the line of defence against bad bacteria with its unique patented combination of Lactobacillus acidophilus, Bifidobacterium longum, Streptococcus faecalis, Lactobacillus plantarum and Lactobacillus rhamnosus. It also contains important vitamins such as B1, B2, B5, B6, B9, and D3 that help to further enhance your child’s immunity and digestive system! Nature’s Way Kids Probiotics Chocolate Balls is a fun and delicious supplement that helps to boost your child's probiotic intake. Each chocolate ball houses over 1 billion good bacteria like Lactobacillus acidophilus and Bifidobacterium lactis that improves your child’s digestive health. Being one of the most researched probiotic worldwide, LactoGG has earned the “gold standard” title among medical professionals over the years. With over 44 verified benefits, it replaces the good bacteria reduced after antibiotic intake and builds the immune system while providing relief from a variety of illnesses like acute diarrhoea. BioGaia is a chewable tablet that contains the natural Lactobacillus reuteri Protectis. In addition to promoting good bacteria in your child’s gut and restoring digestive balance, it also offers a great relief from stomach discomforts. It also comes in drops form which is suitable for infants! PROBIOTICS FOR ADULTS Lactomin Advance Probiotics is powered by the unique (US) patented combination of Lactobacillus Acidophilus, Bifidobacterium Longum and Streptococcus Faecalis. This adult probiotic supplement has the added power of Vitamins B and D. The vital vitamins within each sachet produces a wide range of benefits such as reduced signs of ageing and maintaining the health of red blood cells, nervous system, and immune system. Vivomixx is a safe, gluten-free food supplement that can be taken daily to help achieve a balanced digestive system. It has a combination of 8 different strains of live lactic acid bacteria and bifidobacteria, plus over 450 billion bacteria in each sachet to help regulate one’s gut health. It also contains De Simone Formulation, one of the most widely studied probiotics worldwide! Bio-15 is an effective, powerful all-natural premium probiotic that contains an award-winning blend of over 180 types of organic herbs, berries, plants and mushrooms laced with natural mountainous spring water. Employing a traditional, 100% natural fermentation process uniquely from Japan, this supplement houses a unique combination of Prebiotics, Probiotics, and Biogenics that boost one’s gut health. Prevent and treat diarrhea and constipation effectively with Lacteol Fort today! Containing a strain of over 10 billion Lactobacillus acidophilus, this brand offers relief from acute and chronic diarrhoea, Traveler’s diarrhoea, and IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome). PROBIOTICS FOR WOMEN While the products above are general probiotics that are suitable for both men and women, it’s important to highlight to you one trusted probiotic brand that focuses primarily on enhancing a woman’s urogenital health. Pro-uro promotes a balanced vaginal flora! Thick with the active ingredients Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 and Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14, it is used to treat a range of gynaecological infections. Say “No” to Bad Bacteria and “Yes” to the Good Ones! Start building your immune system by partnering your healthy diet with these top recommended probiotic supplements. You can be sure that you’d be getting the right dose of probiotics when you take these products daily. Get these brands at better prices by shopping at Glovida today! Join Mailing List For 10% Off! Stay gorgeous and healthy with the widest range of supplements and vitamins from Glovida! Sign up for our mailing list today to enjoy 10% OFF with a min. spend of $40 on health and beauty essentials from Heliocare, LactoGG, Vivomixx, BioGaia, Physiogel and more! For improved joint comfort, mobility, and the resulting ability to carry out various daily activities, it is important to preserve high quality and normal function of cartilage. Collagen is a structural protein naturally present in abundance in all bodily tissue. Type II collagen is more specifically found at the joint cartilage level. The type II collagen in NC2 is obtained through a unique and patented procedure at low temperature, which ensures its quality. This type of processing makes it possible to obtain type II collagen with its original structure intact, with the triple helix form keeping its epitopes. Vitamin C contributes to collagen formation for the function of cartilage. It is involved in many functions. Made in Belgium DIRECTIONS: Take 1 capsule daily on an empty stomach with a glass of water. EXPIRY DATE: 28-Feb-2025 Rating & Reviews 5 /5 2 Ratings Love our product?     vs. Retail Price:     S$55.00  2 FOR $46.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description Aveda’s making waves in Singapore for its patented Invati™ 3-step system, a full-hair reborn process that involves exfoliation, thickening, and revitalizing. Setting the tone for the full invigorating experience is Aveda’s Invati Advanced Exfoliating Shampoo Rich 200ml! Every bottle of this shampoo has natural ingredients that help cleanse the hair. What this shampoo perfectly does is it renews the scalp, nourishing and detangling the hair. The wintergreen-derived salicylic acid in every bottle also unclogs the pores by removing dirt build-up. Every bottle contains the invigorating blend of Ayurvedic herbs, ginseng, and organic turmeric, ingredients that are combined to form densiplex™. Hailed for its effective thicker hair solution, the nourishing shampoo also protects against further hair loss and breakage. Comes in 1000ml and 200ml bottles. BENEFITS: • Provides a gentle but thorough exfoliation benefits to assist hair renewal process. • Removes accumulated dirt and pollution build-up on the tresses to keep it clean and healthy-looking. • Removes dirt build-up by unclogging the pores. • Offsets hair loss and breakage by assisting the growth of new hair effectively. • Ideal for medium to thick hair; normal to dry scalp • Sulfate cleanser-free formula with low lather • Color safe • Vegan • Free From: Sulfated Cleansers, Parabens, Mineral Oil, Petrolatum, Formaldehyde, Animal Ingredients, Synthetic Fragrance & Gluten Made in USA USAGE: Massage into wet hair and scalp. Rinse. Follow with invati advanced™ thickening conditioner and scalp revitalizer. EXPIRY DATE: 31-Dec-2023 Rating & Reviews 4.5 /5 4 Ratings Love our product? Suu Balm Dual Cooling & Moisturising Cream Body Wash is a gentle, refreshing formulation that’s safe for everyday use on anyone with dry, sensitive or eczema prone skin. BENEFITS: • Formulated by the National Skin Centre (NSC) • Menthol for soothing, cooling relief for eczema prone skin • Ingredients specially and carefully selected by Dr Tey Hong Liang, a senior dermatologist who runs the ‘Itch Clinic’ at the NSC • Contains 5 moisturising ingredients, including rich shea butter and sodium hyaluronate • The absence of parabens, preservatives and artificial fragrances makes this product suitable for all skin types. • Hypoallergenic and matches skin's pH. Designed in Singapore, Made in Malaysia DIRECTIONS: Use when showering or bathing, daily or more often if needed. Apply from head to toe to gently cleanse, and then rinse off. Do not use if you are allergic to any of the ingredients. For best results, keep your showers short and do not use water that’s too hot. TO CART Product Details Description Hiruscar is a quick-absorbing, non-greasy and film-free clear scar treatment gel that helps reduce scar visibility. It’s light weight, clear gel formula makes it easy to apply and be absorbed. Containing 6 essential ingredients, Hiruscar is clinically proven to help flatten raised scars, lighten scars and soften/smoothen hard scars. Hiruscar gel can be used for all scar types and is safe to be used on the face and body due to its skin-friendly formula. It also improves and dissipates wounds naturally while softening thick marks. Treatment time varies depending on the condition, size, type, severity and age of the scar. Use Hiruscar to treat skin affected with scars or even prevent them from appearing in various causes such as operation, accident, burning, pimple inflammation, chicken pox and also hypertrophic and keloid scars. BENEFITS: • Quick absorbing, Non-greasy • Helps scars and keloid appear less visible • Lighten the color of skin tissue and restore to a softer more natural appearance • Safe to be used on the face and body Apply Hiruscar accordingly: • For facial use, apply the gel before applying moisturizer or makeup for more effective absorbance. • For old scars that are thick and bulging, massage the affected area for 2-3 minutes, 3-4 times a day and continue do this for approximately 4-6 months. • To prevent fresh wounds from leaving scars, once the wound has closed, apply Hiruscar continually for 4-8 weeks. • 6-8 weeks of continuous treatment is suggested for surgery and acne marks. • 8 weeks of continuous treatment is suggested for burns from fires, exhaust pipes or hot water. *INDIVIDUAL RESULTS MAY VARY USAGE: Massage gently onto healed & closed wound at 3-4 times daily.( For external use only ) . EXPIRY DATE: 31-Dec-2024 Rating & Reviews 0 /5 0 Ratings Love our product? $44.00 EACH    ADD TO CART Product Details Description  Heliocare is an award-winning European brand celebrated for its distinctive and innovative sun protection capabilities. Powered by its patented Fernblock® Technology, this eminent leader in photoprotection traces its success to numerous collaborations with the prestigious Harvard Medical School, as well as partnerships with and endorsements from a number of leading sun protection experts. Heliocare offers a line of topical and oral photoprotectors that shields users from a range of harmful rays and halts the development of hyperpigmentation. This brand is a true winner among aesthetic doctors; a true antidote that strengthens overly sensitive skin. Heliocare Ultra Oral 30's is an oral sunblock that is clinically proven and studied to prevent the spread of free radicals. Every sunscreen capsules has the antioxidant property of Fernblock FC which reduces the formation of hyperpigmentation brought on by harmful UV rays. The sunscreen properties strengthen the skin's resistance against sunburn by up to 300%. The protection from Fernblock also slows down skin aging by up to 55% through the inhibition of collagen depletion caused by UVA. Bolstered with ingredients such as lycopene, lutein, vitamin C and vitamin E has additional antioxidant benefits and also protects the eye from UV rays. Other than protecting your skin from harmful UV rays, Fernblock repairs existing cellular damage, preventing cell mutation and in turn premature skin aging. The oral capsules serve as an ideal supplement for post-procedural skin or for those who have undergone skin treatments. BENEFITS: • Protects skin from damage caused by prolonged sun exposure• Defends skin against premature ageing• Rebuilds the skin's natural defences• Protects the eyes from UV rays with its additional antioxidant properties• Gluten free Made in Spain DOSAGE: Take one capsule daily before exposure to sun. In case of prolonged exposure, take a second capsule approximately 4 hours laterDo not exceed the stated recommended daily consumption.
